spirituality.quote: One who conquers others is strong. One who conquers himself is all-powerful
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: One who approaches life with force surely gets something. One who remains content where he is surely gets everything
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The Sage puts his own views behind so ends up ahead. He stays a witness to life so he endures
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: He gives but not to receive. He works but not for reward. He completes but not for results
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: One who lives in accordance with nature does not go against the way of things. He moves in harmony with the present moment always knowing the truth of just what to do
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Sharpen a blade too much and its edge will soon be lost. Fill a house with gold and jade and no one can protect it. Puff yourself with honor and pride and no one can save you from a fall
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Complete the task at hand. Be selfless in your actions. This is the way of Heaven. This is the way to Heaven
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Have little and gain much. Have much and be confused
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: On leadership: The Sage knows how to follow so he comes to command. He does not compete so no one under Heaven can compete with him
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The inner is foundation of the outer. The still is master of the restless
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Things that gain a place by force will flourish for a time, but then fade away. They are not in keeping with Tao. Whatever is not in keeping with Tao will come to an early end
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: One who knows Tao never turns from life’s calling. When at home he honors the side of rest. When at war he honors the side of action
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The highest virtue is to act without a sense of self. The highest kindness is to give without condition. The highest justice is to see without preference
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The pieces of a chariot are useless unless they work in accordance with the whole. A man’s life brings nothing unless he lives in accordance with the whole universe. Playing one’s part is accordance with the universe is true humility
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Love is the fruit of sacrifice. Wealth is the fruit of generosity
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Whether you’re a gem in the royal court or a stone on the common path, if you accept your part with humility the glory of the universe will be yours
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: On leadership: The great ruler speaks little and his words are priceless. He works without self-interest and leaves no trace. When all is finished, the people say "it happened by itself"
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: One who sees himself as everything is fit to be guardian of the world. One who loves himself as everyone is fit to be teacher of the world
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The best way to live is to be like water. For water benefits all things and goes against none of them. It provides for all people and even cleanses those places
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Live in accordance with the nature of things: Build your house on solid ground. Keep your mind still. When giving, be kind. When speaking, be truthful. When ruling, be just. When working, be one-pointed. When acting, remember – timing is everything
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: A way that can be walked is not The Way. A name that can be named is not The Name
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: He does nothing for himself in this passing world so nothing he does ever passes
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The Sage acts without action and teaches without talking. All things flourish around him and he does not refuse any one of them
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Become totally empty. Quiet the restlessness of the mind. Only then will you witness everything unfolding from emptiness
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu
Lao Tzu
spirituality.quote: If one doesn’t trust himself how can he trust anyone else?

The Sage embraces the One and becomes a model for the world. Without showing himself, he shines forth. Without promoting himself, he is distinguished. Without claiming reward, he gains endless merit. Without seeking glory, his glory endures
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The Sage travels all day yet never leaves his inner treasure. Though the views are captivating and beg attention, he remains calm and uninvolved
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The essence of my teachings is this: See with original purity, embrace with original simplicity, reduce what you have, decrease what you want
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: One who seeks his treasure in the outer world is cut off from his own roots. Without roots, he becomes restless. Being restless, his mind is weak. And with a mind such as this he loses all command below Heaven
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The Sage is always on the side of virtue so everyone around him prospers. He is always on the side of truth so everything around him is fulfilled
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: On leadership: Those who rule in accordance with Tao do not use force against the world. For that which is forced is likely to return
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: A knower of the Truth does what is called for then stops. He uses his strength but does not force things. In the same way, complete your task, seek no reward, make no claims. Without faltering, fully choose to do what you must do. This is to live without forcing, to overcome without conquering
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: To give without seeking reward, to help without thinking it is virtuous – therein lies great virtue
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: To keep account of your actions, to help with the hope of gaining merit – there in lies no virtue
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Who knows what fate may bring – one day your loss may be your fortune, one day your fortune may be your loss
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Rare indeed are those who are still. Rare indeed are those who are silent. And so I say, rare indeed are those who obtain the bounty of this world
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 1. The ancient ones were simple-hearted and blended with the common people. They did not shine forth. They did not rule with cleverness. So the nation was blessed
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 2. Now the rulers are filled with clever ideas and the lives of people are filled with hardship so the nation is cursed
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: One who knows others is intelligent. One who knows himself is enlightened
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: One who speaks does not know. One who knows does not speak
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Govern a nation as you would fry a small fish
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 1. A knower of the Truth travels without leaving a trace, speaks without causing harm, gives without keeping an account
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 2. The door he shuts, though having no lock, cannot be opened. The knot he ties, though using no cord, cannot be undone
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Even the finest warrior is defeated when he goes against natural law. By his own hand he is doomed and all creatures are likely to despise him
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Do not flaunt your excellence. Do not rejoice over victory. With the loss of others, weep with sorrow and grief. After winning a battle, do not celebrate, observe the rites of a funeral
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: When there is silence, one finds peace. When there is silence, one finds the anchor of the universe within himself
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The most yielding thing in the world will overcome the most rigid. The most empty thing in the world will overcome the most full. From this comes a lesson – Stillness benefits more than action. Silence benefits more than words
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: No greater curse than desire. No greater tragedy than discontentment. No greater fault than selfishness
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Contentment alone is enough. Indeed, the bliss of eternity can be found in your contentment
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: One who gives freely and without attachment gets a full life in return. One who gives with the secret hope of getting is merely engaged in business. Truly, they neither give nor receive any of the treasure from this world below Heaven
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Act without acting. Give without giving. Taste without tasting
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Take on difficulties while they are still easy. Do great things while they are still small. Step by step the world’s burden is lifted. Piece by piece the world’s treasure is amassed
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The feeble are easily broken. The small are easily scattered
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Begin your task before it becomes a burden. Put things in order before they get out of hand
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 1. I have three treasures that I cherish and hold dear. The first is love, the second is moderation, the third is humility
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Part 2. With love one is fearless. With moderation one is abundant. With humility one can fill the highest position
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 3. Now if one is fearless but has no love, abundant but has no moderation, rises up but has no humility, surely he is doomed
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: A tree that fills a man’s embrace grows from a seedling. A tower nine stories high starts with one brick. A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The best warrior leads without haste, fights without anger, overcomes without confrontation. He puts himself below and brings out the highest in his men
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: As you plant, so you reap
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: As you live, so you die
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The Great Vessel is never filled
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Be wary of both honor and disgrace
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Keep silent and you’ll beat the heat
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: He stays with the true and not the false
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: He stays with the firm and not the flimsy
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: A sacrifice to a higher cause is never lost
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Grabbing and stuffing – there is not end to it
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Truth, once established, can never be uprooted
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: He walks without making footprints in this world
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Give without conditions and the people will prosper
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Within, within. This is where the world’s treasure has always been
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The great master follows his own nature and not the trappings of life
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The low is greater than the high. The still is greater than the restless
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: There will be no obstacles you cannot overcome, no limit you cannot surpass, no empire you cannot rule
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Heaven and Earth have no preference. A man may choose one over another but to Heaven and Earth all are the same. The high, the low, the great, the small – all are given light, all get a place to rest
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu
Lao Tzu
spirituality.quote: What could he grab for that he does not already have? What could he do for himself that the universe itself has not already done?

Hold fast to the Power of the One. It will unify the body and merge it with the spirit. It will cleanse the vision and reveal the world as flawless. It will focus the life-force and make one supple as a newborn
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 1. The five colors blind the eye. The five tones deafen the ear. The five flavors dull the palate. Racing, hunting, and galloping about only disturb the mind. Wasting energy to obtain rare objects only impedes one’s growth
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 2. So the Sage is led by his inner truth and not his outer eye. He holds to what is deep and not what lies on the surface
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Man’s true self is eternal, yet he thinks, "I am this body, I will soon die". This false sense of self is the cause of all his sorrow
spirituality.author: When a person does not identify himself with the body, what troubles could touch him?

spirituality.quote: Through the course of Nature, muddy water becomes clear. Through the unfolding of life, man reaches perfection. Through sustained activity, that supreme rest is naturally found
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 1. Abandon holiness. Discard cleverness and the people will benefit a hundredfold
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 2. Abandon the rules of "kindness". Discard "righteous" actions and the people will return to their own natural affections
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 3. Abandon book learning. Discard the rules of behavior and the people will have no worries
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 4. Abandon plots and schemes. Discard profit-seeking and the people will not become thieves
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: "Surrender brings perfection". The crooked become straight. The empty become full. The worn become new
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The ancient saying, "Surrender brings perfection,", is not just empty words. Truly, surrender brings perfection and perfection brings the whole universe
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Speak little. Hold to your own nature. A strong wind does not blow all morning. A cloudburst does not last all day. The wind and rain are from Heaven and Earth and even there do not last long
spirituality.author: How much less so the efforts of man?

spirituality.quote: The path of the Sage is called "The Path of Illumination". He who gives himself to this path is like a block of wood that gives itself to the chisel – Cut by cut it is honed to perfection
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Only a student who gives himself can receive the master’s gift. If you think otherwise, despite your knowledge, you have blundered
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Giving and receiving are one. This is called "The great wonder", "The essential mystery", "The very heart of all that is true"
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 1. Tao is eternal, one without a second. Simple indeed yet so subtle that no one can master it
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 2. If princes and kings could just hold it, all things would flock to their kingdom
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 3. Heaven and Earth would rejoice with the dripping of sweet dew. Everyone would live in harmony, not by official decree, but by their own inner goodness
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Rivers and streams are born of the ocean. All creation is born of Tao. Just as all water flows back to become the ocean. All creation flows back to become Tao
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Be tranquil like the rain of spring. Be pure like the sheen of silk. Then the Great Perfection will be perfect and the Great Fullness will be full
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The sun in all its glory reveals but a passing world. Only the inner light illumines eternity. Only that light can guide us back home
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Have faith. Follow your own shining. Be aware of your own awareness. On the darkest nights you will not stumble. On the brightest days you will not blink. This is called "The Practice of Eternal Light"
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Shut the mouth. Close the gates. Blunt the sharpness. Loosen the knots. Temper the glare. Become one with the dust of the world. This is called "The Secret Embrace"
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Seeing your own smallness is called insight. Honoring your own tenderness is called strength
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: A mind free of thought, merged within itself, beholds the essence of Tao. A mind filled with thought, identified with its own perceptions, beholds the mere forms of this world
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Everyone recognizes beauty only because of ugliness. Everyone recognize virtue only because of sin
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The Sage rules by stilling minds and opening hearts, by filling bellies and strengthening bones. He shows people how to be simple and live without desires. To be content and not look for other ways
spirituality.author: With the people so pure, who could trick them? What clever ideas could lead them astray?

spirituality.quote: When action is pure and selfless everything settles into its own perfect place
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 1. Wu is nothingness, emptiness, non-existence
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 2. Clay is molded to form a cup yet only the space within allows the cup to hold water
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 3. Thus, when a thing has existence alone it is mere dead-weight. Only when it has wu, does it have life
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu
Lao Tzu
spirituality.quote: The difference between a formal "yes" and a casual "yeah" – how slight! The difference between knowing the Truth and not knowing it – how great!

Part 1. The masters of this ancient path are mysterious and profound. Their inner state baffles all inquiry. Their depths go beyond all knowing. Thus, despite every effort, we can only tell of their outer signs
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 2. Deliberate, as if treading over the stones of a winter brook. Watchful, as if meeting danger of all sides. Reverent, as if receiving as honored guest. Selfless, like a melting block of ice. Pure, like an uncarved block of wood. Accepting, like an open valley
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: On his tiptoes a man is not steady. Taking long strides he cannot keep pace
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: To the self-serving, nothing shines forth. To the self-promoting, nothing is distinguished. To the self-appointing, nothing bears fruit. To the self-righteous, nothing endures
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Hold your male side with your female side. Hold your bright side with your dull side. Hold your high side with your low side. Then you will be able to hold the whole world
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 1. Contraction pulls at that which extends too far. Weakness pulls at that which strengthens too much. Ruin pulls at that which rises too high. Loss pulls at life when you fill it with too much stuff
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 2. The lesson here is called – "The wisdom of obscurity" – The gentle outlast the strong. The obscure outlast the obvious. Hence, a fish that ventures from deep water is soon snagged by a net. A country that reveals its strength is soon conquered by an enemy
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: When Tao is lost one must learn the rules of virtue. When virtue is lost, the rules of kindness. When kindness is lost, the rules of justice. When justice is lost, the rules of conduct
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: One’s own reputation – why the fuss? One’s own wealth – why the concern? I say, what you gain is more trouble than what you lose
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: To become learned, gain daily. To obtain Tao, reduce daily. Reduce and reduce again until all action is reduced to non-action. Then no one is left. Nothing is done yet nothing is left undone
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: In all your glory, never lose sight of the Mother. Without her, your empire will crumble, your power will waste away
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Allow your life to unfold naturally. Know that it too is a vessel of perfection. Just as you breathe in and breathe out. Sometimes you’re ahead and other times behind. Sometimes you’re strong and other times weak. Sometimes you’re with people and other times alone
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Putting a value on status will cause people to compete. Hoarding treasure will turn them into thieves. Showing off possessions will disturb their daily lives
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The universe is like a bellows. It stays empty yet is never exhausted. It gives out yet always brings forth more. Man is not like this. When he blows out air like a bellows he becomes exhausted. Man was not made to blow out air. He was made to sit quietly and find the truth within
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Endlessly creating, endlessly pulsating, the Spirit of the Valley never dies. She is called the Hidden Creator
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Heaven is ancient. Earth is long-lasting. Why is this so? Because they have no claims to life. By having no claims to life they cannot be claimed by death
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Endless affliction is bound to the body
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Honor is founded on disgrace and disgrace is rooted in honor. Both should be avoided. Both bind a man to this world
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Eyes look but cannot see it. Ears listen but cannot hear it. Hands grasp but cannot touch it. Beyond the senses lies the great Unity – invisible, inaudible, intangible
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 1. See all things flourish and dance in endless variation. And once again merge back into perfect emptiness. Their true repose. Their true nature. Emerging, flourishing, dissolving back again. This is the eternal process of return
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 2. To know this process brings enlightenment. To miss this process brings disaster
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Only when the family loses its harmony do we hear of "dutiful sons". Only when the state is in chaos do we hear of "loyal ministers"
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu
Lao Tzu
spirituality.quote: Must I fear what others fear? Should I fear desolation when there is abundance? Should I fear darkness when that light is shining everywhere? Nonsense!
Life and death are born together. Difficult and easy. Long and short. High and low – all these exist together. Sound and silence blend as one. Before and after arrive as one
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 1. I am but a guest in this world. While others rush about to get things done, I accept what is offered. Oh, my mind is like that that of a fool, aloof to the clamor of life around me
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 2. Everyone seems so bright and alive with the sharp distinctions of day. I appear dark and dull with the blending of differences by night
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 3. I am drifting like an ocean, floating like the high winds. Everyone is so rooted in this world yet I have no place to rest my head
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 4. Indeed I am different…I have no treasure but the Eternal Mother. I have no food but what comes from her breast
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Peace and tranquillity are what he holds most dear so he does not obtain weapons. But when their use is unavoidable he employs them with fortitude and zeal
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: One who is bound to action, proud of victory, and delights in the misfortune of others will never gain a thing from this world below Heaven
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: One may look for fulfillment in this world but his longings will never be exhausted. The only thing he ever finds is that he himself is exhausted
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Be content, rest in your own fullness – You will not suffer from loss, you’ll avoid the snare of this world, you’ll have long life and endless blessings
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Stay with the Mother, shut the mouth, close the gates and you are never in trouble. Abandon the Mother, open the mouth, be busy with others and you are beyond all hope of rescue
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The Sage stays with his daily task and accomplishes the greatest thing. Beware of those who promise a quick and easy way for much ease brings many difficulties
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: When life begins we are tender and weak. When life ends we are stiff and rigid. All things, including the grass and trees, are soft and pliable in life, dry and brittle in death
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The soft and supple are the companions of life. While the stiff and unyielding are the companions of death
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The people must take death seriously and not waste their lives in distant lands. Let them return to the knotting of cord. Let them enjoy their food and care for their clothing. Let them be content in their homes and joyful in the way they live
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Love your own life and the people will be uplifted
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: One with true virtue always seeks a way to give. One who lacks true virtue always seeks a way to get
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: To the giver comes the fullness of life. To the taker just an empty hand
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Love vanquishes all attackers. It is impregnable in defense. When Heaven wants to protect someone does it send an army? No, it protects him with love
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The Sage is like Heaven and Earth. To him none are especially dear nor is there anyone he disfavors. He gives and gives without condition offering his treasure to everyone
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu
Lao Tzu
spirituality.quote: As you love the people and rule the state, can you be free of self-interest? As the gates of Heaven open and close, can you remain steadfast as a mother bird who sits with her nest? As your wisdom reaches the four corners of the world, can you keep the innocence of a beginner?
Tao is empty yet it fills every vessel with endless supply. Tao is hidden yet it shines in every corner of the universe
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Those who have Tao want nothing else. Though seemingly empty, they are ever full. Though seemingly old, they are beyond the reach of birth and death
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Tao is both Named and Nameless. As Nameless, it is the origin of all things. As Named, it is the mother of all things
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Tao and this world seem different but in truth they are one and the same. The only difference is in what we call them. How deep and mysterious is this unity. How profound, how great! It is the truth beyond the truth, the hidden within the hidden. It is the path to all wonder, the gate to the essence of everything
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: With it, the sharp edges become smooth, the twisted knots loosen, the sun is softened by a cloud, the dust settles into place
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: So deep, so pure, so still. It has been this way forever. You may ask, "Whose child is it?", but I cannot say. This child was here before the Great Ancestor
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Tao is limitless, unborn, eternal. It can only be reached through the Hidden Creator. She is the very face of the Absolute. The gate to the source of all things eternal
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Listen to Her voice. Hear it echo through creation. Without fail, She reveals her presence. Without fail, She brings us to our own perfection
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Know this Primal Power that guides without forcing, that serves without seeking, that brings forth and sustains life yet does not own or possess it
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: One who holds this Power brings Tao to this very Earth. He can triumph over a raging fire or the freeze of winter weather. Yet when he comes to rule the world it’s with the gentleness of a feather
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Know That which is beyond all beginnings and you will know everything here and now. Know everything in this moment and you will know the Eternal Tao
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Be still. Stillness reveals the secrets of eternity. Eternity embraces the all-possible. The all-possible leads to a vision of oneness. A vision of oneness brings about universal love. Universal love supports the great truth of Nature. The great truth of Nature is Tao
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The body may perish, deeds may be forgotten, but he who has Tao has all eternity
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: To know Tao alone, without trace of your own existence, is the highest. Next comes loving and praising it. Then fearing it. Then despising it
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: When the greatness of Tao is present action arises from one’s own heart. When the greatness of Tao is absent action comes from the rules of "kindness" and "justice". If you need rules to be kind and just, if you act virtuous, this is a sure sign that virtue is absent. Thus we see the great hypocrisy
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Perfect action, true virtue, supreme power, this is how Tao is revealed, through those who follow it completely
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Though formless and intangible, it gives rise to form. Though vague and elusive, it gives rise to shapes. Though dark and obscure, it is the spirit, the essence, the life-breath of all things. "But is it real?" you ask – I say its evidence is all of creation!
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: One who lives in accordance with the Truth becomes the embodiment of Tao. His actions become those of Heaven. It is through such a one that Heaven rejoices, that Earth rejoices, that all of life rejoices
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: From the viewpoint of Tao, this self-indulgence is like rotting food and painful growths on the body – things that all creatures despise. So why hold onto them? When walking the path of Tao, this is the very stuff that must be uprooted, thrown out, and left behind
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Something formless, complete in itself, there before Heaven and Earth. Tranquil, vast, standing alone, unchanging. It provides for all things yet cannot be exhausted. It is the mother of the universe. I do not know its name so call it "Tao". Forced to name it further, I call it "The greatness of all things", "The end of all endings". I call it "That which is beyond the beyond", "That to which all things return"
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: To create without owning. To give without expecting. To fill without claiming. This is the profound action of Tao
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: From Tao comes all greatness – It makes Heaven great. It makes Earth great. It makes man great
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Man depends on the laws of Earth. Earth depends on the laws of Heaven. Heaven depends on the laws of Tao. But Tao depends on itself alone. Supremely free, self-so, it rests in its own nature
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 1. Those who look down upon this world will surely take hold and try to change things. But this is a plan I’ve always seen fail. The world is Tao’s own vessel. It is perfection manifest. It cannot be changed. It cannot be improved
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Part 2. For those who go on tampering, it’s ruined. For those who try to grasp, it’s gone
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Tao is the home to which all things return yet it wants nothing in return. So we call it "The Greatest". The Sage is the same way – He does not claim greatness over anything, he’s not even aware of his own greatness
spirituality.author: Tell me, what could be greater than this?

spirituality.quote: When a person embodies Tao his heart becomes true. When a family embodies Tao it thrives. When a village embodies Tao it is protected. When a country embodies Tao it prospers. When the world embodies Tao it reveals its perfection
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: When the emperor is crowded or the three ministers installed, they receive a gift of jade and horses. But how can this compare to sitting still and gaining the treasure of Tao
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Though the Tao of Heaven has no favorites, it always sides with one who has a pure heart
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: One who gives himself to his position surely lives long. One who gives himself to Tao surely lives forever
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: The Sage has no fixed heart of his own. Those who look at him see their own hearts
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Part 1. Without going outside one can know the whole world. Without looking out the window one can see the ways of Heaven. The farther one goes the less one knows
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Part 2. Thus the Sage does not go, yet he knows. He does not look, yet he sees. He does not do, yet all is done
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Those who are good he treats with goodness. Those who are bad he also treats with goodness because the nature of his being is good
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Those who are truthful he treats with truth. Those who are not truthful he also treats with truth because the nature of his being is truthful
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: The Sage lives in harmony with all below Heaven. He sees everything as his own self. He loves everyone as his own child. All people are drawn to him. Every eye and ear is turned toward him
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Going about, he does not fear the rhinoceros or tiger. Entering the battlefield, he does not fear sharp weapons for in him the rhino can find no place to pitch its horn. The tiger no place to thrust his blade. Why is this so? Because he dwells in that place where death cannot enter
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: One who knows this secret is not moved by attachment or aversion, swayed by profit or loss, nor touched by honor or disgrace. He is far beyond the cares of men yet comes to hold the dearest place in their hearts
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: The Sage is here upon the Earth to gently guide us back. He cuts but does not harm. He straightens but does not disrupt. He illuminates but does not dazzle
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: The Sage wants to uplift the people. The people want to follow the Sage. Only by being low does this come to be
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: The Sage bows to the people. The people bow to the Sage. And when they lift up their heads, only greatness remains
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: The Sage guides men back to their own treasure and helps all things come to know the truth they have forgotten. All this he does without a stir
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: The Sage sees the world as an expansion of his own self. So what need has he to accumulate things? By giving to others he gains more and more. By serving others he receives everything
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: The Sage knows himself, but not as himself, he loves himself, but not as himself, he honor himself, but not as himself. Thus, he discards the view of his own self and chooses the view of the universe
spirituality.author: Unknown
Unknown
spirituality.quote: What honor can there be without humility? What heights can be reached without being low?
When the best seeker hears of Tao he strives with great effort to know it. When an average seeker hears of Tao he thinks of it now and again. When the poorest seeker hears of Tao he laughs out loud
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: There is an old saying. The clear way seems clouded. The straight way seems crooked. The sure way seems unsteady
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: If I had the least bit of wisdom I could follow the path of Tao quite well. My only fear would be trying to go my own way. The Great Path is simple and direct yet people love to take the side-routes
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: To rule the state, have a knows plan. To win a battle, have an unknown plan. To gain the universe, have no plan at all
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: On leadership: When the ruler knows his own heart, the people are simple and pure. When he meddles with their lives, they become restless and disturbed
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Today the righteous turn to trickery. Tomorrow the good turn to darkness
spirituality.author: Oh what delusion abounds and every day it grows worst!

spirituality.quote: If a person seems wicked, do not cast him away – Awaken him with your words. Elevate him with your deeds. Requite his injury with your kindness. Do not cast him away. Cast away his wickedness
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: A still mind can easily hold the truth. The difficulties yet to come can easily be avoided
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Part 1. Act and it’s ruined. Grab and it’s gone. People on the verge of success often lose patience and fail in their undertakings
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Part 2. Be steady from the beginning to the end and you won’t bring on failure
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: A tree that cannot bend will crack in the wind. Thus by Nature’s own decree, the hard and strong are defeated while the soft and gentle are triumphant
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Part 1. Why do the hundred rivers turn and rush toward the sea? Because it naturally stays below them
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Part 2. He who wishes to rule over the people must speak as if below them. He who wishes to lead the people must walk as if behind them. So the Sage rules over the people but he does not weigh them down. He leads the people but he does not block their way
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Part 3. The Sage stays low so the world never tires of exalting him. He remains a servant so the world never tires of making him its king
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Words born in the mind are not true. True words are not born of the mind
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Those who have virtue do not look for fault. Those who look for faults have no virtue
spirituality.author: Unknown
Unknown
spirituality.quote: Knowing what cannot be known – what a lofty aim! Not knowing what needs to be known – what a terrible result!
Follow your path to the end. Accept difficulty as an opportunity. This is the sure way to end up with no difficulties at all
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Don’t limit the view of yourself. Don’t despise the conditions of your birth. Don’t resist the natural course of your life. In this way you will never weary of this world
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: In the end, the treasure of life is missed by those who hold on and gained by those who let go
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Doing nothing is sometimes one of the highest of the duties of man. G.K
spirituality.author: Chesterton

spirituality.quote: Sometimes letting things go is an act of far greater power than defending or hanging on
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle (A New Earth)

spirituality.quote: Seek not that the things which happen should happen as you wish; but wish the things which happen to be as they are, and you will have a tranquil flow of life
spirituality.author: Epictetus (Enchiridion)

spirituality.quote: Intelligence consists in ignoring things that are irrelevant
spirituality.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

spirituality.quote: Give up your attachment to having things your way
spirituality.author: Iyanla Vanzant

spirituality.quote: Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Never waste valuable time, or mental peace of mind, on the affairs of others – that is too high a price to pay
spirituality.author: Robert Greene

spirituality.quote: A rational person can find peace by cultivating indifference to things outside of their control
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: There are two ways to be. One is at war with reality and the other is at peace
spirituality.author: Byron Katie

spirituality.quote: No drives, no compulsions, no needs, no attractions; when your affairs are under control you are free
spirituality.author: Zhuangzi

spirituality.quote: Let go of becoming but never let go of taking action. Stop expecting and start living
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Anyone who enjoys inner peace is no more broken by failure than he is inflated by success
spirituality.author: Matthieu Ricard (Happiest man in the world)

spirituality.quote: Become comfortable with not knowing
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Choose the non-emotional response to any given situation and see how much easier your life becomes
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: The way of love is the way of no-expectation. Love exists only when there is a total acceptance and no desire to change anything
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Life moves on and so should we
spirituality.author: Spencer Johnson

spirituality.quote: Take a step back and realize most things are distractions
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: One’s doing well if age improves even slightly one’s capacity to hold on to that vital truism: "This too shall pass"
spirituality.author: Alain de Botton

spirituality.quote: Let go of the battle. Breathe quietly and let it be. Let your body relax and your heart soften. Open to whatever you experience without fighting
spirituality.author: Jack Kornfield

spirituality.quote: Just keep in mind: the more we value things outside our control, the less control we have
spirituality.author: Epictetus

spirituality.quote: To let go does not mean to get rid of. To let go means to let be. When we let be with compassion, things come and go on their own
spirituality.author: Jack Kornfield

spirituality.quote: We are always in transition. If you can just relax with that, you’ll have no problem
spirituality.author: Chögyam Trungpa

spirituality.quote: Accept what is, let go of what was, have faith in what will be
spirituality.author: Sonia Ricotti

spirituality.quote: You deserve to rest. Even if only for a moment. Put down the weight you’re carrying. Let go of the need to keep it all together. Take off your warrior mask. For this moment, now … just breathe
spirituality.author: Jason Garner

spirituality.quote: Let go and just do your own work
spirituality.author: Ajahn Chah

spirituality.quote: Don’t seek, don’t search, don’t ask, don’t knock, don’t demand – relax
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: To resist change, to try to cling to life, is like holding your breath: if you persist you kill yourself
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: The willing are led by fate, the reluctant are dragged
spirituality.author: Cleanthes

spirituality.quote: Just as a mighty boulder stirs not with the wind, so the wise are never moved either by praise or blame
spirituality.author: The Dhammapada

spirituality.quote: Sticking with that uncertainty, getting the knack of relaxing in the midst of chaos, learning not to panic – this is the spiritual path
spirituality.author: Pema Chödrön

spirituality.quote: Observe things as they are and don’t pay attention to other people
spirituality.author: Huang Po

spirituality.quote: The nearer a man comes to a calm mind, the closer he is to strength
spirituality.author: Marcus Aurelius

spirituality.quote: All the art of living lies in a fine mingling of letting go and holding on
spirituality.author: Henry Havelock Ellis

spirituality.quote: When we give too many f*cks, when we choose to give a f*ck about everything, then we feel as though we are perpetually entitled to feel comfortable and happy at all times – that’s when life f*cks us
spirituality.author: Mark Manson

spirituality.quote: Your mind will find dissatisfaction regardless of your circumstances. Dissatisfaction is independent of circumstances; switching circumstances won’t solve your dissatisfaction. Instead, learn to release your attachments and accept the universe whatever it brings you
spirituality.author: Justin Kan

spirituality.quote: Enjoy what you can and ignore the rest. Let’s not waste any energy fighting things that are outside our control
spirituality.author: Paulo Coelho

spirituality.quote: Without desire there is stillness, and the world settles by itself
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Some of us think holding on makes us strong but sometimes it is letting go
spirituality.author: Herman Hesse

spirituality.quote: We must be willing to let go of the life we have planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us. E. M
spirituality.author: Forster

spirituality.quote: Care about what other people think and you will always be their prisoner
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: What such a man needs is not courage but nerve control, cool headedness. This he can get only by practice
spirituality.author: Theodore Roosevelt

spirituality.quote: Do not let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace
spirituality.author: 14th Dalai Lama

spirituality.quote: From my own limited experience I have found that the greatest degree of inner tranquility comes from the development of love and compassion
spirituality.author: 14th Dalai Lama

spirituality.quote: Don’t hope that events will turn out the way you want, welcome events in whichever way they happen: this is the path to peace
spirituality.author: Epictetus

spirituality.quote: The more you let yourself go, the less others let you go
spirituality.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

spirituality.quote: A man is rich in proportion to the number of things he can afford to let alone
spirituality.author: Henry David Thoreau

spirituality.quote: There is a huge amount of freedom that comes to you when you take nothing personally
spirituality.author: Don Miguel Ruiz (The Four Agreements)

spirituality.quote: Celebration is my attitude, unconditional to what life brings
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: People have a hard time letting go of their suffering. They prefer suffering that is familiar to the unknown
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: You always own the option of having no opinion. There is never any need to get worked up or to trouble your soul about things you can’t control. These things are not asking to be judged by you. Leave them alone
spirituality.author: Marcus Aurelius

spirituality.quote: The first half of life is devoted to forming a healthy ego, the second half is going inward and letting go of it
spirituality.author: Carl Jung

spirituality.quote: It’s hard to be clear about who you are when you are carrying around a bunch of baggage from the past. I’ve learned to let go and move more quickly into the next place
spirituality.author: Angelina Jolie

spirituality.quote: Breathe. Let go. And remind yourself that this very moment is the only one you know you have for sure
spirituality.author: Oprah Winfrey

spirituality.quote: Live with purpose. Don’t let people or things around you get you down
spirituality.author: Albert Einstein

spirituality.quote: Just be, and enjoy being
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Whatever it is, let it go
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Dare to live by letting go
spirituality.author: Tom Althouse

spirituality.quote: Letting go is not giving up
spirituality.author: Mingyur Rinpoche

spirituality.quote: Let it all go, see what stays
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Learning to live is learning to let go
spirituality.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

spirituality.quote: Learning to let go is learning to accept
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Learning to accept is learning to love
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Peace is what you are capable of being
spirituality.author: Wayne Dyer

spirituality.quote: You have got to let go and let it happen
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: The greatest goodness is a peaceful mind
spirituality.author: Atiśa Dīpaṃkara Śrījñāna

spirituality.quote: Some things can only be grasped by letting go
spirituality.author: Daily Zen

spirituality.quote: Feelings are just visitors. Let them come and go
spirituality.author: Mooji

spirituality.quote: Cease striving. Then there will be transformation
spirituality.author: Zhuangzi

spirituality.quote: If you let go of your story, you get to live your life
spirituality.author: Neil Strauss

spirituality.quote: Don’t try to force anything. Let life be a deep let-go
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Never ruin a good day by thinking about a bad yesterday
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Have a mind that is open to everything, and attached to nothing
spirituality.author: Tilopa

spirituality.quote: Whatever comes, don’t push it away. When it goes, do not grieve
spirituality.author: Mooji

spirituality.quote: If you let go a little you will have a little peace. If you let go a lot you will have a lot of peace
spirituality.author: Ajahn Chah

spirituality.quote: The beautiful journey of today can only begin when we learn to let go of yesterday
spirituality.author: Steve Maraboli

spirituality.quote: Letting go doesn’t mean you give up. It means you keep going but you’re not attached to the outcome
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: We must learn to let things flow just like breath, and life will do the rest
spirituality.author: Iyanla Vanzant

spirituality.quote: If there is no contradiction whatsoever you have abundance of energy
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: Slow down, get aligned, listen to the guidance and receive miracles
spirituality.author: Gabby Bernstein

spirituality.quote: Don’t worry about the elements around you and what’s going on… You gotta get out there and get it
spirituality.author: David Goggins

spirituality.quote: Let your mind wander in the pure and simple. Be one with the infinite. Let all things take their course
spirituality.author: Zhuangzi

spirituality.quote: Forget the years, forget distinctions
spirituality.author: Leap into the boundless and make it your home! Zhuangzi

spirituality.quote: The person who trusts can relax into existence. The person who cannot trust remains tense, remains anxious, afraid
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: If you can be patient, just a little patient and allow whatever is happening, soon you will be aware of a new quality in your being
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Enlightenment is not a desire, is not a goal, is not an ambition. It is a dropping of all goals, a dropping of all desires, a dropping of all ambitions. It is just being natural. That’s what is meant by flowing
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: It is inner stillness that will save and transform the world
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Trust simply means that whatever happens we are with it, joyously, not reluctantly, not unwillingly – then you miss the whole point – but dancingly, with a song, with laughter, with love. Whatever happens is for the good
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: If it can be improved, improve it. If it must be accepted, accept it. Embracing the inevitable frees you up to tackle what is within your control
spirituality.author: The Stoic Emperor

spirituality.quote: Slow down, calm down, don’t worry, don’t hurry, trust the process
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Letting go is never easy. There is not short-cut or trick to it. You must be committed enough to your future to let go of your past. It’s not easy and it’s likely to hurt, but it is for the best
spirituality.author: Steve Maraboli

spirituality.quote: Flow with whatever may happen, and let your mind be free: Stay centered by accepting whatever you are doing. This is the ultimate
spirituality.author: Zhuangzi

spirituality.quote: Nothing in the universe can stop you from letting go and starting over
spirituality.author: Guy Finley

spirituality.quote: The day I understood everything, was the day I stopped trying to figure everything out. The day I knew peace was the day I let everything go. C. JoyBell C
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: By letting go of the banana, the monkey becomes a monk
spirituality.author: Swami Sarvapriyananda

spirituality.quote: Leave your front and back door open. Allow your thoughts to come and go. Just don’t serve them tea
spirituality.author: Shunryu Suzuki

spirituality.quote: The best skill at cards is knowing when to discard
spirituality.author: Baltasar Gracián

spirituality.quote: So much advantage in life comes from being willing to look like an idiot over the short term
spirituality.author: Shane Parrish

spirituality.quote: If you reject unfounded blame, you must also reject unjustified praise
spirituality.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

spirituality.quote: And you know, there’s less charm in life when you think about death – but it’s more peaceful
spirituality.author: Leo Tolstoy (Anna Karenina)

spirituality.quote: Our difficulty is to let go, either the past or the future, because we are frightened
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: If someone’s insults’ bother you; it is evidence that you respect him
spirituality.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

spirituality.quote: The weak need others to know their worth. The strong know their worth. The wise just do their best
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: If it isn’t good, let it die. If it doesn’t die, make it good
spirituality.author: Ajahn Chah

spirituality.quote: Freedom is just letting go of all the things I want everyone to notice about me
spirituality.author: Chrissy Stockton

spirituality.quote: For a moment, let go of all trying to understand. Let go of all understanding. Here it is
spirituality.author: Mooji

spirituality.quote: Part 1. Amor fati (Latin: "a love of fate") is a mindset that you take on for making the best out of anything that happens: Treating each and every moment – no matter how challenging – as something to be embraced, not avoided. To not only be okay with it, but love it and be better for it. So that like oxygen to a fire, obstacles and adversity become fuel for your potential
spirituality.author: Ryan Holiday

spirituality.quote: Part 2. That one wants nothing to be different, not forward, not backwards, not in all eternity. Not merely bear what is necessary, still less conceal it….but love it
spirituality.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

spirituality.quote: Part 3. A blazing fire makes flame and brightness out of everything that is thrown into it
spirituality.author: Marcus Aurelius

spirituality.quote: You’re only making a mess by trying to put things straight. You’re trying to straighten out a wiggly world and no wonder you’re in trouble
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: Every beginning has an end and every end is a new beginning
spirituality.author: Santosh Kalwar

spirituality.quote: Nothing can trouble you but your own imagination
spirituality.author: Nisargadatta Maharaj

spirituality.quote: Unconsciousness, unawareness, is the cause of attachment
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Trust is the fragrance of a silent, peaceful being. Trust is the fragrance of nothingness
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Everything you have and will ever have, you will one day lose. Your health, your family, your life. No matter how much you kick and scream and fight. Prepare yourself for that moment, accept it, and be at peace
spirituality.author: Justin Kan

spirituality.quote: Impermanence of everything is a universal constant. No matter what kind of legacy, family, foundation, or business you’ve created, one day it will disappear and no one will remember anything of your life
spirituality.author: Justin Kan

spirituality.quote: Whatever the present moment contains, accept it as if you had chosen it
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: One need not go anywhere to be blissful. One can sit silently, be alone, and be blissful
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Like a sandcastle, all is temporary. Build it, tend it, enjoy it, and when the time comes let it go
spirituality.author: Jack Cornfield

spirituality.quote: Care too little and you’ll eventually feel useless. Care too much and you’ll live in misery. Find out what’s worth suffering for
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Life will give you whatever experience is most helpful for the evolution of your consciousness
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: A flower falls, even though we love it; and a weed grows, even though we do not love it
spirituality.author: Dogen

spirituality.quote: The world is ruled by letting things take their course
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: But you yourself will not wish to be a general or senator or consul, but a free man: and there is only one way to this, to despise (care not for) the things which are not in our power
spirituality.author: Epictetus (Enchiridion)

spirituality.quote: Not coveting a single thing is the greatest gift you can give to the universe
spirituality.author: Kodo Sawaki Roshi

spirituality.quote: I don’t let go of my thoughts, I meet them with understanding, then they let go of me
spirituality.author: Byron Katie

spirituality.quote: Let life live you for a while instead of trying to make yourself live life
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: Your heart’s strength is measured by how hard it holds on. Your self-worth and faith is measured by finally letting go. However, your peace is measured by how long you don’t look back. Shannon L
spirituality.author: Alder

spirituality.quote: Everything changes. There is nothing to stick to. That is the Buddha’s most important teaching
spirituality.author: Shunryū Suzuki

spirituality.quote: Know that everything is in perfect order whether you understand it or not
spirituality.author: Valery Satterwhite

spirituality.quote: But when you let things be as they are, you will be a much happier, more balanced, compassionate person
spirituality.author: Pema Chödrön

spirituality.quote: If we learn to open our hearts, anyone, including the people who drive us crazy, can be our teacher
spirituality.author: Pema Chödrön

spirituality.quote: The mind is the ruler of the soul. It should remain unstirred by agitations of the flesh – gentle and violent ones alike. Not mingling with them, but fencing itself off and keeping those feelings in their place. When they make their way into your thoughts, through the sympathetic link between mind and body, don’t try to resist the sensation. The sensation is natural. But don’t let the mind start in with judgments, calling it "good" or "bad"
spirituality.author: Marcus Aurelius

spirituality.quote: When hungry, eat your rice; when tired close your eyes. Fools may laugh at me, but wise men will know what I mean
spirituality.author: Linji Yixuan

spirituality.quote: Learning isn’t acquiring knowledge so much as it is trimming information that has already been acquired
spirituality.author: Criss Jami

spirituality.quote: You can’t be happy if you’re not peaceful. You can’t be peaceful if you don’t let go
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: To enter the Buddha Way is to stop discriminating between good and evil and to cast aside the mind that says this is good and that is bad
spirituality.author: Dogen

spirituality.quote: No thought, no reflection, no analysis, no cultivation, no intention; let it settle itself
spirituality.author: Tilopa

spirituality.quote: In silence there is eloquence. Stop weaving and see how the pattern improves
spirituality.author: Rumi

spirituality.quote: Everything happens for you, not to you. Everything happens at exactly the right moment, neither too soon nor too late. You don’t have to like it… it’s just easier if you do
spirituality.author: Byron Katie

spirituality.quote: To me, meditation is a living relationship with the total existence that surrounds you. If you can be in love with any situation, then you are in meditation
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Instead of becoming the world’s expert on Buddhism, just let go, let go, let go
spirituality.author: Ajahn Sumedho

spirituality.quote: No desires, no goal, no seeking, no thoughts, neither obtaining, nor rejecting, nor grasping, nor letting go, being free
spirituality.author: Taisen Deshimaru

spirituality.quote: Holding on is believing that there’s only a past; letting go is knowing that there’s a future
spirituality.author: Daphne Rose Kingma

spirituality.quote: Respect yourself and others will respect you
spirituality.author: Confucius

spirituality.quote: I think the reward for conformity is that everyone likes you except yourself
spirituality.author: Rita Mae Brown

spirituality.quote: Respect yourself enough to walk away from anything that no longer serves you, grows you, or makes you happy
spirituality.author: Robert Tew

spirituality.quote: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it
spirituality.author: Bruce Lee

spirituality.quote: Character — the willingness to accept responsibility for one’s own life — is the source from which self-respect springs
spirituality.author: Joan Didion

spirituality.quote: Ego is false confidence, self-respect is true confidence
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: If you don’t care to be liked, they can’t touch you
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: If you have earned your self-respect, respect by others is a luxury; if you haven’t, respect by others is a necessity
spirituality.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

spirituality.quote: Be tolerant with others and strict with yourself
spirituality.author: Marcus Aurelius

spirituality.quote: He that respects himself is safe from others. He wears a coat of mail that none can pierce
spirituality.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

spirituality.quote: To be beautiful means to be yourself. You don’t need to be accepted by others. You need to accept yourself
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: The best gift you can give to others is your presence. The best gift you can give to yourself is perseverance
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: The greatest thing in the world is to know how to belong to oneself
spirituality.author: Michel de Montaigne

spirituality.quote: Your relationship with yourself sets the tone for every other relationship you have
spirituality.author: Robert Holden

spirituality.quote: Externally, be humble. Internally, be confident
spirituality.author: James Clear

spirituality.quote: Work to improve yourself, not prove yourself
spirituality.author: Joshua Becker

spirituality.quote: Saying yes or maybe when we mean no, cheapens our word, diminishes our sense of self-respect, and compromises our integrity
spirituality.author: Paulo Coelho

spirituality.quote: Never esteem anything as of advantage to you that will make you break your word or lose your self-respect
spirituality.author: Marcus Aurelius

spirituality.quote: It never ceases to amaze me: we all love ourselves more than other people, but care more about their opinion than our own
spirituality.author: Marcus Aurelius

spirituality.quote: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Determination, courage, self-confidence lead to success, but we should always remain humble, modest and unpretentious
spirituality.author: 14th Dalai Lama

spirituality.quote: Being honest with yourself is the highest form of self-respect. If you’re not feeling something, don’t do it
spirituality.author: Daily Zen

spirituality.quote: You become what you give your attention to…If you yourself don’t choose what thoughts and images you expose yourself to, someone else will
spirituality.author: Epictetus

spirituality.quote: Above all, don’t lie to yourself. The man who lies to himself and listens to his own lie comes to a point that he cannot distinguish the truth within him, or around him, and so loses all respect for himself and for others. And having no respect he ceases to love
spirituality.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

spirituality.quote: Just as true humor is laughter at oneself, true humanity is knowledge of oneself
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: Every relationship you have is a reflection of your relationship with your self
spirituality.author: Deepak Chopra

spirituality.quote: Make it a goal to see the best in everyone and the best will come back to you
spirituality.author: Rhonda Byrne

spirituality.quote: You are loved just for being who you are, just for existing. You don’t have to do anything to earn it. Your shortcomings, your lack of self-esteem, physical perfection, or social and economic success – none of that matters. No one can take this love away from you
spirituality.author: Ram Dass

spirituality.quote: To be nobody-but-yourself — in a world which is doing its best, night and day, to make you everybody else — means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight. E.E
spirituality.author: Cummings

spirituality.quote: True reassurance: not that one’s plans will inevitably work out, but that one’s human worth is not on the line if they don’t
spirituality.author: Alain de Botton

spirituality.quote: To express oneself honestly, not lying to oneself; that, my friend, is very hard to do
spirituality.author: Bruce Lee

spirituality.quote: Avoid the crowd. Do your own thinking independently. Be the chess player, not the chess piece
spirituality.author: Ralph Charell

spirituality.quote: Be your authentic self, not the person you think other people expect you to be
spirituality.author: Payal Kadakia

spirituality.quote: You’ll stop caring what people think about you when you realize how seldom they do
spirituality.author: David Foster Wallace

spirituality.quote: The goal is not to show how great you are to others, but how vulnerable you are to yourself
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: If everybody loves you, something is wrong. Nobody can please everybody
spirituality.author: Paulo Coelho

spirituality.quote: You can’t grow yourself unless you know yourself. John C
spirituality.author: Maxwell

spirituality.quote: Everyone should be their own biggest fan
spirituality.author: Kanye West

spirituality.quote: Self-respect. It would make me lovable
spirituality.author: Susan Sontag

spirituality.quote: If we lose love and self-respect for each other, this is how we finally die
spirituality.author: Maya Angelou

spirituality.quote: Your sense of self-worth comes from you alone — never the opinion of others
spirituality.author: Robert Greene

spirituality.quote: Be not the slave of your own past – plunge into the sublime seas, dive deep, and swim far, so you shall come back with new self-respect, with new power, and with an advanced experience that shall explain and overlook the old
spirituality.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

spirituality.quote: If you set out to cheat and deceive others you’ll be tense and anxious in case you’re found out. But if you live your life and conduct your business on the basis of truth and honesty, it gives you a sense of satisfaction and self-confidence that is also a source of inner strength
spirituality.author: 14th Dalai Lama

spirituality.quote: Success comes from curiosity, concentration, perseverance and self-criticism
spirituality.author: Albert Einstein

spirituality.quote: A man can be himself only so long as he is alone, and if he does not love solitude, he will not love freedom, for it is only when he is alone that he is really free

spirituality.quote: While we are still alive, we have to discover ourselves, understand ourselves, and express ourselves
spirituality.author: Bruce Lee

spirituality.quote: We forfeit three quarters of ourselves in order to be like other people
spirituality.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

spirituality.quote: Let thy vices die before thee
spirituality.author: Benjamin Franklin

spirituality.quote: Love your neighbor; yet don’t pull down your hedge
spirituality.author: Benjamin Franklin

spirituality.quote: Deny self for self’s sake
spirituality.author: Benjamin Franklin

spirituality.quote: To be a human being among people and to remain one forever, no matter in what circumstances, not to grow despondent and not to lose heart — that’s what life is all about, that’s its task
spirituality.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

spirituality.quote: Only by self-respect will you compel others to respect you
spirituality.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

spirituality.quote: Don’t put yourself down just to avoid criticism, to please others, or to show your "kindness". The world needs light, not mediocrity
spirituality.author: Paulo Coelho

spirituality.quote: We can discover truth for ourselves only when we do not depend on another; no specialist can give us the right answer
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: Do not fear to be eccentric in opinion, for every opinion now accepted was once eccentric
spirituality.author: Bertrand Russell

spirituality.quote: If you have truly attained wholeness, everything will flock to you
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Never trade respect for attention
spirituality.author: Mel Robbins

spirituality.quote: Self-esteem is earned
spirituality.author: Rhonda Byrne

spirituality.quote: Renounce all external authority
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Stop quitting when it gets hard
spirituality.author: Tom Bilyeu

spirituality.quote: Real power comes from being real
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Never lose yourself to find others
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Self-respect knows no considerations
spirituality.author: Mahatma Gandhi

spirituality.quote: Speak the truth or at least don’t lie
spirituality.author: Jordan Peterson

spirituality.quote: You don’t need perfection, only progress
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: If you want to earn respect, just be honest
spirituality.author: Preethi Kasireddy

spirituality.quote: They will call you arrogant for having self-respect. Thibaut (Do it anyway
By being kind to ourselves, we become kind to others
spirituality.author: Pema Chödrön

spirituality.quote: Society rewards confidence. Nature rewards knowledge
spirituality.author: James Pierce

spirituality.quote: The more respect you give to others, the more you earn
spirituality.author: Adam Grant

spirituality.quote: No one is going to value you more than you value yourself
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Be honest with who you are. Be honest with who you are not
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Instead of saving humanity, every person should save himself
spirituality.author: Alexander Herzen

spirituality.quote: You are often your own harshest authority. Let yourself be free
spirituality.author: Daily Zen

spirituality.quote: Who you are is defined by the values you are willing to struggle for
spirituality.author: Mark Manson

spirituality.quote: Self-control is the chief element in self-respect, and self-respect is the chief element in courage
spirituality.author: Thucydides

spirituality.quote: He who loves the world as his body may be entrusted with the empire
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching, Amazon book)

spirituality.quote: The person who deserves your gratitude more than anyone else is you
spirituality.author: Rhonda Byrne

spirituality.quote: Have faith in yourselves, and stand up on that faith and be strong; that is what we need
spirituality.author: Swami Vivekananda

spirituality.quote: Step into the fire of self-discovery. This fire will not burn you, it will only burn what you are not

spirituality.quote: What is truly ambitious is to face life and proceed with quiet confidence in spite of the distractions

spirituality.quote: Loving yourself isn’t the first step toward accomplishing anything. Many people have accomplished things and still find no peace with themselves. For them, any accomplishment will never be enough. But if you do love yourself, then any accomplishment is like icing on the cake

spirituality.quote: The most important, difficult and rewarding thing to work on is yourself
spirituality.author: Sven Schnieders

spirituality.quote: Work on yourself. Build the confidence and gusto required to rise above your mental baggage

spirituality.quote: Comfort is what holds you back, being yourself is what sets you free
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: When you learn to close your eyes, wait and listen, silence reveals a beautiful thing: yourself

spirituality.quote: Have good trust in yourself … not in the One that you think you should be, but in the One that you are

spirituality.quote: Real pleasure comes from overcoming challenges, feeling confidence in your abilities, and experiencing the power this brings
spirituality.author: Robert Greene

spirituality.quote: Better "wrong" alone than "right" with the herd
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: A thought is harmless unless we believe it

spirituality.quote: If you wanna be liked, your only option is to never speak. Otherwise, get used to being hated

spirituality.quote: Self-knowledge will bring you calm. With calm, you’ll do the right thing. Sometimes, by doing the right thing, you’ll push some people. Do it anyway

spirituality.quote: Beware of people making you feel guilty. That is how they control you

spirituality.quote: The #1 cause of having no self-respect is having no self-control

spirituality.quote: If you want to be successful in life, respect one rule: never lie to yourself

spirituality.quote: Quit wishing you were something different. There’s no mistakes. You’re not faulty. You have been fearfully and wonderfully made

spirituality.quote: The world is full of people who have stopped listening to themselves or have listened only to their neighbors to learn what they ought to do, how they ought to behave, and what the values are that they should be living for

spirituality.quote: When you do not treat yourself the way you want others to treat you, you can never change the way things are

spirituality.quote: The very things you cannot bring yourself to consider reveal the lies you have let yourself believe

spirituality.quote: You can only lose something that you have, but you cannot lose something that you are

spirituality.quote: As long as I’m so afraid of being alone, I’ll never be real. I’m hiding from myself

spirituality.quote: Only in true stillness can we see ourselves most clearly

spirituality.quote: You can only be as authentic as you are self-aware

spirituality.quote: Still your waters. If you’re constantly busy, you can’t learn about yourself

spirituality.quote: High self-confidence is a positive internal dialogue. This is what most strive for. Perfect self-confidence is the complete absence of internal dialogue. Puzzlingly few people are interested in this

spirituality.quote: More helpful than any advice is an unflinching examination of oneself

spirituality.quote: Let them call you what they want. You don’t have to play the part they want you to play
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: The moon doesn’t have to be full to be loved. Neither do you

spirituality.quote: A tree doesn’t have to be straight to be loved. Neither do you

spirituality.quote: The more we value things, the less we value ourselves
spirituality.author: Bruce Lee

spirituality.quote: As you face loss, frustration, hurt, and conflict….have respect for yourself, and patience and compassion

spirituality.quote: Be gentle with yourself. You are doing the best you can

spirituality.quote: Speak with confidence, the world needs your light

spirituality.quote: Every woman that finally figured out her worth, has picked up her suitcases of pride and boarded a flight to freedom, which landed in the valley of change. Shannon L

spirituality.quote: When you are compassionate toward yourself, you allow yourself to be vulnerable. And that’s incredibly important. Your authentic truth is your magnificence. Your willingness to let the world see you in truth is your greatest contribution

spirituality.quote: Some people treat you like they don’t know your value. Make sure your response doesn’t support the lie
