spirituality.quote: Your value, your self-worth doesn’t come from another person
spirituality.author: Joel Osteen

spirituality.quote: True belief in yourself is the ultimate determining factor if you make it or not
spirituality.author: David Goggins

spirituality.quote: The most important conversations you’ll ever have are the ones you’ll have with yourself
spirituality.author: David Goggins (Can’t Hurt Me, Amazon book)

spirituality.quote: You must strive to find your own voice. Because the longer you wait to begin, the less likely you are to find it at all. Thoreau said, ‘Most men lead lives of quiet desperation.’ Don’t be resigned to that

spirituality.quote: You will only ever be taken as seriously as you take yourself
spirituality.author: Jack Butcher

spirituality.quote: Never apologize for being yourself
spirituality.author: Paulo Coelho

spirituality.quote: Be yourself. Everyone else is taken
spirituality.author: Oscar Wilde

spirituality.quote: When you are content to be simply yourself and don’t compare or compete, everybody will respect you
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching)

spirituality.quote: The reward for conformity is that everyone likes you but yourself
spirituality.author: Rita Mae Brown

spirituality.quote: Existence wants you to be you
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not
spirituality.author: André Gide

spirituality.quote: Some people around you will not understand your journey. They don’t need to; it’s not for them
spirituality.author: Paulo Coelho

spirituality.quote: You must not be afraid of your uniqueness and you must care less and less what people think of you
spirituality.author: Robert Greene

spirituality.quote: No one ever made a difference by being like everyone else
spirituality.author: Buckminster Fuller

spirituality.quote: We are the ones we have been waiting for
spirituality.author: Alice Walker

spirituality.quote: When someone is properly grounded in life, they shouldn’t have to look outside themselves for approval
spirituality.author: Epictetus

spirituality.quote: Don’t believe you have to be like anybody to be somebody

spirituality.quote: Don’t let other people decide who you are
spirituality.author: Bob Goff

spirituality.quote: He who obeys, does not listen to himself
spirituality.author: Friedrich Nietzsche (Thus Spoke Zarathustra)

spirituality.quote: You change the world by being yourself

spirituality.quote: If you desire to make a difference in the world, you must be different from the world. Elaine S
spirituality.author: Dalton

spirituality.quote: What is the seal of liberation? No longer being ashamed in front of oneself

spirituality.quote: Don’t chase people. Be yourself, do your own thing and work hard. The right people – the ones who really belong in your life – will come to you, and stay

spirituality.quote: When you see a mob doing something, it should make you less likely to do it yourself, not more likely
spirituality.author: Paul Graham

spirituality.quote: A dead thing can go with the stream, but only a living thing can go against it. G.K
spirituality.author: Chesterton (The Everlasting Man)

spirituality.quote: Be in the world, but don’t let the world be in you. Love, and yet don’t be lost in it. Relate, and yet be alone, utterly alone. Know perfectly well that all relationship is a game: play the game and play it as beautifully as possible and as skillfully as possible

spirituality.quote: Every man who says frankly and fully what he thinks is so far doing a public service. We should be grateful to him for attacking most unsparingly our most cherished opinions
spirituality.author: John Stuart Mill (On Liberty)

spirituality.quote: There’s a point, around the age of twenty, when you have to choose whether to be like everybody else the rest of your life, or to make a virtue of your peculiarities. Ursula K
spirituality.author: Le Guin (The Dispossessed)

spirituality.quote: The world just wants your authentic truth
spirituality.author: Gabby Bernstein

spirituality.quote: Can you remember who you were, before the world told you who you should be?
spirituality.author: Charles Bukowski

spirituality.quote: You, being yourself, unknowingly inspire others to be themselves
spirituality.author: Mooji

spirituality.quote: The imitator dooms himself to hopeless mediocrity
spirituality.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

spirituality.quote: The most important consequence of self-sufficiency is freedom
spirituality.author: Epicurus

spirituality.quote: Even if one is neither vain nor self-obsessed, it is so extraordinary to be oneself – exactly oneself and no one else
spirituality.author: Simone de Beauvoir

spirituality.quote: Can you live completely without ambition, completely without ever comparing yourself with another?
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: To exist is to change, to change is to mature, to mature is to go on creating oneself endlessly
spirituality.author: Henri Bergson

spirituality.quote: Do not live to satisfy the expectations of others
spirituality.author: Ichiro Kishimi (The Courage to Be Disliked)

spirituality.quote: Be nobody’s darling; Be an outcast. Take the contradictions of your life and wrap around you like a shawl, to parry stones, to keep you warm

spirituality.quote: When you walk the walk, whether successful or not, you feel more indifferent and robust to people’s opinion, freer, more real

spirituality.quote: Large groups are no place for smart people

spirituality.quote: Just stick to your principles. And rest assured that, if you remain true to them, the same people who made fun of you will come to admire you

spirituality.quote: A rebel is the one who lives totally according to his own light and risks everything else for his ultimate value of freedom

spirituality.quote: The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud

spirituality.quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to reform (or pause and reflect)
spirituality.author: Mark Twain

spirituality.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don’t matter and those who matter don’t mind. Dr

spirituality.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others
spirituality.author: Mahatma Gandhi

spirituality.quote: Conformity is the jailer of freedom and the enemy of growth. John F

spirituality.quote: Success isn’t about how your life looks to others. It’s about how it feels to you. That’s what it means to be true to yourself
spirituality.author: Michelle Obama

spirituality.quote: All I want to do is be more like me and be less like you
spirituality.author: Linkin Park (Numb)

spirituality.quote: I pay no attention whatever to anybody’s praise or blame. I simply follow my own feelings
spirituality.author: Mozart

spirituality.quote: This above all: to thine own self be true
spirituality.author: William Shakespeare (Hamlet)

spirituality.quote: Subservience of any kind is death to the spirit
spirituality.author: Alice Walker

spirituality.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment
spirituality.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

spirituality.quote: They laugh at me because I’m different; I laugh at them because they’re all the same
spirituality.author: Kurt Cobain

spirituality.quote: Never forget what you are, for surely the world will not. Make it your strength. Then it can never be your weakness. Armour yourself in it, and it will never be used to hurt you. Tyrion Lannister (George R. R
spirituality.author: Martin, Games of Thrones)

spirituality.quote: My philosophy is: It’s none of my business what people say of me and think of me. I am what I am and I do what I do. I expect nothing and accept everything. And it makes life so much easier
spirituality.author: Anthony Hopkins

spirituality.quote: One must know oneself. Even if it does not help in finding truth, at least it helps in running one’s life, and nothing is more proper
spirituality.author: Blaise Pascal

spirituality.quote: You were born God’s original. Try not to become someone’s copy
spirituality.author: Marian Wright Edelman

spirituality.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are. E
spirituality.author: E Cummings

spirituality.quote: I wore black because I liked it. I still do, and wearing it still means something to me. It’s still my symbol of rebellion – against a stagnant status quo, against our hypocritical houses of God, against people whose minds are closed to others’ ideas
spirituality.author: Johnny Cash

spirituality.quote: I would rather die having spoken in my manner, than speak in your manner and live
spirituality.author: Socrates

spirituality.quote: Not till we have lost the world do we begin to find ourselves
spirituality.author: Henry David Thoreau

spirituality.quote: The superior man follows nobody else’s path
spirituality.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

spirituality.quote: Become who you are
spirituality.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

spirituality.quote: Conformity gets you nowhere
spirituality.author: Neil Strauss

spirituality.quote: Spontaneity is total sincerity
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: Our own life has to be our message
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: I’d rather be a freak than a clone
spirituality.author: Joanne Harris

spirituality.quote: Intuition is allergic to conformity
spirituality.author: Bill Masur

spirituality.quote: Appear as you are, be as you appear
spirituality.author: Rumi

spirituality.quote: It is a waste of energy to follow anybody
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: Stop letting the world keep score for you
spirituality.author: Shane Parrish

spirituality.quote: Train yourself to take nothing personally
spirituality.author: Robert Greene

spirituality.quote: You are who you are when nobody’s watching
spirituality.author: Stephen Fry

spirituality.quote: What the world craves is authenticity
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Curiosity is insubordination in its purest form
spirituality.author: Vladimir Nabokov

spirituality.quote: Do not commit to any side or cause but yourself
spirituality.author: Robert Greene

spirituality.quote: To lead others, one must find one’s own direction
spirituality.author: Zhuangzi

spirituality.quote: You are what existence wants you to be. Just relax
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: We have to wake up. We have to refuse to be a clone
spirituality.author: Alice Walker

spirituality.quote: Follow your inner moonlight; don’t hide the madness
spirituality.author: Allen Ginsberg

spirituality.quote: Let go of who you think you’re supposed to be; embrace who you are
spirituality.author: Brené Brown

spirituality.quote: Believe in yourself and you will be unstoppable
spirituality.author: Conor McGregor

spirituality.quote: I am not what happened to me, I am what I choose to become
spirituality.author: Carl Jung

spirituality.quote: So whatever you want to do, just do it…Making a damn fool of yourself is absolutely essential
spirituality.author: Gloria Steinem

spirituality.quote: Accept right now that you are magnificent. Being your real, true, authentic self is what’s most awesome about you
spirituality.author: Gabby Bernstein

spirituality.quote: Keep being yourself inside you. Keep visualizing what you are aiming for in life. Be patient and know that you will get what you want one day
spirituality.author: Yoko Ono

spirituality.quote: It has often been said that a reformation should begin with each man reforming himself
spirituality.author: Søren Kierkegaard

spirituality.quote: You must always be prepared to place a bet on yourself, on your future, by heading in a direction that others seem to fear
spirituality.author: Robert Greene

spirituality.quote: Understand: you are one of a kind. Your character traits are a kind of chemical mix that will never be repeated in history. There are ideas unique to you, a specific rhythm and perspective that are your strengths, not your weaknesses. You must not be afraid of your uniqueness
spirituality.author: Robert Greene

spirituality.quote: The reasonable man adapts himself to the world; the unreasonable one persists in trying to adapt the world to himself. Therefore all progress depends on the unreasonable man
spirituality.author: George Bernard Shaw

spirituality.quote: You want to be uncommon amongst uncommon people. Period
spirituality.author: David Goggins

spirituality.quote: You eliminate competition by being yourself
spirituality.author: Dan Go

spirituality.quote: The most contrarian thing of all is not to oppose the crowd but to think for yourself
spirituality.author: Peter Thiel

spirituality.quote: If you can see your path laid out in front of you step by step, you know it’s not your path. Your own path you make with every step you take. That’s why it’s your path
spirituality.author: Joseph Campbell

spirituality.quote: When you are in your own lane there is no traffic
spirituality.author: Ashley France

spirituality.quote: Stop caring about impact and just be the best version of you possible – then you’ll naturally have an impact
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: "Finding yourself" is not really how it works. You aren’t a ten-dollar bill in last winter’s coat pocket. You are also not lost. Your true self is right there, buried under cultural conditioning, other people’s opinions, and inaccurate conclusions you drew as a kid that became your beliefs about who you are. "Finding yourself" is actually returning to yourself. An unlearning, an excavation, a remembering who you were before the world got its hands on you
spirituality.author: Emily McDowell

spirituality.quote: I’m going to do what I want to do. I’m going to be who I really am. And I’m going to figure out what that is
spirituality.author: Stephen Chbosky

spirituality.quote: Find your place on the planet. Dig in, and take responsibility from there
spirituality.author: Gary Snyder

spirituality.quote: You create yourself moment to moment. You are not born as a fixed entity, but only as a infinite potentiality
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: I teach you rebellion! Come out of the masses. Stand alone like a lion and live your life according to your own light
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: You should never sacrifice what you could be for what you are
spirituality.author: Jordan Peterson

spirituality.quote: Only dead fish go with the flow
spirituality.author: Derek Sivers

spirituality.quote: Be the person your dog thinks you are
spirituality.author: Ricky Gervais

spirituality.quote: I’m not confused. I’m just well mixed
spirituality.author: Robert Frost

spirituality.quote: This isn’t life in the fast lane, it’s life in the oncoming traffic
spirituality.author: Terry Pratchett

spirituality.quote: Trying to define yourself is like trying to bite your own teeth
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: It’s hard to be a diamond in a rhinestone world
spirituality.author: Dolly Parton

spirituality.quote: If you don’t say what you think then you kill your unborn self
spirituality.author: Jordan Peterson

spirituality.quote: Wanting to be someone else is a waste of who you
spirituality.author: Kurt Cobain

spirituality.quote: If you worry about your reputation you don’t deserve to have one
spirituality.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

spirituality.quote: The simplest means of procuring protection from other men is security of quiet solitude and withdrawal from the mass of people
spirituality.author: Epicurus

spirituality.quote: Only those who can accept their own annihilation can have the courage to be true individuals
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: People follow the latest fashion and think they’re being rebels. In reality they’re clueless conformists. Rebellion is essentially of the soul. It has nothing to do with outward appearance. Real rebels are inwardly oriented. They don’t like to attract the attention of masses
spirituality.author: The Ancient Sage

spirituality.quote: The worst thing that can happen to a man is to become civilized
spirituality.author: David Goggins

spirituality.quote: If you don’t set your own values, other people will
spirituality.author: Shane Parrish

spirituality.quote: The effect of life in society is to complicate and confuse our existence, making us forget who we really are by causing us to become obsessed with what we are not
spirituality.author: Zhuangzi

spirituality.quote: Humans are born free, but habituated by society to obey by default. Flex your freedom muscle by questioning instead of blindly following authority
spirituality.author: Justin Kan

spirituality.quote: The duty of the individual is to accept no rule, to be the initiator of his own acts, to be responsible. Only if he does so will the society live, and change, and adapt, and survive. We are not subjects of a State founded upon law, but members of a society formed upon revolution. Revolution is our obligation: our hope of evolution. Ursula K
spirituality.author: Le Guin (The Dispossessed)

spirituality.quote: The world is so busy telling us who we should be, that we forget who we are
spirituality.author: Bill Masur

spirituality.quote: Nothing is yet in its true form. C.S
spirituality.author: Lewis

spirituality.quote: The more labels you have for yourself, the dumber they make you
spirituality.author: Paul Graham

spirituality.quote: It’s a simple fact of life: if you want to do something incredible, something that makes you stand out above the rest, then you have to become comfortable being different–that means being misunderstood, criticized, even hated
spirituality.author: Mark Manson

spirituality.quote: As we go through life we gradually discover who we are, but the more we discover, the more we lose ourselves
spirituality.author: Haruki Murakami (Colorless Tsukuru Tazaki and His Years of Pilgrimage)

spirituality.quote: The tighter you cling to your current identity, the harder it becomes to grow beyond it
spirituality.author: James Clear

spirituality.quote: If they could they would not allow you to think for yourself
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: To become what one is, one must not have the faintest idea what one is
spirituality.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

spirituality.quote: Society tames the wolf into a dog. And man is the most domesticated animal of all
spirituality.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

spirituality.quote: Consult your conscience; rather than popular opinion
spirituality.author: Publius Syrus

spirituality.quote: One has to be a teacher to oneself and a disciple of oneself; there is no authority, there is only understanding
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: Within you, there is a stillness and a sanctuary to which you can retreat at anytime and be yourself
spirituality.author: Hermann Hesse (Siddhartha)

spirituality.quote: If you know your being, there is no question of becoming. All that you could have ever imagined to become you already are
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Man has to create himself. He is not ready-made, he is not given. And the creation has to be a self-creation – nobody else can make you
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Remember: no attachment should grow, no clinging should grow. They are all against your independence, your freedom, your individuality
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Just keep coming home to yourself. You are the one you’ve been waiting for
spirituality.author: Byron Katie

spirituality.quote: I prefer to be true to myself, even at the hazard of incurring the ridicule of others, rather than to be false, and to incur my own abhorrence
spirituality.author: Frederick Douglass

spirituality.quote: I have no responsibility to live up to what others expect of me. That’s their mistake, not my failing
spirituality.author: Richard Feynman

spirituality.quote: The most important things in life are measured internally. You have an inner scoreboard. Playing to someone else’s scoreboard is easy. But when you look up at the end after winning, you’ll feel empty as you discover you won the wrong game. Play your own game
spirituality.author: Shane Parrish

spirituality.quote: You enter the forest at the darkest point, where there is no path. Where there is a way or path, it is someone else’s path. You are not on your own path. If you follow someone else’s way, you are not going to realize your potential
spirituality.author: Joseph Campbell (The Hero’s Journey)

spirituality.quote: Self-understanding is the scariest path, hence why only the brave will reach it
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Cherish that which is within you, and shut off that which is without
spirituality.author: Zhuangzi

spirituality.quote: This balance between tribe and individuality, community and uniqueness, was a surprise in a world that makes us think we have to make a choice between them
spirituality.author: Gloria Steinem (My Life on the Road)

spirituality.quote: Exercise authority over yourself, or you will be made to bow to the authority of others. Be your own lord and master
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: A path of personal conviction offers great challenges and profound rewards. The journey may lead towards the tribe or away from it. The way of purpose is alive with a sense of intrinsic meaning. This is the rocky and uncrowded road of the self-responsible individual
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: He who tries to shine dims his own light. He who defines himself can’t know who he really is
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching)

spirituality.quote: Waking up to who you are requires letting go of who you imagine yourself to be
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: In the real journey of life, your own intuition is your only teacher
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Don’t be afraid to shine bright, be joyful and honor the whole truth of who you are
spirituality.author: Gabby Bernstein

spirituality.quote: The minute you stop caring what others think, is the minute you start being yourself
spirituality.author: Gabby Bernstein

spirituality.quote: Never label yourself. The less you define yourself by, the less constraints to growth
spirituality.author: Derek Sivers

spirituality.quote: We all have different gifts, so we all have different ways of saying to the world who we are
spirituality.author: Fred Rogers

spirituality.quote: Own your truth and tell your story. It’s time to embrace your unique soul signature
spirituality.author: Panache Desai

spirituality.quote: Focus on being true to yourself and self-sufficient, and you’ll eventually find like-minded people
spirituality.author: Ed Latimore

spirituality.quote: We have to dare to be ourselves, however frightening or strange that self may prove to be
spirituality.author: May Sarton

spirituality.quote: People tend to take pride in who they are. And that’s a bad idea, because that stops you from becoming who you could be. Because, if you’re proud of who you are, you won’t let that go when it’s necessary; you won’t step away from it
spirituality.author: Jordan Peterson

spirituality.quote: I wanted to become me, totally me. The more me, the better. I instinctively knew this and I was right
spirituality.author: Phyllis Diller

spirituality.quote: If you don’t like what someone has to say, argue with them
spirituality.author: Noam Chomsky

spirituality.quote: I’m not in this world to live up to your expectations and you’re not in this world to live up to mine
spirituality.author: Bruce Lee

spirituality.quote: You have your way. I have my way. As for the right way, the correct way, and the only way, it does not exist
spirituality.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

spirituality.quote: The apple doesn’t fall far from the tree. But fortunately we are not apples, so we always have the option of getting up and moving as far away from the tree as we want
spirituality.author: Neil Strauss

spirituality.quote: Men have called me mad; but the question is not yet settled, whether madness is or is not the loftiest intelligence
spirituality.author: Edgar Allan Poe

spirituality.quote: Respect your uniqueness, and drop comparison. Relax into your being
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Be yourself and let others be themselves and this life, this planet, can become the lotus paradise here-now
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: People cannot change who you are and what you were born to be
spirituality.author: Iyanla Vanzant

spirituality.quote: When you have something to say, silence is a lie
spirituality.author: Jordan Peterson

spirituality.quote: There’s a rebel lying deep in my soul. Anytime anybody tells me the trend is such and such, I go the opposite direction. I hate the idea of trends. I hate imitation; I have a reverence for individuality
spirituality.author: Clint Eastwood (Wild Open Spaces)

spirituality.quote: There’s a whole category of people who miss out by not allowing themselves to be weird enough
spirituality.author: Alain de Botton

spirituality.quote: Do not accept the roles that society foists on you. Re-create yourself by forging a new identity, one that commands attention and never bores the audience. Be the master of your own image rather than letting others define if for you
spirituality.author: Robert Greene

spirituality.quote: Everybody is identical in their secret unspoken belief that way deep down they are different from everyone else
spirituality.author: David Foster Wallace (Infinite Jest)

spirituality.quote: As much as I live I shall not imitate them or hate myself for being different to them
spirituality.author: Orhan Pamuk (Snow)

spirituality.quote: A flower does not think of competing to the flower next to it. It just blooms
spirituality.author: Sensei Ogui (Zen Shin)

spirituality.quote: One must shed the bad taste of wanting to agree with many
spirituality.author: Friedrich Nietzsche (Beyond Good and Evil)

spirituality.quote: When a hundred men stand together, each of them loses his mind and gets another one
spirituality.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

spirituality.quote: The individual has always had to struggle to keep from being overwhelmed by the tribe. If you try it, you will be lonely often, and sometimes frightened. But no price is too high to pay for the privilege of owning yourself
spirituality.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

spirituality.quote: To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best, night and day, to make you everybody else means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight; and never stop fighting. E. E
spirituality.author: Cummings

spirituality.quote: If you change the way you behave for the sole purpose of being liked, you will probably end up hating the person you have become
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: We are in a culture that demands authenticity from others….then punishes them when their authenticity doesn’t conform to the norms of the culture
spirituality.author: Neil Strauss

spirituality.quote: Tension means you want to be something else which you are not
spirituality.author: Osho (The Book of Secrets)

spirituality.quote: You are being taught everything, but you are not being taught to be yourself. This is the ugliest form of society possible, because it makes everybody miserable
spirituality.author: Osho (Joy: The Happiness That Comes from Within)

spirituality.quote: Listening so much to others and conforming our behavior to them, we slowly lose a sense of our uniqueness and the ability to think for ourselves. The only solution is to develop self-awareness and a superior understanding of the changes that occur in us in groups
spirituality.author: Robert Greene

spirituality.quote: A contrarian isn’t one who always objects – that’s a conformist of a different sort. A contrarian reasons independently, from the ground up, and resists pressure to conform
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: The moment I figure out something is a waste of time, I leave immediately
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: The most loving parents and relatives commit murder with smiles on their faces. They force us to destroy the person we really are: a subtle kind of murder
spirituality.author: Jim Morrison

spirituality.quote: The worst curse to befall anyone is stagnation, a banal existence, the quiet desperation that comes out of a need for conformity
spirituality.author: Deepak Chopra (The Return of Merlin)

spirituality.quote: It is better for an exceptional individual to be alone (and in the company of great men of the past and present through their books, etc) than to be in the mediocrizing influence of those around him. A genius is nourished by his solitary rebellion against the ways of society
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: All great souls are rebellious at heart. He who is a conformist is doomed to mediocrity
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: It is only the man who walks alone that is able to reach the highest of heights. For he has come to see with pristine clarity that every possible influence from society and its people can only shrink his vision and narrow his stride
spirituality.author: Kapil Gupta

spirituality.quote: If you are ever tempted to look for outside approval, realize that you have compromised your integrity. If you need a witness, be your own
spirituality.author: Epictetus

spirituality.quote: Part 1. In this age, the mere example of non-conformity, the mere refusal to bend the knee to custom, is itself a service. Precisely because the tyranny of opinion is such as to make eccentricity a reproach, it is desirable, in order to break through that tyranny, that people should be eccentric
spirituality.author: John Stuart Mill (On Liberty)

spirituality.quote: Part 2. Eccentricity has always abounded when and where strength of character has abounded; and the amount of eccentricity in a society has generally been proportional to the amount of genius, mental vigor, and moral courage which it contained. That so few now dare to be eccentric, marks the chief danger of the time
spirituality.author: John Stuart Mill (On Liberty)

spirituality.quote: My kids are starting to notice I’m a little different from the other dads. "Why don’t you have a straight job like everyone else?" they asked me the other day. I told them this story: In the forest, there was a crooked tree and a straight tree. Every day, the straight tree would say to the crooked tree, "Look at me…I’m tall, and I’m straight, and I’m handsome. Look at you…you’re all crooked and bent over. No one wants to look at you." And they grew up in that forest together. And then one day the loggers came, and they saw the crooked tree and the straight tree, and they said, "Just cut the straight trees and leave the rest." So the loggers turned all the straight trees into lumber and toothpicks and paper. And the crooked tree is still there, growing stronger and stranger every day
spirituality.author: Tom Waits

spirituality.quote: When you realize nothing is lacking, the whole world belongs to you
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: What the superior man seeks is in himself; what the small man seeks is in others
spirituality.author: Confucius

spirituality.quote: To seek is to suffer. To seek nothing is bliss
spirituality.author: Bodhidharma

spirituality.quote: Mind is like a mad monkey
spirituality.author: Sathya Sai Baba

spirituality.quote: Wise men don’t judge – they seek to understand
spirituality.author: Wei Wu Wei

spirituality.quote: When thoughts arise, then do all things arise. When thoughts vanish, then do all things vanish
spirituality.author: Huang Po

spirituality.quote: Wherever you are, it’s the place you need to be
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: The noble-minded are calm and steady. Little people are forever fussing and fretting
spirituality.author: Confucius

spirituality.quote: Rest and be kind, you don’t have to prove anything
spirituality.author: Jack Kerouac

spirituality.quote: Nothing ever goes away until it has taught us what we need to know
spirituality.author: Pema Chödrön

spirituality.quote: Only the hand that erases can write the true thing
spirituality.author: Meister Eckhart

spirituality.quote: Where can I find a man who has forgotten words so I can talk with him?
spirituality.author: Zhuangzi

spirituality.quote: When we discover that the truth is already in us, we are all at once our original selves
spirituality.author: Dogen

spirituality.quote: Life is a balance of holding on and letting go
spirituality.author: Rumi

spirituality.quote: Wherever you are, be there totally
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: I live by letting things happen
spirituality.author: Dogen

spirituality.quote: Forget the years, forget distinctions. Leap into the boundless and make it your home
spirituality.author: Zhuangzi

spirituality.quote: Before enlightenment; chop wood, carry water. After enlightenment; chop wood, carry water
spirituality.author: Buddha

spirituality.quote: Who you are is always right
spirituality.author: Ming-Dao Deng

spirituality.quote: The search for happiness is one of the chief sources of unhappiness
spirituality.author: Eric Hoffer

spirituality.quote: And when they played they really played. And when they worked they really worked. Dr
spirituality.author: Seuss

spirituality.quote: Do not seek the truth, only cease to cherish your opinions
spirituality.author: Seng-ts’an

spirituality.quote: One loses joy and happiness in the attempt to possess them
spirituality.author: Masanobu Fukuoka

spirituality.quote: Education breeds confidence. Confidence breeds hope. Hope breeds peace
spirituality.author: Confucius

spirituality.quote: Relax. Nothing is under control
spirituality.author: Adi Da

spirituality.quote: Still your waters
spirituality.author: Josh Waitzkin

spirituality.quote: Relax. Nothing’s missing
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Peace of mind is that mental condition in which you have accepted the worst
spirituality.author: Lin Yutang

spirituality.quote: Learn to be comfortable in adversity but most importantly, learn to be comfortable when you’re bored
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: The mind of the beginner is empty, free of the habits of the expert, ready to accept, to doubt, and open to all the possibilities
spirituality.author: Shunryu Suzuki (Zen Mind, Beginner’s Mind by Shunryu Suzuki, Amazon book)

spirituality.quote: The place to improve the world is first in one’s own heart and head and hands. Robert M
spirituality.author: Pirsig (Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance)

spirituality.quote: Empty your mind, be formless. Shapeless, like water. If you put water into a cup, it becomes the cup. You put water into a bottle and it becomes the bottle. You put it in a teapot, it becomes the teapot. Now, water can flow or it can crash. Be water, my friend
spirituality.author: Bruce Lee

spirituality.quote: Everything that happens to you is a form of instruction if you pay attention
spirituality.author: Robert Greene

spirituality.quote: I don’t mind what happens. That is the essence of inner freedom
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: The less you try to impress, the more peaceful you can be
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: If you are depressed, you are living in the past. If you are anxious, you are living in the future. If you are at peace, you are living in the present
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Do you have the patience to wait until your mud settles and the water is clear?
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: When one first seeks the truth, one separates oneself from it
spirituality.author: Dogen

spirituality.quote: Man suffers only because he takes seriously what the gods made for fun
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: Muddy water is best cleared by leaving it alone
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: Every experience is a lesson. Every loss is a gain
spirituality.author: Sathya Sai Baba

spirituality.quote: Zen is an effort to become alert and awake
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: In Zen we have no gurus
spirituality.author: Frederick Lenz

spirituality.quote: Zen teaches nothing; it merely enables us to wake up and become aware. It does not teach, it points. D.T
spirituality.author: Suzuki

spirituality.quote: Zen in it’s essence is the art of seeing into the nature of one’s being, and it points the way from bondage to freedom. D.T
spirituality.author: Suzuki

spirituality.quote: The practice of Zen is forgetting the self in the act of uniting with something
spirituality.author: Koun Yamada

spirituality.quote: The true purpose [of Zen] is to see things as they are, to observe things as they are, and to let everything go as it goes
spirituality.author: Shunryu Suzuki

spirituality.quote: Zen practice is to open up our small mind
spirituality.author: Shunryu Suzuki

spirituality.quote: Zen is not a religion. There is no room for a cult. There is no dependence on a teacher. There is only learning how to use your own mind and making it strong
spirituality.author: Frederick Lenz

spirituality.quote: Zen teaches that if we can open up to the inevitability of our demise, we can begin to transform and lighten up about it
spirituality.author: Allen Klein

spirituality.quote: Zen is a liberation from time. For if we open our eyes and see clearly, it becomes obvious that there is no other time than this instant, and that the past and the future are abstractions without any concrete reality
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: Zen is a path of liberation. It liberates you. It is freedom from the first step to the last. You are not required to follow any rules; you are required to find out your own rules and your own life in the light of awareness
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Zen is not some kind of excitement, but concentration on our usual everyday routine
spirituality.author: Shunryu Suzuki

spirituality.quote: Zen is not an art, it’s not a religion. It’s a realisation
spirituality.author: Gene Clark

spirituality.quote: To be wronged is nothing unless you continue to remember it
spirituality.author: Confucius

spirituality.quote: If you chase two rabbits, you catch none
spirituality.author: Confucius

spirituality.quote: Do not think you will necessarily be aware of your own enlightenment
spirituality.author: Dogen

spirituality.quote: To study Buddhism is to study ourselves. To study ourselves is to forget ourselves
spirituality.author: Dogen

spirituality.quote: Treat every moment as your last. It is not preparation for something else
spirituality.author: Shunryu Suzuki (Zen Mind, Beginner’s Mind)

spirituality.quote: In the beginner’s mind there are many possibilities, but in the expert’s mind there are few
spirituality.author: Shunryu Suzuki

spirituality.quote: The only Zen you can find on the tops of mountains is the Zen you bring up there. Robert M
spirituality.author: Pirsig (Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance)

spirituality.quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as if nothing is a miracle. The other is as if everything is a miracle
spirituality.author: Albert Einstein

spirituality.quote: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom. Mastering others is strength; mastering yourself is true power
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito
spirituality.author: 14th Dalai Lama

spirituality.quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion
spirituality.author: 14th Dalai Lama

spirituality.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus
spirituality.author: Bruce Lee

spirituality.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment
spirituality.author: Buddha

spirituality.quote: The first and the best victory is to conquer self
spirituality.author: Plato

spirituality.quote: All know the way, but few actually walk it
spirituality.author: Bodhidharma

spirituality.quote: Not engaging in ignorance is wisdom
spirituality.author: Bodhidharma

spirituality.quote: The essence of the Way is detachment
spirituality.author: Bodhidharma

spirituality.quote: Act without expectation
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Not creating delusions is enlightenment
spirituality.author: Bodhidharma

spirituality.quote: All things are difficult before they are easy
spirituality.author: Thomas Fuller

spirituality.quote: Words diminish meanings; these words included
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: The more you know, the less you need
spirituality.author: Yvon Chouinard (Patagonia)

spirituality.quote: Don’t be afraid to just sit and watch
spirituality.author: Anthony Bourdain

spirituality.quote: Your mind wants control. Life wants change
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Do not be too interested in Zen
spirituality.author: Shunryu Suzuki

spirituality.quote: Life begins where fear ends
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Be present above all else
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Think with your whole body
spirituality.author: Taisen Deshimaru

spirituality.quote: Love all. Serve all. Help ever. Hurt never
spirituality.author: Sathya Sai Baba

spirituality.quote: Don’t try to steer the river
spirituality.author: Deepak Chopra

spirituality.quote: To go beyond is as wrong as to fall short
spirituality.author: Confucius

spirituality.quote: Roads were made for journeys not destinations
spirituality.author: Confucius

spirituality.quote: Don’t curse the darkness, light a candle
spirituality.author: Confucius

spirituality.quote: Body and mind dropped off
spirituality.author: Dogen (on enlightenment)

spirituality.quote: Those who seek the easy way do not seek the true way
spirituality.author: Dogen

spirituality.quote: Enlightenment is intimacy with all things
spirituality.author: Dogen

spirituality.quote: A zen master’s life is one continuous mistake
spirituality.author: Dogen

spirituality.quote: Now I know what success is: living your truth, sharing it
spirituality.author: Kamal Ravikant

spirituality.quote: I follow four dictates: face it, accept it, deal with it, then let it go

You can do this if you approach each task as if it is your last, giving up every distraction, emotional subversion of reason, and all drama, vanity, and complaint over your fair share. You can see how mastery over a few things makes it possible to live an abundant and devout life — for, if you keep watch over these things, the gods won’t ask for more

spirituality.quote: This moment is fine

spirituality.quote: Change what cannot be accepted and accept what cannot be changed

spirituality.quote: There’s only one reason why you’re not experiencing bliss at this present moment, and it’s because you’re thinking or focusing on what you don’t have. Otherwise you would be experiencing bliss
spirituality.author: Anthony de Mello (Awareness)

spirituality.quote: The key to serenity is trusting that the universe has your back
spirituality.author: Gabrielle Bernstein

spirituality.quote: To be in harmony with the wholeness of things is not to have anxiety over imperfections
spirituality.author: Dogen

spirituality.quote: Serenity: When you stop expecting and start accepting
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: God grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change; courage to change the things I can; and wisdom to know the difference
spirituality.author: The Serenity Prayer

spirituality.quote: From serenity comes gentleness, comes lasting strength
spirituality.author: Pam Brown

spirituality.quote: Decide that wherever you are, is the best place there is. Once you start comparing, there’s no end to it
spirituality.author: Sodo Yokoyama

spirituality.quote: If you are at peace with your past, you are at peace with yourself
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Lasting happiness comes from the understanding that nothing can make you happy
spirituality.author: James Pierce

spirituality.quote: The need for happiness will imprison you far more than happiness will liberate you
spirituality.author: James Pierce

spirituality.quote: Patience means allowing things to unfold at their own speed rather than jumping in with your habitual response to either pain or pleasure
spirituality.author: Pema Chödrön

spirituality.quote: There is a contradiction in wanting to be perfectly secure in a universe whose very nature is momentariness and fluidity
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: When you do the right thing, you get the feeling of peace and serenity associated with it. Do it again and again. Roy T
spirituality.author: Bennett

spirituality.quote: Cheerfulness keeps up a kind of daylight in the mind, filling it with a steady and perpetual serenity
spirituality.author: Joseph Addison

spirituality.quote: Peace is the simplicity of heart, the serenity of mind, tranquility of soul, the bond of love
spirituality.author: Pio of Pietrelcina

spirituality.quote: Harmony is the feeling that arises from not wanting to be somewhere else, doing something else
spirituality.author: Raj Raghunathan

spirituality.quote: In a society enslaved by the growth imperative, sufficiency is a revolutionary principle
spirituality.author: Jason Hickel

spirituality.quote: Stop leaving and you will arrive. Stop searching and you will see. Stop running away and you will be found
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Trying to control the future is like trying to take the master carpenter’s place…chances are that you’ll cut your hand
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching)

spirituality.quote: Rule your mind with serenity rather than with force and manipulation
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Peace is present right here and now, in ourselves and in everything we do and see. Every breath we take, every step we take, can be filled with peace, joy, and serenity. The question is whether or not we are in touch with it. We need only to be awake, alive in the present moment
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh (Peace Is Every Step)

spirituality.quote: Having enough comes from the inside. It comes from seeing yourself and your work differently, from knowing that more is not the answer
spirituality.author: Ryan Holiday

spirituality.quote: Care about doing your best. Don’t care about the results
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: The law of tranquility: where there is no resistance, there is no conflict
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Acceptance means: For now, this is what this situation, this moment, requires me to do, and so I do it willingly
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Allow whatever arises in the present moment to be as it is
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Sometimes surrender means giving up trying to understand, and becoming comfortable with not knowing
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: I will be calm. I will be mistress of myself
spirituality.author: Jane Austen

spirituality.quote: Enthusiasm is a supernatural serenity
spirituality.author: Henry David Thoreau

spirituality.quote: Tomorrow is a new day. You shall begin it well and serenely
spirituality.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

spirituality.quote: Forgive yourself for not being at peace. The moment you completely accept your non-peace, your non-peace is transmuted into peace. Anything you accept fully will get you there, will take you into peace. This is the miracle of surrender
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: When you become aware of silence, immediately there is that state of inner still alertness. You are present. You have stepped out of thousands of years of collective human conditioning
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: There is a place in you that you must keep inviolate, a place that you must keep clean
spirituality.author: Maya Angelou

spirituality.quote: The trees, the flowers, the plants grow in silence. The stars, the sun, the moon move in silence. Silence gives us a new perspective
spirituality.author: Mother Teresa

spirituality.quote: Inner peace and contentment depend in large measure upon whether or not the historical family which is inherent in the individual can be harmonized with the ephemeral conditions of the present
spirituality.author: Carl Jung (Memories, Dreams, Reflections)

spirituality.quote: To shrug it all off and wipe it clean — every annoyance and distraction — and reach utter stillness. Child’s play
spirituality.author: Marcus Aurelius

spirituality.quote: The self-controlled soul, who moves amongst sense objects, free from either attachment or repulsion, he wins eternal peace
spirituality.author: Bhagavad Gita

spirituality.quote: Free from all thoughts of ‘I’ and ‘mine’, a man finds absolute peace
spirituality.author: Bhagavad Gita

spirituality.quote: Meet this transient world with neither grasping nor fear, trust the unfolding of life and you will attain true serenity
spirituality.author: Bhagavad Gita

spirituality.quote: Aimlessness, nonattainment, is a wonderful practice
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: There are two primary choices in life: to accept conditions as they exist, or accept the responsibility for changing them
spirituality.author: Denis Waitley

spirituality.quote: He that owns himself has lost nothing
spirituality.author: But how few men are blessed with ownership of self! Seneca

spirituality.quote: If you take things personally you will remain offended for life
spirituality.author: Deepak Chopra

spirituality.quote: Accept this moment
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Doing nothing is something
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: Do your best and then relax
spirituality.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

spirituality.quote: If you lose your temper, you lose
spirituality.author: Richard Diaz

spirituality.quote: Allow nature to teach you stillness
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Slow down. Spend more time observing
spirituality.author: Daily Zen

spirituality.quote: Silence is a form of internal poetry
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: Peace is a sense that everything is fine
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: I’ve always found my strength in silence
spirituality.author: Chelsey Brooks

spirituality.quote: Everything I desire is within me
spirituality.author: Deepak Chopra

spirituality.quote: A mind at war with itself cannot know peace
spirituality.author: James Pierce

spirituality.quote: The quiet mind enters into the immeasurable
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: Make a place to sit down. Sit down. Be quiet
spirituality.author: Wendell Berry

spirituality.quote: Be yourself and you will feel at home anywhere
spirituality.author: Jim Kwik

spirituality.quote: Being calm is the highest level of intelligence
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Peace often comes when we stop trying to force it
spirituality.author: Daily Zen

spirituality.quote: Things are annoying because you let them annoy you
spirituality.author: Angela Jiang

spirituality.quote: Do what you have to do. In the meantime, accept what is
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Serenity comes when you trade expectations for acceptance
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Those who flow as life flows know they need no other force
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Non-resistance is the key to the greatest power in the universe
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Accept yourself completely as you are right now. Breathe into the present
spirituality.author: Daily Zen

spirituality.quote: The wiser you get, the more you enjoy the process
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: When you let go of fear of the future, your soul feels light
spirituality.author: Courtney Carver

spirituality.quote: Stillness is not the absence of motion but rather the absence of resistance
spirituality.author: Adyashanti

spirituality.quote: Don’t worry, meditate. Don’t react, notice. Don’t yell, listen. Don’t fear, think
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Give thyself time to learn something new and good, and cease to be whirled around
spirituality.author: Marcus Aurelius

spirituality.quote: Whenever possible: Breathe and be kind. When that’s not possible: Breathe and be quiet
spirituality.author: Jason Garner

spirituality.quote: I think that the ideal space must contain elements of magic, serenity, sorcery and mystery
spirituality.author: Luis Barragan

spirituality.quote: Every breath we take, every step we make, can be filled with peace, joy and serenity
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: The love of learning, the sequestered nooks, and all the sweet serenity of books
spirituality.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

spirituality.quote: The sole art that suits me is that which, rising from unrest, tends toward serenity
spirituality.author: André Gide

spirituality.quote: A garden must combine the poetic and the mysterious with a feeling of serenity and joy
spirituality.author: Luis Barragan

spirituality.quote: Nature is the best medicine for serenity. Peace, calmness, stillness. It’s good for the heart
spirituality.author: Karen Madwell

spirituality.quote: Forests are delightful, but the worldlings find no delight in them; only those who are free from passion will find delight in them, for they do not seek sensual pleasures
spirituality.author: The Dhammapada

spirituality.quote: The most wonderful taste of serenity is found by the love you create for yourself, and those around you
spirituality.author: Joe Torres

spirituality.quote: The most successful people I know are humble, working hard, focused, calm
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: When you no longer perceive the world as hostile, there is no more fear, and when there is no more fear, you think, speak and act differently
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Radiate an energy of serenity and peace so that you have an uplifting effect on those you come into contact with
spirituality.author: Wayne Dyer

spirituality.quote: Well being, serenity and service to others are the ultimate measures of true wealth, success and power
spirituality.author: Brendon Burchard

spirituality.quote: Planning is overrated. Trusting and taking action are underrated
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: When you let go of anger or resentment from the past, your heart feels light
spirituality.author: Courtney Carver

spirituality.quote: We can be serene even in the midst of calamities and, by our serenity, make others more tranquil
spirituality.author: Swami Satchidananda

spirituality.quote: And joy is everywhere; it is in the earth’s green covering of grass; in the blue serenity of the sky
spirituality.author: Rabindranath Tagore

spirituality.quote: The person who is not disturbed by happiness and distress and is steady in both is certainly eligible for liberation
spirituality.author: Bhagavad Gita

spirituality.quote: Serenity is not just an escape, but a precursor to acceptance, courage, wisdom, and change
spirituality.author: Bill Crawford

spirituality.quote: Trust is knowing that no matter what happens, you will be better off than you were in the beginning
spirituality.author: Iyanla Vanzant

spirituality.quote: If you want oneness in society, you have to teach people to go inside instead of going outside, because if they want peace, they need to find it within
spirituality.author: Ram Dass

spirituality.quote: Resist nothing. The past has already happened. The future is unknowable. Flow with whatever happens
spirituality.author: Daily Zen

spirituality.quote: When you understand certain things, when you learn certain things, when you’re convinced of certain things, and when they become a deep part of you, then you naturally become a more peaceful person
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Retirement is when you stop sacrificing today for an imaginary tomorrow. When today is complete, in and of itself, you’re retired
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: The ability to be content and at peace, by yourself, is freedom
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: The one who is free of every and any intention, even the intention to be free, is free indeed
spirituality.author: Mooji

spirituality.quote: The highest form of grace is silence. It is also the highest spiritual instruction
spirituality.author: Ramana Maharishi

spirituality.quote: A quiet mouth is a symptom of a quiet mind
spirituality.author: James Pierce

spirituality.quote: Serenity is knowing that your worst shot is still pretty good
spirituality.author: Johnny Miller

spirituality.quote: If it is peace you want, seek to change yourself, not other people. It is easier to protect your feet with slippers than to carpet the whole of the earth
spirituality.author: Anthony de Mello

spirituality.quote: Don’t try to make them happy, you’ll only get in trouble. Don’t try to teach a pig to sing; it wastes your time and it irritates the pig
spirituality.author: Anthony de Mello

spirituality.quote: Nervous and excitable persons need to talk a great deal, by way of letting off their steam
spirituality.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

spirituality.quote: I prefer tongue-tied knowledge to ignorant loquacity
spirituality.author: Cicero

spirituality.quote: When you lose touch with inner stillness, you lose touch with yourself
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: What is heaven? A silent and empty mind
spirituality.author: Mooji

spirituality.quote: Be calm. God awaits you at the door
spirituality.author: Gabriel García Márquez

spirituality.quote: You are not going to be here for too long. Relax
spirituality.author: Dalos Ortiz

spirituality.quote: The most useful and sustainable kind of happiness is called peace. All the other ones will make you miserable
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Enlightenment is "being," and it grows; it’s end is serenity
spirituality.author: William Gibson

spirituality.quote: Perhaps, after all, our best thoughts come when we are alone. It is good to listen, not to voices but to the wind blowing, to the brook running cool over polished stones, to bees drowsy with the weight of pollen. If we attend to the music of the earth, we reach serenity. And then, in some unexplained way, we share it with others
spirituality.author: Gladys Taber

spirituality.quote: And you would accept the seasons of your heart just as you have always accepted that seasons pass over your fields and you would watch with serenity through the winters of your grief
spirituality.author: Kahlil Gibran

spirituality.quote: Everything happens when it needs to happen; everyone is always where they need to be
spirituality.author: Iyanla Vanzant

spirituality.quote: What follows coheres with what went before. Not like a random catalogue whose order is imposed upon it arbitrarily, but logically connected. And just as what exists is ordered and harmonious, what comes into being betrays an order too. Not a mere sequence, but an astonishing concordance
spirituality.author: Marcus Aurelius

spirituality.quote: There’s horror and beauty in everything. I look at my hand, and it’s decaying. It’s beautiful and horrible at the same moment, and I just live with it. See the beauty and perfection of decay in the world around you and in yourself, and just allow it to be
spirituality.author: Ram Dass

spirituality.quote: So long as you can be persuaded that there is something more that you ought to be than you are, you have divided yourself from reality
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: Learn to handle your emotions, or else other people will easily affect you
spirituality.author: Gal Shapira

spirituality.quote: Outrage is a result of the belief that things should be a certain way
spirituality.author: James Pierce

spirituality.quote: Make no effort for or against anything. Whatever happens, happens. Surrender to yourself in the moment. Resist nothing and reject nothing, including the urge to resist and reject
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: It is hard to find the noblest of men; he is not born everywhere nor in every clan. To whatever clan such a wise man is born, that clan prospers
spirituality.author: The Dhammapada

spirituality.quote: Let them win the argument. Even better, don’t argue in the first place. Don’t try to convince anyone. People who have already made up their mind won’t be dissuaded from it. The rare few who’re open and receptive don’t require effort to be persuaded of a more valid point of view
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: You won’t have inner peace until you give up your war against the world
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Peace doesn’t require two people; it requires only one. It has to be you. The problem begins and ends there
spirituality.author: Byron Katie

spirituality.quote: Peace is the mood of knowing that whatever comes will also go. Therefore there is no need to be particularly bothered by anything. This kind of awareness also keeps you from chasing after things that seem to give permanent happiness but are only mirages on the horizon
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: Accept misfortune as the human condition
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching)

spirituality.quote: The desire to become enlightened is still you desiring something
spirituality.author: Ram Dass

spirituality.quote: Home is not where you are born; home is where all your attempts to escape cease
spirituality.author: Naguib Mahfouz

spirituality.quote: The poor have external goals. The rich just do their best
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Great tranquility of heart is his who cares for neither praise nor blame. Thomas A
spirituality.author: Kempis

spirituality.quote: If others hurt you, let the injury go. This is your test. If you let it go, you will find serenity
spirituality.author: Wayne Dyer

spirituality.quote: To live happily, the only thing you must care about is the process. Everything else is a distraction, even the results
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Everything passes, nothing remains. Understand this, loosen your grip, and find serenity
spirituality.author: Lama Surya Das

spirituality.quote: It is neither wealth nor splendor, but tranquility and occupation which give you happiness
spirituality.author: Thomas Jefferson

spirituality.quote: There are two ways to get enough. One is to continue to accumulate more and more. The other is to desire less. G.K
spirituality.author: Chesterton

spirituality.quote: The final wisdom of life requires not the annulment of incongruity but the achievement of serenity within and above it
spirituality.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

spirituality.quote: Serenity is the balance between good and bad, life and death, horrors and pleasures. Life is, as it were, defined by death. If there wasn’t death of things, then there wouldn’t be any life to celebrate
spirituality.author: Norman Davies

spirituality.quote: Serenity is the final word of all the teachings; reflection is the response to all manifestations
spirituality.author: Hongzhi Zhengjue

spirituality.quote: Learn silence. With the quiet serenity of a meditative mind, listen, absorb, transcribe, and transform
spirituality.author: Pythagoras

spirituality.quote: In struggling against anguish one never produces serenity; the struggle against anguish only produces new forms of anguish
spirituality.author: Simone Weil

spirituality.quote: If for any reason your choices do not result in peace, harmony, and balance, you are always free to choose again
spirituality.author: Iyanla Vanzant

spirituality.quote: The more present I am, the happier and more content I will be
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: I have now realized to be free you must be pleased controlling nothing.
spirituality.author: Arielle S. Davis

spirituality.quote: By meditating on a regular basis, you teach your brain to be calm. The more you meditate, the more your brain adapts to this state as your default state, even after you finish meditating. Do it every day, and being calm will be your natural state of being
spirituality.author: Gal Shapira

spirituality.quote: Meditation is to be aware of every thought and of every feeling, never to say it is right or wrong but just to watch it and move with it
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: When you practice sitting meditation, if you enjoy even one moment of your sitting, if you establish serenity and happiness inside yourself, you provide the world with a solid base of peace
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: Meditation makes the entire nervous system go into a field of coherence
spirituality.author: Deepak Chopra

spirituality.quote: If you are made happy by things that are fleeting, your happiness will be equally fleeting
spirituality.author: James Pierce

spirituality.quote: In a world of insane talkers, silence is a great therapy. Talk strengthens the ego, silence nourishes the spirit
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Accept the success. Why should it be otherwise? Accept the suffering. Why should it be otherwise? Accept the love. Why should it be otherwise? Accept the loss. Why should it be otherwise? Accept the joy. Why should it be otherwise? Accept the end
spirituality.author: Why should it be otherwise? Unknown

spirituality.quote: It is important to expect nothing, to take every experience, including the negative ones, as merely steps on the path, and to proceed
spirituality.author: Ram Dass

spirituality.quote: The best way to regain a measure of control; accept things are entirely beyond one’s control – and understanding
spirituality.author: Alain de Botton

spirituality.quote: Ataraxia: Ancient greek for ‘serenity of the soul’, especially needed around politics, mortality and disgrace, achieved via philosophy
spirituality.author: Alain de Botton

spirituality.quote: Peace itself is not a thing that can be directly achieved. You cannot work towards peace. What you work towards is understanding
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Too lazy to be ambitious, I let the world take care of itself
spirituality.author: Ryokan

spirituality.quote: Trusting the process is a sign of intelligence
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Conquest begets enmity; the conquered live in misery; the peaceful live happily having renounced conquest and defeat
spirituality.author: The Dhammapada

spirituality.quote: I was never less alone than when by myself
spirituality.author: Edward Gibbon

spirituality.quote: Silence is a source of great strength
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Everyone shines, given the right lighting
spirituality.author: Susan Cain (Website, Twitter)

spirituality.quote: The day I began to live is the day I discovered being an introvert was awesome
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: I love to be alone. I never found the companion that was so companionable as solitude
spirituality.author: Henry David Thoreau

spirituality.quote: Loneliness is the poverty of self; solitude is the richness of self
spirituality.author: Mary Sarton

spirituality.quote: Nothing can dim the light that shines from within
spirituality.author: Maya Angelou

spirituality.quote: I wish, as well as everybody else, to be perfectly happy; but like everybody else, it must be in my own way
spirituality.author: Jane Austen

spirituality.quote: The more powerful and original a mind, the more it will incline towards the religion of solitude
spirituality.author: Aldous Huxley

spirituality.quote: Be a loner. That gives you time to wonder, to search for the truth. Have holy curiosity. Make your life worth living
spirituality.author: Albert Einstein

spirituality.quote: Introverts are word economists in a society suffering from verbal diarrhea
spirituality.author: Michaela Chung

spirituality.quote: Silence is only frightening to people who are compulsively verbalizing. William S
spirituality.author: Boroughs

spirituality.quote: One can be instructed in society, one is inspired only in solitude
spirituality.author: Gary Mark Gilmore

spirituality.quote: Live your life the way you want, not the way society tells you
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: You see things. You keep quiet about them. And you understand
spirituality.author: Stephen Chbosky

spirituality.quote: Wise men speak because they have something to say; Fools because they have to say something
spirituality.author: Plato

spirituality.quote: I am a minimalist. I like saying the most with the least
spirituality.author: Bob Newhart

spirituality.quote: Silence is not empty. It’s full of answers
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Never assume quiet is weak and loud is strong
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: The most introspective of souls are often those that have been hurt the most. Shannon L
spirituality.author: Alder

spirituality.quote: Don’t think of introversion as something that needs to be cured… Spend your free time the way you like, not the way you think you’re supposed to
spirituality.author: Susan Cain

spirituality.quote: Telling an introvert to go to a party is like telling a saint to go to Hell
spirituality.author: Criss Jami

spirituality.quote: Alone had always felt like an actual place to me, as if it weren’t a state of being, but rather a room where I could retreat to be who I really was
spirituality.author: Cheryl Strayed

spirituality.quote: An inability to stay quiet is one of the conspicuous failings of mankind
spirituality.author: Walter Bagehot

spirituality.quote: People inspire you, or they drain you – pick them wisely. Hans F
spirituality.author: Hansen

spirituality.quote: A happy life must be to a great extent a quiet life, for it is only in an atmosphere of quiet that true joy dare live
spirituality.author: Bertrand Russell

spirituality.quote: When I was young, all I wanted and expected from life was to sit quietly in some corner doing my work without the public paying attention to me. And now see what has become of me
spirituality.author: Albert Einstein

spirituality.quote: Introverts are collectors of thoughts, and solitude is where the collection is curated and rearranged to make sense of the present and future
spirituality.author: Laurie Helgoe (Website, Twitter)

spirituality.quote: Silence is beautiful, not awkward. The human tendency to be afraid of something beautiful is awkward
spirituality.author: Elliot Kay

spirituality.quote: Solitude matters. And for some people it is the air that they breathe
spirituality.author: Susan Cain

spirituality.quote: It’s never a good idea to organize society in a way that depletes the energy of half the population. We discovered this with women decades ago, and now it’s time to realize it with introverts
spirituality.author: Susan Cain

spirituality.quote: People empty me. I have to get away to refill
spirituality.author: Charles Bukowski

spirituality.quote: The secret to life is to put yourself in the right lighting. For some it’s a Broadway spotlight, for others, a lamplit desk
spirituality.author: Susan Cain

spirituality.quote: Our culture made a virtue of living only as extroverts. We discouraged the inner journey, the quest for a center. So we lost our center and have to find it again
spirituality.author: Anais Nin

spirituality.quote: Extroverts sparkle, introverts glow. Extroverts are fireworks, introverts are a fire in the hearth
spirituality.author: Sophia Dembling

spirituality.quote: Introverts live in two worlds: We visit the world of people, but solitude and the inner world will always be our home
spirituality.author: Jenn Granneman (The Secret Lives of Introverts: Inside Our Hidden World)

spirituality.quote: What a lovely surprise to discover how unlonely being alone can be
spirituality.author: Ellen Burstyn

spirituality.quote: The monotony and solitude of a quiet life stimulates the creative mind
spirituality.author: Albert Einstein

spirituality.quote: Be nice to nerds. Chances are you’ll end up working for one
spirituality.author: Bill Gates (Microsoft)

spirituality.quote: Without great solitude no serious work is possible
spirituality.author: Pablo Picasso

spirituality.quote: Why is it that nobody understands me, yet everybody likes me?
spirituality.author: Albert Einstein

spirituality.quote: It is a strange thing to be so widely known, and yet to be so lonely
spirituality.author: Albert Einstein

spirituality.quote: I restore myself when I’m alone
spirituality.author: Marilyn Monroe

spirituality.quote: I would rather sit on a pumpkin and have it all to myself, than be crowded on a velvet cushion
spirituality.author: Henry David Thoreau

spirituality.quote: We are for the most part more lonely when we go abroad among men than when we stay in our chambers
spirituality.author: Henry David Thoreau

spirituality.quote: We need fantasy to survive because reality is too difficult
spirituality.author: Lady Gaga

spirituality.quote: You’ve gotta keep control of your time, and you can’t unless you say no. You can’t let people set your agenda in life
spirituality.author: Warren Buffett

spirituality.quote: You shouldn’t worry so much about what others think of you if you realized how seldom they do
spirituality.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

spirituality.quote: Your visions will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes
spirituality.author: Carl Gustav Jung

spirituality.quote: I’m an introvert… I love being by myself, love being outdoors, love taking a long walk with my dogs and looking at the trees, flowers, the sky
spirituality.author: Audrey Hepburn

spirituality.quote: I don’t want to be alone. I want to be left alone
spirituality.author: Audrey Hepburn

spirituality.quote: I always try to be myself. Ever since I was an introverted kid, I’d get on stage and be able to break out of my shell
spirituality.author: Beyonce Knowles

spirituality.quote: Quiet people have the loudest minds
spirituality.author: Stephen Hawking

spirituality.quote: Nowhere can man find a quieter or more untroubled retreat than in his own soul
spirituality.author: Marcus Aurelius

spirituality.quote: Better to remain silent and be thought a fool than to speak out and remove all doubt
spirituality.author: Abraham Lincoln

spirituality.quote: To thine own self be true
spirituality.author: William Shakespeare

spirituality.quote: Prayer is the key of the morning and the bolt of the evening
spirituality.author: Mahatma Gandhi

spirituality.quote: The wise listen more than they talk and give more than they take
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: The more you talk, the less people listen
spirituality.author: Meg White

spirituality.quote: Take time to be quiet
spirituality.author: Zig Ziglar

spirituality.quote: Shhh
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: If you can’t be kind, be quiet
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: I came, I saw, I left early
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Kindly remove yourself from my personal space. Thanks
spirituality.author: Gemma Correll

spirituality.quote: Think and wonder, wonder and think. Dr
spirituality.author: Seuss

spirituality.quote: I kinda live where I find myself
spirituality.author: Bob Dylan

spirituality.quote: The limited circle is pure
spirituality.author: Franz Kafka

spirituality.quote: I think a lot, but I don’t say much
spirituality.author: Anne Frank

spirituality.quote: Never be afraid to sit for awhile and think
spirituality.author: Lorraine Hansberry

spirituality.quote: Loneliness is failed solitude
spirituality.author: Sherry Turkle

spirituality.quote: Solitude has its own very strange beauty to it
spirituality.author: Liv Tyler

spirituality.quote: My personal hobbies are reading, listening to music, and silence
spirituality.author: Edith Sitwell

spirituality.quote: You must never be fearful about what you are doing when it is right
spirituality.author: Rosa Parks

spirituality.quote: I owe everything that I have done to the fact that I am very much at ease being alone
spirituality.author: Marilynne Robinson

spirituality.quote: Be strong, be who you are and fight for your identity, fight for who you really are
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: The one who follows the crowd will usually go no further than the crowd. Those who walk alone are likely to find themselves in places no one has ever been before
spirituality.author: Francis Phillip Wernig

spirituality.quote: Introverts need to trust their gut and share their ideas as powerfully as they can
spirituality.author: Susan Cain

spirituality.quote: Introverts, the world needs you and it needs the things you carry. So I wish you the best of all possible journeys and the courage to speak softly
spirituality.author: Susan Cain

spirituality.quote: Our culture is biased against quiet and reserved people, but introverts are responsible for some of humanity’s greatest achievements
spirituality.author: Susan Cain

spirituality.quote: Introverts are offered keys to private gardens full of riches (YouTube video). To possess such a key is to tumble like Alice down her rabbit hole. She didn’t choose to go to Wonderland – but she made of it an adventure that was fresh and fantastic and very much her own
spirituality.author: Susan Cain

spirituality.quote: Isn’t it refreshing to know that what comes perfectly natural for you is your greatest strength? Your power is in your nature. You may not think it’s a big deal that you can spend hours immersed in something that interests you — alone — but the extrovert next door has no idea how you do it
spirituality.author: Laurie Helgoe

spirituality.quote: Being weird, independent and loving solitude are not limitations. They are my superpowers
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Your solitude will be a support and a home for you, even in the midst of very unfamiliar circumstances, and from it you will find all your paths
spirituality.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

spirituality.quote: When you’re an introvert like me and you’ve been lonely for a while, and then you find someone who understands you, you become really attached to them. It’s a real release
spirituality.author: Lana Del Rey

spirituality.quote: Yes, I guess you could say I am a loner, but I feel more lonely in a crowded room with boring people that I feel on my own
spirituality.author: Henry Rollins
