spirituality.quote: When I am alone I can become invisible. I can sit on the top of a dune as motionless as an uprise of weeds, until the foxes run by unconcerned. I can hear the almost unhearable sound of the roses singing
spirituality.author: Mary Oliver

spirituality.quote: You do not need to leave your room. Remain sitting at your table and listen. Do not even listen, simply wait, be quiet, still and solitary. The world will freely offer itself to you to be unmasked, it has no choice, it will roll in ecstasy at your feet
spirituality.author: Franz Kafka

spirituality.quote: Lighthouses don’t go running all over an island looking for boats to save; they just stand there shining
spirituality.author: Anne Lamott

spirituality.quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right – for you’ll be criticized anyway. You’ll be damned if you do, and damned if you don’t
spirituality.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

spirituality.quote: Since when is solitude one of the Seven Deadly Sins?
spirituality.author: Susan Cain

spirituality.quote: You might be an introvert if you were ready to go home before you left the house
spirituality.author: Criss Jami

spirituality.quote: Introvert conversations are like jazz. Each player gets to solo for a nice stretch before the other player comes in and does his solo
spirituality.author: Laurie Helgoe

spirituality.quote: In terms of like, instant relief, canceling plans is like heroin
spirituality.author: John Mulaney

spirituality.quote: Whew, that was close. I almost had to socialize
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Please kindly go away – I’m introverting
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: A bore is someone who deprives you of solitude without providing you with company
spirituality.author: Oscar Wilde

spirituality.quote: Never fail to know that if you are doing all the talking you are boring somebody
spirituality.author: Helen Gurley Brown

spirituality.quote: The happiest of all lives is a busy solitude
spirituality.author: Voltaire

spirituality.quote: If I didn’t think, I’d be much happier
spirituality.author: Sylvia Plath

spirituality.quote: So, if you are too tired to speak, sit next to me, because I, too, am fluent in silence. R
spirituality.author: Arnold

spirituality.quote: Hell is other people
spirituality.author: Jean-Paul Sartre (Whew, that’s a hard one)

spirituality.quote: I don’t hate people, I just feel better when they aren’t around
spirituality.author: Charles Bukowski (Another hard one)

spirituality.quote: As a child I suppose I was not quite normal. My happiest times were when I was left alone in the house on a Saturday
spirituality.author: Charles Bukowski

spirituality.quote: Everybody has a secret world inside of them. I mean everybody. All of the people in the whole world, I mean everybody — no matter how dull and boring they are on the outside. Inside them they’ve all got unimaginable, magnificent, wonderful, stupid, amazing worlds… Not just one world. Hundreds of them. Thousands, maybe
spirituality.author: Neil Gaiman

spirituality.quote: I am alone in the world, and yet not alone enough to make every hour holy
spirituality.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

spirituality.quote: I owe my solitude to other people
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: Much of the answers already exist internally but the world is seeking them externally
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: You define beauty for yourself, society doesn’t define your beauty
spirituality.author: Lady Gaga

spirituality.quote: If you are afraid of being lonely, don’t try to be right
spirituality.author: Jules Renard

spirituality.quote: Part 1. Now that you’re an adult, you might still feel a pang of guilt when you decline a dinner invitation in favor of a good book
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Part 2. Or maybe you like to eat alone in restaurants and could do without the pitying looks from fellow diners
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Part 3. Or you’re told that you’re "in your head too much", a phrase that’s often deployed against the quiet and cerebral
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Part 4. Or maybe there’s another word for such people: thinkers
spirituality.author: Susan Cain

spirituality.quote: The greatest art is to sit, wait and let it come
spirituality.author: Yogi Bhajan

spirituality.quote: If you meet a loner, no matter what they tell you, it’s not because they enjoy solitude. It’s because they have tried to blend into the world before, and people continue to disappoint them
spirituality.author: Jodi Picoult

spirituality.quote: Understand that half the game is keeping quiet, and carefully watching those around you
spirituality.author: Robert Greene

spirituality.quote: The loner who looks fabulous is one of the most vulnerable loners of all
spirituality.author: Anneli Rufus

spirituality.quote: In order to understand the world, one has to turn away from it on occasion
spirituality.author: Albert Camus

spirituality.quote: He who knows does not speak. He who speaks does not know
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: As an introvert, you crave intimate moments and deep connections – and those usually aren’t found in a crowd
spirituality.author: Jenn Granneman (The Secret Lives Of Introverts)

spirituality.quote: All sorrow has its root in man’s inability to sit quiet in a room by himself
spirituality.author: Blaise Pascal

spirituality.quote: Confident introverts don’t avoid social situations. They just make wise choices
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Value direction over speed, quality over quantity, truth over lies and you’ll find your path
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Wise men, when in doubt whether to speak or to keep quiet, give themselves the benefit of the doubt, and remain silent
spirituality.author: Napoleon Hill

spirituality.quote: We have two ears and one mouth and we should use them proportionally
spirituality.author: Susan Cain

spirituality.quote: Some animals naturally carry shelter wherever they go, and some humans are just the same
spirituality.author: Susan Cain

spirituality.quote: If you don’t know me, don’t judge me
spirituality.author: Tupac Shakur

spirituality.quote: Beware of those who seek constant crowds; they are nothing alone
spirituality.author: Charles Bukowski

spirituality.quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom
spirituality.author: Aristotle

spirituality.quote: A little hibernation is good for the mind
spirituality.author: Michaela Chung (Website, Twitter)

spirituality.quote: I’m not anti-social. I’m pro-solitude
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Being silent is fine. Accept that and shine your own way
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: I have an introvert hangover. I’m totally exhausted, from too much human interaction
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: If you’re an introvert, you know the relief when plans are cancelled
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: I want someone I can share my entire life with who will leave me alone most of the time
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Being quiet is fine, most people don’t listen anyways
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Be you. The world will adjust
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: I’m a very simple person who hides thousands of feelings behind a smile
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: I do not mean I have nothing planned. I mean that I plan to do nothing
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: I am not boring or shy. I am an introvert, an artist, a lover, a dreamer, a fighter, a seeker
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Sometimes those who don’t socialize much aren’t actually antisocial, they just have no tolerance for drama and fake people
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: When you ask me what I am doing today, and I say "nothing", it does not mean I am free. It means I am doing nothing
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: And all of a sudden I felt really tired. Like the world had drained me for everything that I had
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: The only thing I bring to social gathering is excuses to leave early
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: I like cancelled plans. And empty bookstores. I like rainy days and thunderstorms. And quiet coffee shops. I like messy beds and over-worn pajamas. Most of all, I like the small joys that a simple life brings
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Just because I’m not talking doesn’t mean I’m in a bad mood
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: The mind of an introvert is truly complex. We want solitude yet the feeling of loneliness cripples
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Do you ever go out, and while you’re out, you think, "this is exactly why I don,t go out"?
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Remember: it’s okay to be happy with a calm life
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Having a soft heart in a cruel world is courage not weakness
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Silence calms my soul
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Do not underestimate the determination of a quiet man
spirituality.author: Iain Duncun Smith

spirituality.quote: Solitary trees, if they grow at all, grow strong
spirituality.author: Winston Churchill

spirituality.quote: A table, a chair, a bowl of fruit and a violin; what else does a man need to be happy?
spirituality.author: Albert Einstein

spirituality.quote: Sometimes the solitary voice can be the best one
spirituality.author: Frank Miller

spirituality.quote: Without great solitude, no serious work is possible
spirituality.author: Pablo Picasso

spirituality.quote: It’s your road and yours alone. Others may walk it with you, but no one can walk it for you
spirituality.author: Rumi

spirituality.quote: By all means use sometimes to be alone. Salute thyself; see what thy soul doth wear
spirituality.author: George Herbert

spirituality.quote: I never found the companion that was so companionable as solitude
spirituality.author: Henry David Thoreau

spirituality.quote: The best thinking has been done in solitude. Thomas A
spirituality.author: Edison

spirituality.quote: Great men are like eagles, and build their nest on some lofty solitude
spirituality.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

spirituality.quote: Solitude helps you find peace. Peace helps you find happiness
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: All of humanity’s problems stem from man’s inability to sit quietly in a room alone
spirituality.author: Blaise Pascal

spirituality.quote: A little while alone in your room will prove more valuable than anything else that could ever be given you
spirituality.author: Rumi

spirituality.quote: Solitude, in these days as much as ever, is an absolute necessity
spirituality.author: Leo Babauta

spirituality.quote: I lived in that solitude which is painful in youth, but delicious in maturity
spirituality.author: Albert Einstein

spirituality.quote: In stillness lives wisdom. In quiet you’ll find peace. In solitude you’ll remember yourself
spirituality.author: Robin Sharma

spirituality.quote: Once you know how to take care of yourself, company becomes an option
spirituality.author: Keenu Reeves

spirituality.quote: Talent develops in quiet places, character in the full current of human life
spirituality.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

spirituality.quote: You are born alone. You die alone. The value of the space in between is trust and love
spirituality.author: Louise Bourgeois

spirituality.quote: Conversation enriches the understanding, but solitude is the school of genius
spirituality.author: Edward Gibbon

spirituality.quote: I am never less alone than when alone
spirituality.author: Cicero

spirituality.quote: I was a man who thrived on solitude; without it I was like another man without food or water. Each day without solitude weakened me. I took no pride in my solitude; but I was dependent on it. The darkness of the room was like sunlight to me
spirituality.author: Charles Bukowski

spirituality.quote: Our language has wisely sensed the two sides of being alone. It has created the word loneliness to express the pain of being alone. And it has created the word solitude to express the glory of being alone
spirituality.author: Paul Tillich

spirituality.quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path
spirituality.author: Buddha

spirituality.quote: Solitude is un-American
spirituality.author: Erica Jong

spirituality.quote: A well-ordered mind is at home with solitude
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Not being comfortable alone means you must spend more time alone
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: A happy life must be to a great extent a quiet life, for it is only in an atmosphere of quiet that true joy can live
spirituality.author: Bertrand Russell

spirituality.quote: I myself am best when least in company
spirituality.author: William Shakespeare

spirituality.quote: In proportion as a person simplifies his life, the laws of the universe will appear less complex, and solitude will not be solitude
spirituality.author: Henry David Thoreau

spirituality.quote: The mind is sharper and keener in seclusion and uninterrupted solitude
spirituality.author: Nikola Tesla

spirituality.quote: The great man is he who in the midst of the crowd keeps with perfect sweetness the independence of solitude
spirituality.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

spirituality.quote: You do not need to leave your room. Remain sitting at your table and listen. Do not even listen, simply wait, be quiet still and solitary. The world will freely offer itself to you to be unmasked, it has no choice, it will roll in ecstasy at your feet
spirituality.author: Franz Kakfa

spirituality.quote: In the temple of his spirit, each man is alone
spirituality.author: Ayn Rand

spirituality.quote: Solitude is the place of purification
spirituality.author: Martin Buber

spirituality.quote: Solitude is where one discovers one is not alone
spirituality.author: Marty Rubin

spirituality.quote: Solitude is a lost art in these days of ultra-connectedness
spirituality.author: Leo Babauta

spirituality.quote: Solitude is not the absence of company, but the moment when our soul is free to speak to us and help us decide what to do with our life
spirituality.author: Paulo Coelho

spirituality.quote: Solitude is like punctuation. A paragraph without periods and commas would be exhausting to read
spirituality.author: Arnie Kozak

spirituality.quote: Solitude isn’t loneliness. Solitude is when the entire serene universe seems to surround and hold you quietly
spirituality.author: Victoria Erickson

spirituality.quote: Solitude is the great teacher, and to learn its lessons you must pay attention to it
spirituality.author: Deepak Chopra

spirituality.quote: Solitude is the attribute of the strong. The weak is always found in the crowd
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Loneliness is to be avoided, solitude is to be sought
spirituality.author: Tom Hanks

spirituality.quote: Society is no comfort, to one not sociable
spirituality.author: William Shakespeare

spirituality.quote: It’s an interesting combination: Having a great fear of being alone, and having a desperate need for solitude and the solitary experience. That’s always been a tug of war for me
spirituality.author: Jodie Foster

spirituality.quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you
spirituality.author: Maya Angelou

spirituality.quote: I find it wholesome to be alone the greater part of the time. To be in company, even with the best, is soon wearisome and dissipating. I love to be alone
spirituality.author: Henry David Thoreau

spirituality.quote: I have a great deal of company in the house, especially in the morning when nobody calls
spirituality.author: Henry David Thoreau

spirituality.quote: That is why I go into solitude so as not to drink out of everybody’s cistern. When I am among the many I live as the many do, and I do not think as I really think; after a time it always seems as though they want to banish me from myself and rob me of my soul and I grow angry with everybody and fear everybody
spirituality.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

spirituality.quote: My solitude doesn’t depend on the presence or absence of people; on the contrary, I hate who steals my solitude without, in exchange, offering me true company
spirituality.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

spirituality.quote: It’s easy to stand in the crowd but it takes courage to stand alone
spirituality.author: Mahatma Gandhi

spirituality.quote: My passionate interest in social justice and social responsibility has always stood in curious contrast to a marked lack of desire for direct association with men and women
spirituality.author: Albert Einstein

spirituality.quote: Solitude is dangerous. It’s very addictive. It becomes a habit after you realise how peaceful and calm it is. It’s like you don’t want to deal with people anymore because they drain your energy
spirituality.author: Jim Carrey

spirituality.quote: Writing, at its best, is a lonely life
spirituality.author: Ernest Hemingway

spirituality.quote: Wherever you may seek solitude, men will ferret you out and compel you to belong to their desperate company of oddfellows
spirituality.author: Henry David Thoreau

spirituality.quote: It would do the world good if every person would compel himself to often be alone. Most of the world’s progress has come from such
spirituality.author: Deepak Chopra

spirituality.quote: I chide society, I embrace solitude, and yet I am not so ungrateful as not to see the wise, the lovely and the noble-minded, as from time to time they pass my gate
spirituality.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

spirituality.quote: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the water to create many ripples
spirituality.author: Mother Teresa

spirituality.quote: This great misfortune – to be incapable of solitude
spirituality.author: Jean de la Bruyère

spirituality.quote: Solitude is a kind of freedom
spirituality.author: Umberto Eco

spirituality.quote: He who understands humanity seeks solitude
spirituality.author: Ali ibn Abi Talib

spirituality.quote: Fire is a good companion for the mind
spirituality.author: May Sarton

spirituality.quote: Be alone and be happy with yourself.
spirituality.author: Leo Babauta

spirituality.quote: Solitude terrifies the soul at twenty
spirituality.author: Molière

spirituality.quote: Solitude appeared to me as the only fit state of man
spirituality.author: Walter Benjamin

spirituality.quote: It is better to be alone than in bad company
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Solitude sometimes is best society
spirituality.author: John Milton

spirituality.quote: In solitude I find my answers
spirituality.author: Kristen Butler

spirituality.quote: Some of us are born to a solitary life
spirituality.author: Philippa Gregory

spirituality.quote: Solitude vivifies; isolation kills
spirituality.author: Joseph Roux

spirituality.quote: The more you enjoy solitude, the simpler life becomes
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: In solitude the mind gains strength and learns to lean upon itself
spirituality.author: Laurence Sterne

spirituality.quote: Religion is what an individual does with his solitariness
spirituality.author: Alfred North Whitehead

spirituality.quote: To find yourself, think for yourself
spirituality.author: Socrates

spirituality.quote: The thoughtful soul to solitude retires
spirituality.author: Omar Khayyam

spirituality.quote: Never be afraid to sit awhile and think
spirituality.author: Lorraine Hansberry

spirituality.quote: You only grow when you are alone
spirituality.author: Paul Newman

spirituality.quote: Disappear. Then, come back even better
spirituality.author: Ree Johnson

spirituality.quote: They who do not fear darkness have learned to light their own candle
spirituality.author: Dodinsky

spirituality.quote: If one is lucky, a solitary fantasy can totally transform one million realities
spirituality.author: Maya Angelou

spirituality.quote: One day, in retrospect, the years of struggle will strike you as the most beautiful
spirituality.author: Sigmund Freud

spirituality.quote: Originality thrives in seclusion free of outside influences beating upon us to cripple the creative mind
spirituality.author: Nikola Tesla

spirituality.quote: Make the time to be alone. Your best ideas live within solitude
spirituality.author: Robin Sharma

spirituality.quote: There’s staggering power in leaving the world and heading out into some solitude for at least and hour every day
spirituality.author: Robin Sharma

spirituality.quote: He is greatest whose strength carries up the most hearts by the attraction of his own
spirituality.author: Henry Ward Beecher

spirituality.quote: Closed in a room, my imagination becomes the universe, and the rest of the world is missing out
spirituality.author: Criss Jami

spirituality.quote: We must become so alone, so utterly alone, that we withdraw into our innermost self. It is a way of bitter suffering. But then our solitude is overcome, we are no longer alone, for we find that our innermost self is the spirit, that it is God, the indivisible. And suddenly we find ourselves in the midst of the world, yet undisturbed by its multiplicity, for our innermost soul we know ourselves to be one with all being
spirituality.author: Hermann Hesse

spirituality.quote: Guard well your spare moments. They are like uncut diamonds. Discard them and their value will never be known. Improve them and they will become the brightest gems in a useful life
spirituality.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

spirituality.quote: What I must do is all that concerns me, not what the people think. This rule, equally arduous in actual and intellectual life, may serve for the whole distinction between greatness and meanness. It is the harder, because you will always find those who think they know what is your duty better than you know it. It is easy in the world to live after the world’s opinion; it is easy in solitude to live after our own
spirituality.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

spirituality.quote: It is much better to walk alone, in the right direction, than to follow the herd, walking in the wrong direction
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Let others worry about being socially acceptable; those types are a dime a dozen, and you are after a power greater than they can imagine
spirituality.author: Robert Greene

spirituality.quote: True solitude is found in the wild places, where one is without human obligation. One’s inner voices become audible… In consequence, one responds more clearly to other lives
spirituality.author: Wendell Berry

spirituality.quote: Be so relaxed that nothing and nobody can affect you. You’re above that
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: You think that I am impoverishing myself withdrawing from men, but in my solitude I have woven for myself a silken web or chrysalis, and, nymph-like, shall ere long burst forth a more perfect creature, fitted for a higher society
spirituality.author: Henry David Thoreau

spirituality.quote: You will not find a soulmate in the quiet of your room. You must go to a noisy place and look in the quiet corners
spirituality.author: Robert Brault

spirituality.quote: Solitude is the place of purification and transformation, the place of the great struggle and the great encounter
spirituality.author: Henri Nouwen

spirituality.quote: We live in a very tense society. We are pulled apart… and we all need to learn how to pull ourselves together… I think that at least part of the answer lies in solitude
spirituality.author: Helen Hayes

spirituality.quote: Talent is nurtured in solitude… A creation of importance can only be produced when its author isolates himself, it is a child of solitude
spirituality.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe

spirituality.quote: In the solitude of your dreams grows the flame that will bring the light to this world
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Sometimes, the most profound of awakenings come wrapped in the quietest of moments
spirituality.author: Stephen Crane

spirituality.quote: The beaten path is the safest, but the traffic’s terrible
spirituality.author: Jeff Taylor

spirituality.quote: Solitude is the soul’s holiday
spirituality.author: Katrina Kenison

spirituality.quote: A writer takes earnest measures to secure his solitude and then finds endless ways to squander it
spirituality.author: Don DeLillo

spirituality.quote: I know what men want. Men want to be really, really close to someone who will leave them alone
spirituality.author: Elayne Boosler

spirituality.quote: I’ve never been lonely. I like myself. I’m the best form of entertainment I have
spirituality.author: Charles Bukowski

spirituality.quote: Leave me alone, I’m trying to build! Don’t you know how people build? By concentrating!
spirituality.author: 5 years old building Lego (Twitter source)

spirituality.quote: When they are alone they want to be with others, and when they are with others they want to be alone. After all, human beings are like that
spirituality.author: Gertrude Stein

spirituality.quote: You don’t need to be a monk to find solitude, nor do you need to be a hermit to enjoy it
spirituality.author: Leo Babauta

spirituality.quote: I want to be with those who know secret things or else alone
spirituality.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

spirituality.quote: Life is an island in an ocean of solitude and seclusion.
spirituality.author: Kahlil Gibran

spirituality.quote: Solitude is fine but you need someone to tell that solitude is fine
spirituality.author: Honore de Balzac

spirituality.quote: People who grow bored in their own company seem to me in danger
spirituality.author: Andrei Tarkovsky

spirituality.quote: It is the barren silence of winter that makes the birdsong and blossoms of spring so enchanting
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: You need the rain to appreciate the sun, darkness to appreciate light, people to appreciate solitude
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: They simply never understand, do they, that sometimes solitude is one of the most beautiful things on earth?
spirituality.author: Charles Bukowski

spirituality.quote: Spend some time alone. There’s so much you don’t know about yourself
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: Although the wish for solitude can be a denial of dependence, a capacity for solitude may be its fullest acknowledgment
spirituality.author: Adam Phillips

spirituality.quote: Our perpetually networked selves cling to constant communication in an effort to avoid the deep-seated sense of loneliness we so dread
spirituality.author: Maria Popova

spirituality.quote: The man who is isolated, who is unable to share in the benefits of political association, or has no need to share because he is already self-sufficient, is no part of the polis, and must therefore be either a beast or a god
spirituality.author: Aristotle

spirituality.quote: We think we are unique, special and deserving of happiness, but we are terrified of being alone
spirituality.author: Sara Maitland

spirituality.quote: One of the best gifts we can give ourselves is time alone with God
spirituality.author: Joyce Meyer

spirituality.quote: If you can’t stand solitude, maybe you bore others too
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Men fear silence as they fear solitude, because both give them a glimpse of the terror of life’s nothingness
spirituality.author: Andre Maurois

spirituality.quote: We are all sentenced to solitary confinement inside our own skins, for life
spirituality.author: Tennessee Williams

spirituality.quote: Man loves company even if it is only that of a small burning candle
spirituality.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

spirituality.quote: Don’t fear solitude: If you are never alone, you cannot know yourself. But don’t get too attached to it – it may become an addiction
spirituality.author: Paulo Coelho

spirituality.quote: What we have done for ourselves alone dies with us; what we have done for others & the world remains and is immortal
spirituality.author: Albert Pike

spirituality.quote: When we cannot bear to be alone, it means we do not properly value the only companion we will have from birth to death — ourselves
spirituality.author: Eda LeShan

spirituality.quote: Give solitude a chance. You’ve got nothing to lose. And your life to gain back
spirituality.author: Joshua Becker

spirituality.quote: This task is yours and yours alone
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: I don’t mind being alone. I just don’t want to be part of the crowd
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: To have passed through life and never experienced solitude is to have never known oneself. To have never known oneself is to have never known anyone
spirituality.author: Joseph Krutch

spirituality.quote: If truth is what you seek, then the examined life will only take you on a long ride to the limits of solitude and leave you by the side of the road with your truth and nothing else
spirituality.author: Thomas Ligotti

spirituality.quote: Let me tell you this: if you meet a loner, no matter what they tell you, it’s not because they enjoy solitude. It’s because they have tried to blend into the world before, and people continue to disappoint them
spirituality.author: Jodi Picoult

spirituality.quote: I can tell you that solitude Is not all exaltation, inner space where the soul breathes and work can be done. Solitude exposes the nerve, Raises up ghosts. The past, never at rest, flows through it
spirituality.author: May Sarton

spirituality.quote: If the blissful connection of a counterpart is the apex of all human emotion, why am I so happy so stand alone and feel the breeze?
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Solitude was my only consolation – deep, dark, deathlike solitude
spirituality.author: Mary Shelley

spirituality.quote: A high degree of intellect tends to make a man unsocial
spirituality.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

spirituality.quote: Solitude shows us what should be; society shows us what we are
spirituality.author: Robert Cecil

spirituality.quote: Solitude is a good place to visit but a poor play to stay
spirituality.author: Josh Billings

spirituality.quote: The secret of a good old age is simply an honorable pact with solitude
spirituality.author: Gabriel García Márquez (One Hundred Years of Solitude)

spirituality.quote: The time when most of you should withdraw into yourself is when you are forced to be in a crowd
spirituality.author: Epicurus

spirituality.quote: I thought loving solitude was bad until I discovered a whole new world in it
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: On being alone: I think it’s a good thing to do; you get to know yourself, and I think that’s the most important thing in the whole world
spirituality.author: Robert Paul Smith

spirituality.quote: As a society moves from scarcity to abundance, the cultural value that is most likely to be underdeveloped is restraint
spirituality.author: Michael

spirituality.quote: Aloneness is obviously not isolation, and it is not uniqueness. To be unique is merely to be exceptional in some way, whereas to be completely alone demands extraordinary sensitivity, intelligence, understanding
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: Ordinary men hate solitude. But the Master makes use of it, embracing his aloneness, realizing he is one with the whole universe
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Respect the child. Be not too much his parent. Trespass not on his solitude
spirituality.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

spirituality.quote: The value of solitude – one of its values – is, of course, that there is nothing to cushion against attacks from within, just as there is nothing to help balance at times of particular stress or depression
spirituality.author: May Sarton

spirituality.quote: I’ve often been with someone and wished I was alone. I’ve never been alone and wished I was not
spirituality.author: Derek Sivers

spirituality.quote: The person who tries to live alone will not succeed as a human being. His heart withers if it does not answer another heart. His mind shrinks away if he hears only the echoes of his own thoughts and finds no other inspiration. Pearl S
spirituality.author: Buck

spirituality.quote: To make the right choices in life, you have to get in touch with your soul. To do to this, you need to experience solitude, which most people are afraid of, because in the silence you hear the truth and know the solutions
spirituality.author: Deepak Chopra

spirituality.quote: We visit others as a matter of social obligation
spirituality.author: How long has it been since we have visited with ourselves? Morris Adler

spirituality.quote: Solitude is different from loneliness, and it doesn’t have to be a lonely kind of thing
spirituality.author: Fred Rogers

spirituality.quote: A man can be himself only so long as he is alone; and if he does not love solitude, he will not love freedom; for it is only when he is alone that he is really free
spirituality.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

spirituality.quote: Solitude is the profoundest fact of the human condition. Man is the only being who knows he is alone, and the only one who seeks out another
spirituality.author: Octavio Paz

spirituality.quote: Man is nostalgia and a search for communion. Therefore, when he is aware of himself he is aware of his lack of another, that is, of his solitude
spirituality.author: Octavio Paz

spirituality.quote: We need society, and we need solitude also, as we need summer and winter, day and night, exercise and rest
spirituality.author: Philip Gilbert Hamerton

spirituality.quote: No person can achieve significance alone.
spirituality.author: John C. Maxwell

spirituality.quote: If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together
spirituality.author: Mel Robbins

spirituality.quote: In solitude one finds only what he carries there with him
spirituality.author: Juan Ramon Jimenez

spirituality.quote: I have been and still am a seeker, but I have ceased to question stars and books; I have begun to listen to the teaching my blood whispers to me
spirituality.author: Hermann Hesse

spirituality.quote: I have so much to do that I shall spend the first three hours in prayer
spirituality.author: Martin Luther

spirituality.quote: You’ll be calm the day you learn to sit alone and do nothing
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: The most beautiful experience we can have is the mysterious – the fundamental emotion which stands at the cradle of true art and true science
spirituality.author: Albert Einstein

spirituality.quote: The personal life deeply lived always expands into truths beyond itself
spirituality.author: Anais Nin

spirituality.quote: When you arise in the morning think of what a privilege it is to be alive, to think, to enjoy, to love
spirituality.author: Marcus Aurelius

spirituality.quote: Awakening is not changing who you are, but discarding who you are not
spirituality.author: Deepak Chopra

spirituality.quote: Only if we understand, will we care. Only if we care, will we help. Only if we help shall all be saved
spirituality.author: Jane Goodall

spirituality.quote: I close my eyes in order to see
spirituality.author: Paul Gauguin

spirituality.quote: At any moment, you have a choice, that either leads you closer to your spirit or further away from it
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: You have to grow from the inside out. None can teach you, none can make you spiritual. There is no other teacher but your own soul
spirituality.author: Swami Vivekananda

spirituality.quote: The least of things with a meaning is worth more in life than the greatest of things without it
spirituality.author: Carl Jung

spirituality.quote: Spirituality: the art of keeping your internal fire alive
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Let the breath lead the way
spirituality.author: Sharon Salzberg

spirituality.quote: The spiritual journey is the unlearning of fear and the acceptance of love
spirituality.author: Marianne Williamson

spirituality.quote: Within you there is a stillness and a sanctuary to which you can retreat at any time and be yourself
spirituality.author: Hermann Hesse

spirituality.quote: The spiritual life does not remove us from the world but leads us deeper into it. Henri J.M
spirituality.author: Nouwen

spirituality.quote: Religion, science, and spirituality help us make sense of the world. Life without at least one of them is a lonely and confusing place
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you have. Make the now the primary focus of your life
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Being at ease with not knowing is crucial for answers to come to you
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: He who is filled with love is filled with God himself
spirituality.author: Augustine of Hippo

spirituality.quote: When you connect to the silence within you, that is when you can make sense of the disturbance going on around you
spirituality.author: Stephen Richards

spirituality.quote: Fools laugh at others. Wisdom laughs at itself
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: If you think you’re enlightened go spend a week with your family
spirituality.author: Ram Dass

spirituality.quote: It is in our wild nature that we best recover from our un-nature, our spirituality
spirituality.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

spirituality.quote: A single event can awaken within us a stranger totally unknown to us. To live is to be slowly born
spirituality.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

spirituality.quote: This moment is all there is
spirituality.author: Rumi

spirituality.quote: The soul is placed in the body like a rough diamond and must be polished, or the luster of it will never appear
spirituality.author: Daniel Defoe

spirituality.quote: God will not look you over for medals, degrees or diplomas but for scars
spirituality.author: Elbert Hubbard

spirituality.quote: The moment one gives close attention to anything, even a blade of grass, it becomes a mysterious, awesome, indescribably magnificent world in itself
spirituality.author: Henry Miller

spirituality.quote: When you realize there is no lacking, the whole world belongs to you
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: I choose gentleness… Nothing is won by force. I choose to be gentle. If I raise my voice may it be only in praise. If I clench my fist, may it be only in prayer. If I make a demand, may it be only of myself
spirituality.author: Max Lucado

spirituality.quote: Learn to get in touch with the silence within yourself and know that everything in this life has a purpose. There are no mistakes, no coincidences. All events are blessings given to us to learn from
spirituality.author: Elizabeth Kübler-Ross

spirituality.quote: Realisation is not acquisition of anything new nor is it a new faculty. It is only removal of all camouflage
spirituality.author: Ramana Maharshi

spirituality.quote: If a man is to live, he must be all alive, body, soul, mind, heart, spirit
spirituality.author: Thomas Merton

spirituality.quote: Relax into the moment and let the universe do the driving. If there was a secret to happiness in life, I’d say that was it
spirituality.author: Jed McKenna

spirituality.quote: Nurture great thoughts, for you will never go higher than your thoughts
spirituality.author: Benjamin Disraeli

spirituality.quote: Who looks outside, dreams. Who looks inside, awakens
spirituality.author: Carl Jung

spirituality.quote: The unexamined life is not worth living
spirituality.author: Socrates

spirituality.quote: Music is the mediator between the spiritual and the sensual life
spirituality.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

spirituality.quote: It isn’t until you come to a spiritual understanding of who you are – not necessarily a religious feeling, but deep down, the spirit within – that you can begin to take control
spirituality.author: Oprah Winfrey

spirituality.quote: You must live in the present, launch yourself on every wave, find your eternity in each moment. Fools stand on their island of opportunities and look toward another land. There is no other land; there is no other life but this
spirituality.author: Henry David Thoreau

spirituality.quote: Nothing is, unless our thinking makes it so
spirituality.author: William Shakespeare

spirituality.quote: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves
spirituality.author: William Shakespeare

spirituality.quote: It is better in prayer to have a heart without words than words without a heart
spirituality.author: Mahatma Gandhi

spirituality.quote: The Way is not in the sky; the Way is in the heart
spirituality.author: Buddha

spirituality.quote: Physical strength can never permanently withstand the impact of spiritual force. Franklin D
spirituality.author: Roosevelt

spirituality.quote: I believe in God, but not as one thing, not as an old man in the sky. I believe that what people call God is something in all of us
spirituality.author: John Lennon

spirituality.quote: This new day is too dear, with its hopes and invitations, to waste a moment on the yesterdays
spirituality.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

spirituality.quote: Meditation is the dissolution of thoughts in eternal awareness or pure consciousness without objectification, knowing without thinking, merging finitude in infinity
spirituality.author: Voltaire

spirituality.quote: My religion consists of a humble admiration of the illimitable superior spirit who reveals himself in the slight details we are able to perceive with our frail and feeble mind
spirituality.author: Albert Einstein

spirituality.quote: The greater the doubt, the greater the awakening
spirituality.author: Albert Einstein

spirituality.quote: Let the measure of time be spiritual, not mechanical
spirituality.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

spirituality.quote: Wake up and live
spirituality.author: Bob Marley

spirituality.quote: I am realistic – I expect miracles
spirituality.author: Wayne Dyer

spirituality.quote: Do anything, but let it produce joy
spirituality.author: Walt Whitman

spirituality.quote: The Holy Land is everywhere
spirituality.author: Black Elk (Native American)

spirituality.quote: Forever is composed of nows
spirituality.author: Emily Dickinson

spirituality.quote: Be guided by spirit and not driven by ego
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: There is nothing more important than this moment
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: It is in pardoning that we are pardoned
spirituality.author: Francis of Assisi

spirituality.quote: For it is in giving that we receive
spirituality.author: Francis of Assisi

spirituality.quote: Everything in the world was my Guru
spirituality.author: Ramana Maharshi

spirituality.quote: Quiet the mind and the soul will speak
spirituality.author: Ma Jaya Sati Bhagavati

spirituality.quote: Spiritual progress is like a detoxification
spirituality.author: Marianne Williamson

spirituality.quote: Reach for a thought that feels better
spirituality.author: Abraham Hicks

spirituality.quote: Your thoughts become things
spirituality.author: Rhonda Byrne

spirituality.quote: Your thoughts are the primary cause of everything
spirituality.author: Rhonda Byrne

spirituality.quote: Be here, now!
spirituality.author: Ram Dass

spirituality.quote: When you make a choice, you change the future
spirituality.author: Deepak Chopra

spirituality.quote: God finds himself by creating
spirituality.author: Rabindranath Tagore

spirituality.quote: You must find the place inside yourself where nothing is impossible
spirituality.author: Deepak Chopra

spirituality.quote: When a man is willing and eager, the Gods join in
spirituality.author: Aeschylus

spirituality.quote: Arise, awake, stop not till the goal is reached
spirituality.author: Swami Vivekananda

spirituality.quote: And the time came when the risk to remain tight in a bud was more painful than the risk it took to blossom
spirituality.author: Anais Nin

spirituality.quote: The world is full of magic things, patiently waiting for our senses to grow sharper.
spirituality.author: W.B. Yeats

spirituality.quote: Be tolerant of those who are lost on their path. Ignorance, conceit, anger, jealousy and greed stem from a lost soul. Pray that they will find guidance
spirituality.author: Elder Wisdom

spirituality.quote: I have seen that in any great undertaking it is not enough for a man to depend simply upon himself
spirituality.author: Shooter Teton Sioux (Native American)

spirituality.quote: One of the most spiritual things you can do is embrace your humanity. Connect with those around you today. Say, "I love you", "I’m sorry", "I appreciate you", "I’m proud of you"…whatever you’re feeling. Send random texts, write a cute note, embrace your truth and share it…cause a smile today for someone else…and give plenty of hugs
spirituality.author: Steve Maraboli

spirituality.quote: You and your purpose in life are the same thing. Your purpose is to be you
spirituality.author: George Alexiou

spirituality.quote: Equanimity arises when we accept the way things are
spirituality.author: Jack Kornfield

spirituality.quote: I am convinced that the jealous, the angry, the bitter and the egotistical are the first to race to the top of mountains. A confident person enjoys the journey, the people they meet along the way and sees life not as a competition. They reach the summit last because they know God isn’t at the top waiting for them. He is down below helping his followers to understand that the view is glorious where ever you stand. Shannon L
spirituality.author: Alder

spirituality.quote: You must not let your life run in the ordinary way; do something that nobody else has done, something that will dazzle the world. Show that God’s creative principle works in you
spirituality.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

spirituality.quote: Bring into play the almighty power within you, so that on the stage of life you can fulfill your high destined role
spirituality.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

spirituality.quote: The privilege of a lifetime is to become who you really are
spirituality.author: Carl Jung

spirituality.quote: All power is within you; you can do anything and everything. Believe in that, do not believe that you are weak; do not believe that you are half-crazy lunatics, as most of us do nowadays. You can do any thing and everything, without even the guidance of any one. Stand up and express the divinity within you
spirituality.author: Swami Vivekananda

spirituality.quote: Walk with the dreamers, the believers, the courageous, the cheerful, the planners, the doers, the successful people with their heads in the clouds and their feet on the ground. Let their spirit ignite a fire within you to leave this world better than when you found it
spirituality.author: Wilferd Peterson

spirituality.quote: Inside us there is something that has no name, that something is what we are
spirituality.author: José Saramago

spirituality.quote: The resting place of the mind is the heart. The only thing the mind hears all day is clanging bells and noise and argument, and all it wants is quietude. The only place the mind will ever find peace is inside the silence of the heart. That’s where you need to go
spirituality.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

spirituality.quote: The real spiritual progress of the aspirant is measured by the extent to which he achieves inner tranquility
spirituality.author: Swami Sivananda

spirituality.quote: You will have to create the path by walking yourself; the path is not ready-made, lying there and waiting for you
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: You are never alone. You are eternally connected with everyone
spirituality.author: Amit Ray

spirituality.quote: You are your master. Only you have the master keys to open the inner locks
spirituality.author: Amit Ray

spirituality.quote: The power within you is greater than the power within the world
spirituality.author: Rhonda Byrne

spirituality.quote: To be in time is to be asleep: to be awake is to be in eternity
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Unless you are totally destroyed as a mind, there is no hope for you
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Begin to see yourself as a soul with a body rather than a body with a soul
spirituality.author: Wayne Dyer

spirituality.quote: Rather than being your thoughts and emotions, be the awareness behind them
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: When everything gets answered, it’s fake
spirituality.author: Sean Penn

spirituality.quote: The truth is that you already are what you are seeking
spirituality.author: Adyashanti

spirituality.quote: The truth is that the universe has been answering you all of your life, but you cannot receive the answers unless you are awake.
spirituality.author: Rhonda Byrne

spirituality.quote: Knock, and He’ll open the door. Vanish, And He’ll make you shine like the sun. Fall, and He’ll raise you to the heavens. Become nothing, and He’ll turn you into everything
spirituality.author: Rumi

spirituality.quote: We are not human beings having a spiritual experience. We are spiritual beings having a human experience
spirituality.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

spirituality.quote: You are never alone or helpless. The force that guides the stars, guides you too
spirituality.author: Shrii Shirr Anandamurti

spirituality.quote: Let what comes come. Let what goes go. Find out what remains
spirituality.author: Ramana Maharshi

spirituality.quote: If we want greater clarity in our purpose or deeper and more meaningful spiritual lives, vulnerability is the path
spirituality.author: Brené Brown

spirituality.quote: When the heart speaks, the mind finds it indecent to object
spirituality.author: Milan Kundera

spirituality.quote: Religion is for people who’re afraid of going to hell. Spirituality is for those who’ve already been there
spirituality.author: Vine Deloria Jr (Native American)

spirituality.quote: The meaning of life is just to be alive. It is so plain and so obvious and so simple. And yet, everybody rushes around in a great panic as if it were necessary to achieve something beyond themselves
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: The want of goods is easily repaired, but the poverty of the soul is irreparable
spirituality.author: Michel de Montaigne

spirituality.quote: We are at our most powerful the moment we no longer need to be powerful
spirituality.author: Eric Micha’el Leventhal

spirituality.quote: Eventually, all that one has learnt will have to be forgotten
spirituality.author: Ramana Maharshi

spirituality.quote: The game is not about becoming somebody, it’s about becoming nobody
spirituality.author: Ram Dass

spirituality.quote: Enlightenment means taking full responsibility for your life
spirituality.author: William Blake

spirituality.quote: Re-examine all you have been told. Dismiss what insults your soul
spirituality.author: Walt Whitman

spirituality.quote: Wisdom says we are nothing. Love says we are everything. Between these two our life flows
spirituality.author: Jack Kornfield

spirituality.quote: In a conflict between the heart and the brain, follow your heart
spirituality.author: Swami Vivekananda

spirituality.quote: Anything that makes weak – physically, intellectually and spiritually, reject it as poison
spirituality.author: Swami Vivekananda

spirituality.quote: A life of reaction is a life of slavery, intellectually and spiritually. One must fight for a life of action, not reaction
spirituality.author: Rita Mae Brown

spirituality.quote: Enlightenment means waking up to what you truly are and then being that
spirituality.author: Adyashanti

spirituality.quote: Help me never to judge another until I have walked a mile in his moccasins
spirituality.author: Indian prayer

spirituality.quote: It took me forty years on earth to reach this sure conclusion: there is no Heaven but clarity, no Hell except confusion
spirituality.author: Jan Struther

spirituality.quote: Your sacred space is where you can find yourself over and over again
spirituality.author: Joseph Campbell

spirituality.quote: Where there is charity and wisdom, there is neither fear nor ignorance
spirituality.author: Francis of Assisi

spirituality.quote: Everything that has a beginning has an ending. Make your peace with that and all will be well
spirituality.author: Jack Kornfield

spirituality.quote: You can read books without ever stepping into a library; and practice spirituality without ever going to a temple
spirituality.author: Anthony de Mello

spirituality.quote: If you wish to know the divine, feel the wind on your face and the warm sun on your back
spirituality.author: Eido Tai Shimano Roshi

spirituality.quote: You are awareness. Awareness is another name for you. Since you are awareness there is no need to attain or cultivate it
spirituality.author: Ramana Maharshi

spirituality.quote: The path of awakening is not about becoming who you are. Rather it is about unbecoming who you are not
spirituality.author: Albert Schweitzer

spirituality.quote: There is something wonderfully bold and liberating about saying yes to our entire imperfect and messy life
spirituality.author: Tara Brach

spirituality.quote: Observing desire without acting on it enlarges our freedom to choose how we live
spirituality.author: Tara Brach

spirituality.quote: Do what is right at a given moment and leave it behind
spirituality.author: Ramana Maharshi

spirituality.quote: Knowing others is wisdom, knowing yourself is enlightenment
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Here’s all you need to know to become enlightened: Sit down, shut up, and ask yourself what’s true until you know. That’s it
spirituality.author: Jed McKenna

spirituality.quote: Instructions for living a life: Pay attention. Be astonished. Tell about it
spirituality.author: Mary Oliver

spirituality.quote: The true meaning of life is to plant trees, under whose shade you do not expect to sit
spirituality.author: Nelson Henderson

spirituality.quote: What the superior man seeks is in himself; what the ordinary man seeks is in others
spirituality.author: Confucius (Analects, Amazon book)

spirituality.quote: If my life is going to mean anything, I have to live it myself
spirituality.author: Rick Riorda

spirituality.quote: Would you live with ease, do what you ought, and not what you please
spirituality.author: Benjamin Franklin

spirituality.quote: Our purpose here is to wake up to the truth of who we are and all of the truth around us
spirituality.author: Aubrey Marcus

spirituality.quote: Peace is possible, lasting happiness is not. Once you realize that, you stop seeking and you finally relax
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Your life can change if you do the hard thing, make the hard decision, have the hard conversation, have total honesty. Avoid contours and go straight to the point
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Live your life as you see fit. That’s not selfish. Selfish is to demand that others live their lives as you see fit
spirituality.author: Anthony de Mello

spirituality.quote: The greatest use of life is to spend it on something that will outlast it
spirituality.author: William James

spirituality.quote: Your goal in life is to find out the people who need you the most, to find out the business that needs you the most, to find the project and the art that needs you the most. There is something out there just for you
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: My goal is no longer to get more done, but rather to have less to do
spirituality.author: Francine Jay

spirituality.quote: One day you will realize that material things mean nothing. All that matters is the well-being and happiness of the people you love in your life
spirituality.author: Ken Rutkowski

spirituality.quote: With whatever you’re doing in life… if you know it’s true, if you know it’s real, you have to do it… That’s where the magic is
spirituality.author: Kamal Ravikant

spirituality.quote: As you walk and eat and travel, be where you are. Otherwise you will miss most of your life
spirituality.author: Buddha

spirituality.quote: For better or worse, what you allow will continue
spirituality.author: Paulo Coelho

spirituality.quote: Only give a fuck about what is true and important
spirituality.author: Mark Manson

spirituality.quote: Life is not a competition, it’s a game. It’s not about winning or losing, it’s about all the fun we can have before it ends
spirituality.author: Richard Feynman

spirituality.quote: The certainty you’re craving makes you suffer more than the uncertainty you’re avoiding
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Don’t rush through your life. Spend time appreciating right where you are
spirituality.author: Daily Zen

spirituality.quote: To investigate and analyze, with understanding and logic, the principles we ought to live by. Not to display anger or other emotions. To be free of passion and yet full of love
spirituality.author: Marcus Aurelius

spirituality.quote: Avoid the false path. A false path in life is generally something we are attracted to for the wrong reasons — money, fame, attention, and so on
spirituality.author: Robert Greene

spirituality.quote: A busy life seemingly chooses us, but we get to intentionally choose a full life by identifying what matters and getting rid of what doesn’t.
spirituality.author: Courtney Carver

spirituality.quote: If you are always getting ready for the next thing, how will you ever enjoy this thing?
spirituality.author: Courtney Carver

spirituality.quote: Don’t judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant
spirituality.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

spirituality.quote: Life is simple, but not easy. The problem is we want life to be easy, which makes it complicated
spirituality.author: Shane Parrish

spirituality.quote: Don’t worry about death, pay attention, read a lot, give up control, embrace imperfection
spirituality.author: Maria Popova

spirituality.quote: It’s the small habits, how you spend your morning, how you talk to yourself, what you read, what you watch, who you share your energy with, that will change your life
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: Be a good steward of your gifts. Protect your time. Feed your inner life. Avoid too much noise. Read good books, have good sentences in your ears. Be by yourself as often as you can. Walk
spirituality.author: Jane Kenyon

spirituality.quote: Most of us have spent our lives caught up in plans, expectations, ambitions for the future; in regrets, guilt or shame about the past. To come into the present is to stop the war
spirituality.author: Jack Kornfield

spirituality.quote: I saw that it was the artificial needs of life that made me a slave; the real needs of life were few
spirituality.author: William James Dawson (The Quest of the Simple Life, Amazon book)

spirituality.quote: There is no destination. This is life, this moment. Savor and appreciate it
spirituality.author: Daily Zen

spirituality.quote: People say that what we’re all seeking is a meaning for life. I don’t think that’s what we’re really seeking. I think that what we’re seeking is an experience of being alive… so that we actually feel the rapture of being alive
spirituality.author: Joseph Campbell

spirituality.quote: The greatest obstacle to living is expectancy, which hangs upon tomorrow and loses today… The whole future lies in uncertainty: live immediately
spirituality.author: Seneca

spirituality.quote: Forging a new path is far more satisfying than following a map will ever be
spirituality.author: James Pierce

spirituality.quote: To know precisely what you want is one of the great treasures in life
spirituality.author: James Pierce

spirituality.quote: Simple rule to live by: Be a good human
spirituality.author: Anthony Pompliano

spirituality.quote: Build a life. Don’t live one, build one
spirituality.author: Ashton Kutcher

spirituality.quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity
spirituality.author: Albert Einstein

spirituality.quote: Life becomes harder for us when we live for others, but it also becomes richer and happier
spirituality.author: Albert Schweitzer

spirituality.quote: We are here on earth to live, grow up and do what we can to make this world a better place for all people to enjoy freedom
spirituality.author: Rosa Parks

spirituality.quote: I can be changed by what happens to me but I refuse to be reduced by it
spirituality.author: Maya Angelou

spirituality.quote: Be here now. Be in the moment. The now is the greatest moment of our lives and it just keeps getting better. The bad parts the boring parts the parts with high anxiety. Embrace every moment for its greatness. This is life. This is the greatest movie we will ever see
spirituality.author: Kanye West

spirituality.quote: I have come to accept life as a process, and am satisfied that in my ever-going process, I am constantly discovering, expanding, finding the cause of my ignorance, in martial art and especially in life. In short, to be real
spirituality.author: Bruce Lee

spirituality.quote: Make your interests gradually wider and more impersonal, until bit by bit the walls of the ego recede, and your life becomes increasingly merged in the universal life
spirituality.author: Bertrand Russell

spirituality.quote: Being ignorant is not so much a shame, as being unwilling to learn
spirituality.author: Benjamin Franklin

spirituality.quote: Success must include two things: the development of an individual to his utmost potentiality and a contribution of some kind to one’s world
spirituality.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

spirituality.quote: Only those are fit to live who do not fear to die; and none are fit to die who have shrunk from the joy of life and the duty of life
spirituality.author: Theodore Roosevelt

spirituality.quote: Every day, you have the power to choose our better history — by opening your hearts and minds, by speaking up for what you know is right
spirituality.author: Michelle Obama

spirituality.quote: Do we settle for the world as it is, or do we work for the world as it should be?
spirituality.author: Michelle Obama

spirituality.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don’t matter and those who matter don’t mind.
spirituality.author: Dr. Seuss

spirituality.quote: The only happy people I know are the ones who are working well at something they consider important
spirituality.author: Abraham Maslow

spirituality.quote: Tone your wants and tastes low down enough, and make much of negatives, and of mere daylight and the skies
spirituality.author: Walt Whitman

spirituality.quote: Nothing can make our life, or the lives of other people, more beautiful than perpetual kindness
spirituality.author: Leo Tolstoy

spirituality.quote: Don’t practice things that you do not want to become
spirituality.author: Jordan Peterson

spirituality.quote: Real generosity toward the future lies in giving all to the present
spirituality.author: Albert Camus

spirituality.quote: Take fun seriously
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: Whatever you do, do it well
spirituality.author: Walt Disney

spirituality.quote: Take care of this moment
spirituality.author: Mahatma Gandhi

spirituality.quote: Stay the course with courage. D
spirituality.author: Muthukrishnan

spirituality.quote: Trust the timing of your life
spirituality.author: Payal Kadakia

spirituality.quote: Let your life unfold naturally
spirituality.author: Daily Zen

spirituality.quote: Don’t be afraid to be an idealist
spirituality.author: Maria Popova

spirituality.quote: Change the world by being yourself
spirituality.author: Amy Poehler

spirituality.quote: Order your soul. Reduce your wants
spirituality.author: Augustine of Hippo

spirituality.quote: Fate shuffles the cards and we play
spirituality.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

spirituality.quote: You never fail until you stop trying
spirituality.author: Albert Einstein

spirituality.quote: Embrace the glorious mess that you are
spirituality.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

spirituality.quote: Give yourself a gift: the present moment
spirituality.author: Marcus Aurelius

spirituality.quote: Make space for more life, not more stuff
spirituality.author: Courtney Carver

spirituality.quote: Be the peace you wish to see in the world
spirituality.author: Martin Luther King Jr

spirituality.quote: Never regret anything that made you smile
spirituality.author: Mark Twain

spirituality.quote: See life as a game, but don’t keep a scoreboard
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Spend your time doing only what you can uniquely do
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Where you spend your attention is where you spend your life
spirituality.author: James Clear

spirituality.quote: Each day, make sure to do something that is your idea of bliss
spirituality.author: Rhonda Byrne

spirituality.quote: Don’t be pushed by your problems. Be led by your dreams
spirituality.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

spirituality.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light
spirituality.author: Aristotle

spirituality.quote: Leave something of sweetness and substance in the mouth of the world
spirituality.author: Emily Levine

spirituality.quote: Don’t mind what they think. Just do your own thing, at your own pace, in your own style
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: None of us know what will happen. Don’t spend time worrying about it. Make the most beautiful thing you can. Try to do that every day. That’s it
spirituality.author: Laurie Anderson

spirituality.quote: You are only as mentally tough as your life demands you to be. An easy life fashions a mind that can only handle ease. A challenging life builds a mind that can handle challenge. Like a muscle that atrophies without use, mental strength fades unless it is tested. When life doesn’t challenge you, challenge yourself
spirituality.author: James Clear

spirituality.quote: Do you know what the best moment of your life is? The very moment you are living right now. Because this is the only moment you truly have, all other moments are imaginary. Give it all to every moment you live. Don’t save it for some other time because there is no other time
spirituality.author: Kunal

spirituality.quote: You only get one shot at this thing called life, so why wouldn’t you put your entire being into it to create the best story ever written?
spirituality.author: Scott Barry Kaufman

spirituality.quote: When you become comfortable with uncertainty, infinite possibilities open up in your life. It means fear is no longer a dominant factor in what you do and no longer prevents you from taking action to initiate change
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Your long-term happiness and fulfillment depend on your ability to fulfill your soul’s unique purpose and to fill the place in the world that only you can fill, making the contribution that only you can make
spirituality.author: Rod Stryker

spirituality.quote: Love the earth and sun and the animals, despise riches… devote your income and labor to others… re-examine all you have been told at school or church or in any book, dismiss whatever insults your own soul
spirituality.author: Walt Whitman

spirituality.quote: I’ve decided I’m going to live this life for some time to come. The freedom and simple beauty is just too good to pass up
spirituality.author: Christopher McCandless (Into the Wild)

spirituality.quote: To be human is to leap toward our highest moral potentialities, only to trip over the foibled actualities of our reflexive patterns. To be a good human is to keep leaping anyway
spirituality.author: Maria Popova

spirituality.quote: Life is less about how old you are and more about when you decide to live
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: Be awake enough to see where you are at any given time and how that is beautiful and has poetry inside
spirituality.author: Jeff Buckley

spirituality.quote: One day you will wake up and there won’t be any more time to do the things you’ve always wanted. Do it now
spirituality.author: Paulo Coelho

spirituality.quote: Your story is what you have, what you will always have. It is something to own
spirituality.author: Michelle Obama

spirituality.quote: Living doesn’t cost much, but showing off does.
spirituality.author: Jeffrey D. Sachs

spirituality.quote: Thank God I didn’t have a fast forward button for life, or I’d be dead by now
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: No one is more dangerously insane than one who is sane all the time: he is like a steel bridge without flexibility, and the order of his life is rigid and brittle
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: Life doesn’t have a pause button. Life doesn’t have a rewind button. Life doesn’t have a fast-forward button
spirituality.author: Life has only one button: Play! Thibaut

spirituality.quote: I would rather risk wearing out than rusting out
spirituality.author: Theodore Roosevelt

spirituality.quote: If you tell the truth, you don’t have to remember anything
spirituality.author: Mark Twain

spirituality.quote: You are only entitled to the action, never to its fruits
spirituality.author: Bhagavad Gita

spirituality.quote: We are really alive when we live in non-belief
spirituality.author: Byron Katie

spirituality.quote: Life’s three best teachers: heartbreak, empty pocket, failures
spirituality.author: Haemin Sunim

spirituality.quote: Situations are powerless if you don’t react. D
spirituality.author: Muthukrishnan

spirituality.quote: The only limits for tomorrow are the doubts we have today
spirituality.author: Pittacus Lore

spirituality.quote: No one owes you anything. No one cares if you fail. No one is coming to save you
spirituality.author: Jack Butcher

spirituality.quote: Every day spent half-asleep, living half-heartedly is like a gift left unopened, an absurd waste of your life
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: You’re better off making the best of your life rather than trying to fix society
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: On your very last day, you’d trade everything you have for another sunny day. Just like the one you take for granted today
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: If we can advance the knowledge of the world — if we can do things that expand the scope and scale of consciousness — then we’re better able to ask the right questions and become more enlightened, and that’s really the only way forward
spirituality.author: Elon Musk

spirituality.quote: The perfected future never arrives. Life is full of seemingly endless trouble, and then life ends. Find peace in the imperfect present
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: When all of your free time is spent catching up or getting ahead, that’s not free time
spirituality.author: Courtney Carver

spirituality.quote: If you don’t prioritize your life, someone else will
spirituality.author: Greg McKeown

spirituality.quote: Nothing ever goes as planned – build this into your plans
spirituality.author: Daily Zen

spirituality.quote: Meaning comes when you take nothing for granted
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: See the world as it is, not as you wish it would be
spirituality.author: Emily Lockhart

spirituality.quote: Nothing happens ahead of its time, and what needs to happen always happens
spirituality.author: Byron Katie

spirituality.quote: We can cultivate a deeper focus, but it must start with a recognition that our time is precious and limited
spirituality.author: Leo Babauta

spirituality.quote: It’s better to have a short life that is full of what you like doing, than a long life spent in a miserable way
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: Learn to stay alone, unfazed, doing nothing. If you can do that daily, you’re indeed a wise man
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: To be a good human being is to have a kind of openness to the world, an ability to trust uncertain things beyond your own control
spirituality.author: Martha Nussbaum

spirituality.quote: Be empty. Let thoughts and sensations flow through you. Don’t cling to anything. Don’t let anything stick to you. Offer no resistance. Let things come, let them go. Remain unconcerned. You have nothing to do with the ever changing movie of life. You’re the ever present witness
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Whenever I see a person suffering from nervousness, I think, well, what can he expect? If he had not set his sights on things outside man’s control, his nervousness would end at once
spirituality.author: Epictetus

spirituality.quote: No use of speed if you are going in the wrong direction. Choose the right strategy for you and move at your own pace. It is the direction and not the speed which decides your success.
spirituality.author: D. Muthukrishnan

spirituality.quote: Nothing in life is to be feared; it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more so that we may fear less
spirituality.author: Marie Curie

spirituality.quote: You’re only here for a short visit. Don’t hurry, don’t worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way
spirituality.author: Walter Hagen

spirituality.quote: Systematically remove things from your life to learn if they are actually important
spirituality.author: Angela Jiang

spirituality.quote: The young are truthful, the old kind, the wise both
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Living a life of integrity pays off, but it takes a very long time
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: You don’t have problems. You have challenges. Simple reframe to prime you to deal with the sh*t of the day
spirituality.author: Ed Latimore

spirituality.quote: Be transparent as possible. Stop setting plays. Stop playing chess with life. Make decisions based on love not fear
spirituality.author: Kanye West

spirituality.quote: When we eliminate effort, we eliminate life’s pleasures
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: When it’s tough, remember you’ll learn and grow. When it’s really tough, focus on your next step
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: You can’t learn from remembering. You can’t learn from guessing. You can learn only from moving forward at the rate you are moved, as brightness into brightness
spirituality.author: Sarah Manguso

spirituality.quote: Man is like a canoeist directing his course through waves. One after another he meets them. They may be heavy and powerful or they may be light ruffles of a sunshiny day in midsummer. He must ride them all
spirituality.author: Karl De Schweinitz

spirituality.quote: How noble and good everyone could be if, every evening before falling asleep, they were to recall to mind the events of the whole day and consider exactly what has been good and bad. Then, without realizing it, you try to improve yourself at the start of each new day; of course, you achieve quite a lot in the course of time
spirituality.author: Anne Frank

spirituality.quote: It doesn’t matter how much money you’re willing to pay on your deathbed, you’re not going to be able to buy back more time
spirituality.author: Tim Ferriss

spirituality.quote: Simplicity is an important element in all great art, for it means the removal of all details that are irrelevant to a given purpose. It is one of the arts within the great art of life
spirituality.author: Richard Gregg

spirituality.quote: The fool believes his way is always correct; the wise man allows room for doubt
spirituality.author: Jack Peach

spirituality.quote: Or perhaps one can learn only by one’s own mistakes. The essential thing is to learn. Learning and living
spirituality.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

spirituality.quote: How you are living now is how you are living your entire life. Tomorrow won’t be any different
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: You are the author of your life. If you don’t like how it goes, write it differently
spirituality.author: Iva Kenaz

spirituality.quote: Life doesn’t require that we be the best, only that we try our best.
spirituality.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr

spirituality.quote: The trick is to maintain a kind of naive amazement at each instant of experience
spirituality.author: Sarah Bakewell

spirituality.quote: Envy those who see beauty in everything in the world
spirituality.author: Egon Schiele

spirituality.quote: The more you seek certainty, the more insecure you would be.
spirituality.author: D. Muthukrishnan

spirituality.quote: Progress is when you focus more on your dream than reality. Happiness is when you accept reality more than your dreams
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: When we try to juggle everything, we can’t enjoy anything
spirituality.author: Courtney Carver

spirituality.quote: Being generous is one of the quickest paths to happiness, fulfillment, and satisfaction
spirituality.author: Joshua Becker

spirituality.quote: Society has sold you the greatest of lies, that the goal of life is to become "happy." This one chase has cost you your life
spirituality.author: Kapil Gupta

spirituality.quote: If we were not so single-minded about keeping our lives moving, and for once could do nothing, perhaps a huge silence might interrupt this sadness of never understanding ourselves
spirituality.author: Pablo Neruda

spirituality.quote: The habit of looking to the future and thinking that the whole meaning of the present lies in what it will bring forth is a pernicious one
spirituality.author: Bertrand Russell

spirituality.quote: Don’t wait until there is no suffering in the world to be happy. The world is as it is. People are the way they are. To reject it would be to wilfully engage in ignorance. Once you accept the world and find some peace within yourself, feel free to change anything you like
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: While you are busy thinking about the things you wish you had, The current moment that you do have slips away
spirituality.author: Kunal

spirituality.quote: The supreme value is not the future but the present. Whoever builds a house for future happiness builds a prison for the present
spirituality.author: Octavio Paz

spirituality.quote: If one is shining a bright spotlight on here and now, one cannot see the past or the future anymore
spirituality.author: Ichiro Kishimi & Fumitake Koga

spirituality.quote: If you approach life as though you have something to gain from it, you will never stop searching for things you do not have
spirituality.author: James Pierce

spirituality.quote: Simplicity doesn’t change who you are, it brings you back to who you are
spirituality.author: Courtney Carver

spirituality.quote: Chasing peace keeps one from peace
spirituality.author: James Pierce

spirituality.quote: All you have is what you are, and what you give.
