spirituality.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

spirituality.quote: Don’t trade your authenticity for approval
spirituality.author: Kanye West

spirituality.quote: When people try to tell you who you are, don’t believe them
spirituality.author: Maria Popova

spirituality.quote: Be generous with your time and your resources and with giving credit and, especially, with your words
spirituality.author: Maria Popova

spirituality.quote: The older I get, the more I understand that it’s okay to live a life others don’t understand
spirituality.author: Jenna Woginrich

spirituality.quote: A life lived according to the words of others is a life of imprisonment
spirituality.author: James Pierce

spirituality.quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
spirituality.author: Booker T. Washington

spirituality.quote: There are few things more liberating in life than giving up the need to be liked by everyone
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: It has never been about quantity, but about the quality. Real friends care and they show it
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: If you don’t get out there and define yourself, you’ll be quickly and inaccurately defined by others
spirituality.author: Michelle Obama

spirituality.quote: Time, as far as my father was concerned, was a gift you gave to other people
spirituality.author: Michelle Obama

spirituality.quote: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart
spirituality.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

spirituality.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent
spirituality.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

spirituality.quote: It is beautiful to express love and even more beautiful to feel it
spirituality.author: Dejan Stojanovic

spirituality.quote: Practice kindness all day to everybody and you will realize you’re already in heaven now
spirituality.author: Jack Kerouac

spirituality.quote: Poetry, beauty, romance, love, these are what we stay alive for
spirituality.author: John Keating (Robin Williams in Dead Poets Society)

spirituality.quote: Work like you don’t need the money. Love like you’ve never been hurt. Dance like nobody’s watching
spirituality.author: Satchel Paige

spirituality.quote: If you want real connection and honest answers, check your heart more than you check your phone
spirituality.author: Courtney Carver

spirituality.quote: Love life and life will love you back. Love people and they will love you back
spirituality.author: Arthur Rubinstein

spirituality.quote: Wake at dawn with a winged heart and give thanks for another day of loving
spirituality.author: Kahlil Gibran

spirituality.quote: Trust your intuition and be guided by love
spirituality.author: Charles Eisenstein

spirituality.quote: Chase nothing. Avoid nothing. Love is all about accepting
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Gentleness is powerful. When we use gentle and loving speech, we are able to transform anger, fear, resentment and suspicion in our communication. The whole intention of loving speech is to understand the other person and to be understood
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: If you can fall in love again and again… if you can forgive as well as forget, if you can keep from growing sour, surly, bitter and cynical… you’ve got it half licked
spirituality.author: Henry Miller

spirituality.quote: Plant your garden and decorate your own soul, instead of waiting for someone to bring you flowers
spirituality.author: Jose Luis Borges

spirituality.quote: You can only go with loves in this life
spirituality.author: Ray Bradbury

spirituality.quote: Underneath the excess and the extra, the busyness and the chaos, your life is waiting
spirituality.author: Courtney Carver

spirituality.quote: I finally figured it out. Instead of working so hard to make ends meet, work on having fewer ends
spirituality.author: Courtney Carver

spirituality.quote: Preoccupation with efficacy is the main obstacle to a poetic, elegant, robust and heroic life
spirituality.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

spirituality.quote: Practice doing what you need to do even when you don’t want to. Get it done first so you don’t have to keep thinking about it
spirituality.author: Sam Altman

spirituality.quote: Great things come from hard work and perseverance. No excuses
spirituality.author: Kobe Bryant

spirituality.quote: The young are ambitious, the smart lazy, the wise playful
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: If you’re not doing some things that are crazy, then you’re doing the wrong things
spirituality.author: Larry Page

spirituality.quote: It’s not the hours you put in, it’s what you put into your hours that counts
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: A successful life is not about optimizing the work-life balance, but about minimizing the work-life difference
spirituality.author: Sven Schnieders

spirituality.quote: Turn your time into skill. Your skill into authority. Your authority into an audience. Your audience into an income. Your income into freedom. And your freedom into others’
spirituality.author: Sahil Lavingia

spirituality.quote: All that happens to us, including our humiliations, our misfortunes, our embarrassments, all is given to us as raw material, as clay, so that we may shape our art
spirituality.author: Jorge Luis Borges

spirituality.quote: The most powerful force in the universe is compounded attention. Anyone can focus on meaningful actions every now and then, but hammering away on what matters day after day is what delivers exceptional results. What you focus on becomes your life
spirituality.author: James Clear

spirituality.quote: Do one thing at a time. Give yourself the gift of being focused and centered
spirituality.author: Daily Zen

spirituality.quote: If everything seems under control, you’re not going fast enough
spirituality.author: Mario Andretti

spirituality.quote: Do the right things, do the hard things daily
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Success is created by doing the basics, to a high standard, consistently
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: The secret of success is… to be fully awake to everything about you
spirituality.author: Jackson Pollock

spirituality.quote: The great thing in this world is not so much where you stand, as in what direction you are moving
spirituality.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

spirituality.quote: Life is not always a matter of holding good cards, but sometimes, playing a poor hand well
spirituality.author: Jack London

spirituality.quote: Failure is a feeling long before it’s an actual result
spirituality.author: Michelle Obama

spirituality.quote: Don’t ever make decisions based on fear. Make decisions based on hope and possibility. Make decisions based on what should happen, not what shouldn’t
spirituality.author: Michelle Obama

spirituality.quote: Becoming isn’t about arriving somewhere or achieving a certain aim. I see it instead as forward motion, a means of evolving, a way to reach continuously toward a better self. The journey doesn’t end
spirituality.author: Michelle Obama

spirituality.quote: I have clearly written down a description of my definite chief aim in life, and I will never stop trying until I shall have developed sufficient self-confidence for its attainment
spirituality.author: Bruce Lee

spirituality.quote: Never met anyone truly talented claiming whatever they were doing was easy. Only the mediocre live in the idea that they are talented. Excellence requires a lot of humility
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Half of success is about avoiding mistakes. Avoid debt. Avoid stress. Avoid being a jerk. Avoid lack of sleep. Avoid gaining weight. Avoid insecure people. Avoid reacting to stupidity. Avoid mindless consuming. Avoid staying indoors all day
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: How to make a really good painting: make a few hundred really bad paintings. How to write a really good article: write a few dozen really bad articles. How to succeed: fail a lot
spirituality.author: Sahil Lavingia

spirituality.quote: If the day and the night are such that you greet them with joy, and life emits a fragrance like flowers and sweet-scented herbs, is more elastic, more starry, more immortal — that is your success
spirituality.author: Henry David Thoreau

spirituality.quote: Being truly wealthy does not require having many things; rather, it requires having what one longs for. Wealth is not an absolute. It is relative to desire
spirituality.author: Alain de Botton (Status Anxiety, Amazon book)

spirituality.quote: My life is optimized for progress and improvement because that’s the foundation of fulfillment
spirituality.author: Tom Bilyeu

spirituality.quote: Obstacles are those things you see when you take your eyes off the goal
spirituality.author: Henry Ford

spirituality.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe it can achieve
spirituality.author: Napoleon Hill

spirituality.quote: To leave the world richer — that is the ultimate success
spirituality.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

spirituality.quote: Breathe. If you feel overwhelmed, breathe. It will calm you and release the tensions. If you are worried about something coming up, or caught up in something that already happened, breathe. It will bring you back to the present. If you are moving too fast, breathe. It will remind you to slow down, and enjoy life more. Breathe, and enjoy each moment of this life. They’re too fleeting and few to waste
spirituality.author: Leo Babauta

spirituality.quote: Listen to silence. It has so much to say
spirituality.author: Rumi

spirituality.quote: The quieter you become the more you are able to hear
spirituality.author: Rumi

spirituality.quote: There was a brief silence. I think I heard snow falling
spirituality.author: Erich Segal

spirituality.quote: All men’s miseries derive from not being able to sit in a quiet room alone
spirituality.author: Blaise Pascal

spirituality.quote: Saying nothing sometimes says the most
spirituality.author: Emily Dickinson

spirituality.quote: A fool is known by his speech; and a wise man by silence
spirituality.author: Pythagoras

spirituality.quote: When you have nothing to say, say nothing
spirituality.author: Charles Caleb Colton

spirituality.quote: Silence is the sleep that nourishes wisdom
spirituality.author: Francis Bacon

spirituality.quote: Noise creates illusions. Silence brings truth
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: If there were a little more silence, if we all kept quiet…maybe we could understand something
spirituality.author: Federico Fellini

spirituality.quote: In the silence behind what can be heard lies the answers we have been searching for for so long
spirituality.author: Andreas Fransson

spirituality.quote: Speech is silver, silence is golden
spirituality.author: Thomas Carlyle

spirituality.quote: The good and the wise lead quiet lives
spirituality.author: Euripides

spirituality.quote: Inner silence is the mother of all talents
spirituality.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

spirituality.quote: I, schooled in misery, know many purifying rites, and I know where speech is proper and where silence
spirituality.author: Aeschylus

spirituality.quote: The closer you are to the truth, the more silent you become inside
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: In human intercourse the tragedy begins, not when there is misunderstanding about words, but when silence is not understood
spirituality.author: Henry David Thoreau

spirituality.quote: I think 99 times and find nothing. I stop thinking, swim in silence, and the truth comes to me
spirituality.author: Albert Einstein

spirituality.quote: If I could I would always work in silence and obscurity, and let my efforts be known by their results
spirituality.author: Emily Bronte

spirituality.quote: All I insist on, and nothing else, is that you should show the whole world that you are not afraid. Be silent, if you choose; but when it is necessary, speak – and speak in such a way that people will remember it
spirituality.author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

spirituality.quote: I’ve begun to realize that you can listen to silence and learn from it. It has a quality and a dimension all its own
spirituality.author: Chaim Potok

spirituality.quote: Time and silence are the most luxurious things today
spirituality.author: Tom Ford

spirituality.quote: The more you understand silence, that’s where the balance comes
spirituality.author: Rick Rubin

spirituality.quote: Everything has its wonders, even darkness and silence, and I learn whatever state I am in, therein to be content
spirituality.author: Helen Keller

spirituality.quote: Silence is so freaking loud
spirituality.author: Sarah Dessen

spirituality.quote: There is something terribly wrong with a culture inebriated by noise and gregariousness
spirituality.author: George Steiner

spirituality.quote: The things that we understand, create silence. The things that we do not, create emotion
spirituality.author: Kapil Gupta

spirituality.quote: Within us is the soul of the whole, the wise silence, the universal beauty, the eternal One
spirituality.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

spirituality.quote: I think the first virtue is to restrain the tongue; he approaches nearest to gods who knows how to be silent, even though he is in the right
spirituality.author: Cato The Elder

spirituality.quote: People will do anything, no matter how absurd, in order to avoid facing their own soul
spirituality.author: Carl Jung

spirituality.quote: Don’t waste words on people deserve your silence. Sometimes the most powerful thing you can say is nothing at all
spirituality.author: Mandy Hale

spirituality.quote: The human heart has hidden treasures, in secret kept, in silence sealed; the thoughts, the hopes, the dreams, the pleasures, whose charms were broken if revealed
spirituality.author: Charlotte Bronte

spirituality.quote: Silence speaks when words can’t
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: The world’s continual breathing is what we hear and call silence
spirituality.author: Clarice Lispector

spirituality.quote: Now all my teachers are dead except silence.
spirituality.author: W.S. Merwin

spirituality.quote: Talk, talk, talk: the utter and heartbreaking stupidity of words
spirituality.author: William Faulkner

spirituality.quote: Silence is a true friend who never betrays
spirituality.author: Confucius

spirituality.quote: As far as I’m concerned, I prefer silent vice to ostentatious virtue
spirituality.author: Albert Einstein

spirituality.quote: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter
spirituality.author: Martin Luther King Jr

spirituality.quote: Silence is the wit of fools
spirituality.author: Anatole France

spirituality.quote: Nothing strengthens authority so much as silence
spirituality.author: Leonardo da Vinci

spirituality.quote: Speak only if it improves upon the silence
spirituality.author: Mahatma Gandhi

spirituality.quote: Silence is more eloquent than words
spirituality.author: Thomas Carlyle

spirituality.quote: I often regret that I have spoken; never that I have been silent
spirituality.author: Publilius Syrus

spirituality.quote: The right word may be effective, but no word was ever as effective as a rightly timed pause
spirituality.author: Mark Twain

spirituality.quote: The truth hurts, but silence kills
spirituality.author: Mark Twain

spirituality.quote: The music is not in the notes, but in the silence between
spirituality.author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

spirituality.quote: As we must account for every idle word, so must we account for every idle silence
spirituality.author: Benjamin Franklin

spirituality.quote: Three hundred years of humiliation, abuse and deprivation cannot be expected to find voice in a whisper
spirituality.author: Martin Luther King Jr

spirituality.quote: Silence is golden when you can’t think of a good answer
spirituality.author: Muhammad Ali

spirituality.quote: Great souls suffer in silence
spirituality.author: Friedrich Schiller

spirituality.quote: Silence is the ultimate weapon of power
spirituality.author: Charles de Gaulle

spirituality.quote: If you face God in prayer and silence, God will speak to you. Then you will know that you are nothing. It is only when you realize your nothingness, your emptiness, that God can fill you with Himself. Souls of prayer are souls of great silence
spirituality.author: Mother Teresa

spirituality.quote: It is not easy to keep silent when silence is a lie
spirituality.author: Victor Hugo

spirituality.quote: Silence is argument carried out by other means
spirituality.author: Ernesto Che Guevara

spirituality.quote: You have a grand gift for silence, Watson. It makes you quite invaluable as a companion
spirituality.author: Arthur Conan Doyle (Sherlock Holmes)

spirituality.quote: Experience teaches us that silence terrifies people the most
spirituality.author: Bob Dylan

spirituality.quote: The eternal silence of these infinite spaces frightens me
spirituality.author: Blaise Pascal

spirituality.quote: Silence is the perfectest herald of joy. I were but little happy if I could say how much
spirituality.author: William Shakespeare

spirituality.quote: Let us be silent, that we may hear the whispers of the gods
spirituality.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

spirituality.quote: I never found the companion that was so companionable as solitude. We are for the most part more lonely when we go abroad among men than when we stay in our chambers
spirituality.author: Henry David Thoreau

spirituality.quote: Silence is the element in which great things fashion themselves together
spirituality.author: Thomas Carlyle

spirituality.quote: A sage thing is timely silence, and better than any speech
spirituality.author: Plutarch

spirituality.quote: Be silent or let thy words be worth more than silence
spirituality.author: Pythagoras

spirituality.quote: We need silence to be able to touch souls
spirituality.author: Mother Teresa

spirituality.quote: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind
spirituality.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

spirituality.quote: Silence, healing
spirituality.author: Heraclitus

spirituality.quote: Sometimes it’s better to be silent and smile
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Since long I’ve held silence a remedy for harm
spirituality.author: Aeschylus

spirituality.quote: Silence is safer than speech
spirituality.author: Epictetus

spirituality.quote: Silence is better than unmeaning words
spirituality.author: Pythagoras

spirituality.quote: I was quiet, but I was not blind
spirituality.author: Jane Austen

spirituality.quote: What’s quiet is more powerful than you think
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Silence is more musical than any song
spirituality.author: Christina Rossetti

spirituality.quote: Solitude is a catalyst for innovation.
spirituality.author: Susan Cain

spirituality.quote: You misinterpret everything, even the silence
spirituality.author: Franz Kafka

spirituality.quote: The silence is not suppression; instead, it is all there is
spirituality.author: Annie Dillard

spirituality.quote: The quiet mind is richer than a crown
spirituality.author: Robert Greene

spirituality.quote: The silence is so deep it hurts our ears
spirituality.author: Haruki Murakami

spirituality.quote: Speech is of time, silence is of eternity
spirituality.author: Thomas Carlyle

spirituality.quote: Real action is in silent moments
spirituality.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

spirituality.quote: Noise: a stench in the ear
spirituality.author: Ambrose Bierce

spirituality.quote: Silence says a lot more than you think
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Still waters run deep
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Confidence is silent. Insecurities are loud
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Getting no message is also a message
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: You are a slave to what you do say, a master of what you don’t say
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Silence isn’t empty. It’s full of ansers
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Silence is the mother of truth
spirituality.author: Benjamin Disraeli

spirituality.quote: To hear, one must be silent.
spirituality.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

spirituality.quote: Sound is our mind, silence is our being
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: He who does not understand your silence will probably not understand your words
spirituality.author: Elbert Hubbard

spirituality.quote: You cannot be angry when alone
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Listening to the eternal involves a silence within us
spirituality.author: Thomas Raymond Kelly

spirituality.quote: One need not always be saying something in this noisy world
spirituality.author: Sarah Orne Jewett

spirituality.quote: The wisest man is the silent one. Examine his actions. Judge him by them
spirituality.author: Karen Marie Moning

spirituality.quote: Silence is the virtue of fools
spirituality.author: Francis Bacon

spirituality.quote: A silent man is easily reputed wise
spirituality.author: Frederick William Robertson

spirituality.quote: Speak for yourself and from yourself, or be silent
spirituality.author: George Henry Lewes

spirituality.quote: Never be bullied into silence
spirituality.author: Harvey Fierstein

spirituality.quote: Hope will never be silent
spirituality.author: Harvey Milk

spirituality.quote: Silence is also a conversation
spirituality.author: Ramana Maharshi

spirituality.quote: By silence, I hear other men’s imperfections and conceal my own
spirituality.author: Citium Zeno

spirituality.quote: I have only one confidant, and that is the silence of night
spirituality.author: Soren Kierkegaard

spirituality.quote: Silence is interesting. It can show confusion, indifference and sadness. But it can also show determination, confidence and caring
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Some of the greatest battles will be fought within the silent chambers of your own soul
spirituality.author: Ezra Taft Benson

spirituality.quote: The hardest and most important battle you’ll deliver is when you’ll be alone. Will you follow the crowds or will you follow that little voice inside yourself?
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: A fair request should be followed by the deed in silence
spirituality.author: Dante Alighieri

spirituality.quote: No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow
spirituality.author: Alice Walker

spirituality.quote: The true genius shudders at incompleteness – and usually prefers silence to saying something which is not everything it should be
spirituality.author: Edgar Allan Poe

spirituality.quote: How much better is silence; the coffee cup, the table. How much better to sit by myself like the solitary sea-bird that opens its wings on the stake. Let me sit here for ever with bare things, this coffee cup, this knife, this fork, things in themselves, myself being myself
spirituality.author: Virginia Woolf

spirituality.quote: No durable things are built on violent passion. Nature grows her plants in silence and in darkness, and only when they have become strong do they put their heads above the ground
spirituality.author: Annie Besant

spirituality.quote: When words become unclear, I shall focus with photographs. When images become inadequate, I shall be content with silence
spirituality.author: Ansel Adams

spirituality.quote: It’s the steady, quiet, plodding ones who win in the lifelong race.
spirituality.author: Robert W. Service

spirituality.quote: I go silent so I can write. When my tongue is wagging my fingers are silent
spirituality.author: Sonia Rumzi

spirituality.quote: Choose silence of all virtues, for by it you hear other men’s imperfections, and conceal your own
spirituality.author: George Bernard Shaw

spirituality.quote: Withdraw into yourself, perceive there a silence as old as being, even older
spirituality.author: Emil Cioran

spirituality.quote: Within each of us, there is silence. A silence as vast as the universe. And when we experience that silence, we remember who we are
spirituality.author: Gunilla Norris

spirituality.quote: No writer in our time has been more isolated than Kafka, and yet few have achieved communication as well as he did
spirituality.author: Eugenio Montale

spirituality.quote: Silence is the universal refuge, the sequel to all dull discourses and all foolish acts, a balm to our every chagrin, as welcome after satiety as after disappointment; that background which the painter may not daub, be he master or bungler, and which, however awkward a figure we may have made in the foreground, remains ever our inviolable asylum, where no indignity can assail, no personality can disturb us
spirituality.author: Henry David Thoreau

spirituality.quote: Have you ever heard the wonderful silence just before the dawn? Or the quiet and calm just as a storm ends? Or perhaps you know the silence when you haven’t the answer to a question you’ve been asked, or the hush of a country road at night, or the expectant pause of a room full of people when someone is just about to speak, or, most beautiful of all, the moment after the door closes and you’re alone in the whole house? Each one is different, you know, and all very beautiful if you listen carefully
spirituality.author: Norton Juster

spirituality.quote: I think that one’s art is a growth inside one. I do not think one can explain growth. It is silent and subtle. One does not keep digging up a plant to see how it grows
spirituality.author: Emily Carr

spirituality.quote: As happens sometimes, a moment settled and hovered and remained for much more than a moment. And sound stopped and movement stopped for much, much more than a moment
spirituality.author: John Steinbeck

spirituality.quote: I have come to believe over and over again that what is most important to me must be spoken, made verbal and shared, even at the risk of having it bruised or misunderstood
spirituality.author: Audre Lorde

spirituality.quote: I have always loved the desert. One sits down on a desert sand dune, sees nothing, hears nothing. Yet through the silence something throbs, and gleams
spirituality.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

spirituality.quote: Silence is the eternal duty of man
spirituality.author: Thomas Carlyle

spirituality.quote: Staying silent is like a slow growing cancer to the soul and a trait of a true coward. There is nothing intelligent about not standing up for yourself. You may not win every battle. However, everyone will at least know what you stood for – you. Shannon L
spirituality.author: Alder

spirituality.quote: I need to be alone. I need to ponder my shame and my despair in seclusion; I need the sunshine and the paving stones of the streets without companions, without conversation, face to face with myself, with only the music of my heart for company
spirituality.author: Henry Miller

spirituality.quote: Truth is not only violated by falsehood; it may be equally outraged by silence
spirituality.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

spirituality.quote: When I pronounce the word Future, the first syllable already belongs to the past. When I pronounce the word Silence, I destroy it
spirituality.author: Wisława Szymborska

spirituality.quote: Use what talents you possess; the woods would be very silent if no birds sang there except those that sang best
spirituality.author: Henry Van Dyke

spirituality.quote: After silence, that which comes nearest to expressing the inexpressible is music
spirituality.author: Aldous Huxley

spirituality.quote: We went down into the silent garden. Dawn is the time when nothing breathes, the hour of silence. Everything is transfixed, only the light moves
spirituality.author: Leonora Carrington

spirituality.quote: I drank the silence of God from a spring in the woods
spirituality.author: Georg Trakl

spirituality.quote: You can hear the footsteps of God when silence reigns in the mind
spirituality.author: Sathya Sai Baba

spirituality.quote: Silence is the language of God; it is also the language of the heart
spirituality.author: Sivananda

spirituality.quote: Silence is an empty space, space is the home of the awakened mind
spirituality.author: Buddha

spirituality.quote: Lying is done with words and also with silence
spirituality.author: Adrienne Rich

spirituality.quote: When I speak, you must not listen to the words, my dear. Listen to the silence
spirituality.author: Anthony de Mello

spirituality.quote: If you’re asked: What is the silence? Respond: It is the first stone of the Wisdom’s temple
spirituality.author: Pythagoras

spirituality.quote: To sin by silence when they should protest makes cowards of men
spirituality.author: Abraham Lincoln

spirituality.quote: Silence gives us space to process our experiences and soak in our surroundings
spirituality.author: Cati Vanden Breul

spirituality.quote: The world would be happier if men had the same capacity to be silent that they have to speak
spirituality.author: Baruch Spinoza

spirituality.quote: He who establishes his argument by noise and command shows that his reason is weak
spirituality.author: Michel de Montaigne

spirituality.quote: I have found that one cannot win the war of words. So I don’t engage in one to begin with. I have renounced the need to be seen as right, intelligent or wise. I have seen the futility of verbal battles. Either one seeks to understand or score points. The latter isn’t worth it
spirituality.author: The Ancient Sage

spirituality.quote: Your very silence shows you agree
spirituality.author: Euripides

spirituality.quote: Don’t waste words on people who deserve your silence. Sometimes the most powerful thing you can say is nothing at all
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: It seems only the old are able to sit next to one another and not say anything and still feel content. The young, brash and impatient, must always break the silence. It is a waste, for silence is pure
spirituality.author: Nicholas Sparks

spirituality.quote: One must learn to be silent just as one must learn to talk
spirituality.author: Virginia Woolf

spirituality.quote: Only when the voice of duty is silent, or when it has already spoken, may we allowably think of the consequences of a particular action
spirituality.author: Augustus Hare

spirituality.quote: It is always assumed by the empty-headed, who chatter about themselves for want of something better, that people who do not discuss their affairs openly must have something to hide
spirituality.author: Honoré de Balzac

spirituality.quote: Silence is foolish if we are wise, but wise if we are foolish
spirituality.author: Charles Caleb Colton

spirituality.quote: When we speak we are afraid our words will not be heard, nor welcomed, but when we are silent we are still afraid. So it is better to speak remembering we were never meant to survive
spirituality.author: Audre Lorde

spirituality.quote: You are most powerful when you are most silent. People never expect silence. They expect words, motion, defense, offense, back and forth. They expect to leap into the fray. They are ready, fists up, words hanging leaping from their mouths
spirituality.author: Alison McGhee

spirituality.quote: Silence was not the absence of sound but was itself a sound that could be loud or soft, soothing or disturbing, complex or simple
spirituality.author: Julius Lester

spirituality.quote: I like the silent church before the service begins, better than any preaching
spirituality.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

spirituality.quote: Music is pleasing not only because of the sound but because of the silence that is in it: without the alternation of sound and silence there would be no rhythm
spirituality.author: Thomas Merton

spirituality.quote: The wiser you become, the more comfortable you are with silence
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: All my spare time I would spend looking at myself in silence
spirituality.author: Nisargadatta Maharaj

spirituality.quote: A sudden silence in the middle of a conversation suddenly brings us back to essentials: it reveals how dearly we must pay for the invention of speech.
spirituality.author: Emile M. Cioran

spirituality.quote: We’ve known about the transcendent power of solitude for centuries; it’s only recently that we’ve forgotten it
spirituality.author: Susan Cain

spirituality.quote: Silence is a statement that is open to gross misinterpretation
spirituality.author: Craig Bruce

spirituality.quote: It is more noble by silence to avoid an injury than by argument to overcome it
spirituality.author: Francis Beaumont

spirituality.quote: Silences are the most underrated part of comedy
spirituality.author: David Steinberg

spirituality.quote: The moment you become aware of the silence, you also have become silent
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Do you want to change the world? Then change yourself first. Do you want to change yourself? Then remain completely silent inside the silence-sea
spirituality.author: Sri Chinmoy

spirituality.quote: Stay centered by accepting whatever happens to you. This is the ultimate
spirituality.author: Chuang Tzu

spirituality.quote: A fit body, a calm mind, a house full of love. These things cannot be bought – they must be earned
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Your life will be in order when disorder ceases to bother you
spirituality.author: James Pierce

spirituality.quote: People should learn how to just be there, doing nothing
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: You can’t force raging water to be calm. You have to leave it alone and let it return to its natural flow. Emotions are the same way
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: Insight emerges out of silence.
spirituality.author: B.D. Schiers

spirituality.quote: If he cannot stop the mind that seeks after fame and profit, he will spend his life without finding peace
spirituality.author: Dogen

spirituality.quote: Understand: presence of mind is the ability to detach yourself, to see the whole battlefield, the whole picture, with clarity
spirituality.author: Robert Greene

spirituality.quote: Those who act with few desires are calm, without worry or fear
spirituality.author: Buddha

spirituality.quote: Fear of change is a human instinct. Embracing change is a superhuman ability
spirituality.author: Justin Kan

spirituality.quote: No state is so bitter than a calm mind cannot find in it some consolation
spirituality.author: Seneca

spirituality.quote: Rushing into action, you fail. Trying to grasp things, you lose them. Forcing a project to completion, you ruin what was almost ripe
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching, Amazon book)

spirituality.quote: With no desire, at rest and still, all things go right as of their will
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: If you relax, it comes. If you relax, it is there. If you relax, you start vibrating with it
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Everything that happens is as simple and familiar as the rose in spring, the fruit in summer: disease, death, blasphemy, conspiracy… everything that makes stupid people happy and angry
spirituality.author: Marcus Aurelius

spirituality.quote: The smarter you get, the more you appreciate silence
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: On average, the deeper people’s knowledge of a topic, the more calmly they talk about it
spirituality.author: Paul Graham

spirituality.quote: An infinite reservoir of cosmic wisdom resides in the depths of contemplation
spirituality.author: Roy Gillett

spirituality.quote: Attain peace with self-understanding. Attain self-understanding with silence
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Relax. You’ll live longer and perform better
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Hurrying and delaying are alike ways of trying to resist the present
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: We have a choice. We can spend our whole life suffering because we can’t relax with how things really are, or we can relax and embrace the open-endedness of the human situation, which is fresh, unfixated, and unbiased
spirituality.author: Pema Chödron

spirituality.quote: One thing we do know: Life will give you whatever experience is most helpful for the evolution of your consciousness. How do you know this the experience you need? Because this is the experience you are having at this moment
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Short-term thinking makes people desperate, ungenerous, impulsive. Long-term thinking makes people calm, gracious, controlled. The mighty pyramids and cathedrals were built by civilizations with a long time horizon, so it is with the life of a great man
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Let come what comes, and accommodate yourself to that, whatever it is
spirituality.author: Henepola Gunaratana

spirituality.quote: If you feel offended about something, you haven’t been meditating enough. If you feel the need to defend yourself, or justify your opinion, you haven’t been meditating enough. If you can’t take joy in sitting under a tree on a beautiful day, you haven’t been meditating enough
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: Some time in your day today, try to turn off all the noises you can around you, and give yourself some ‘quiet time.’ In the silence, let yourself think about something. Or if possible, think about nothing
spirituality.author: Fred Rogers

spirituality.quote: You don’t solve a maze by rushing through. You have to stop and think. You have to walk slowly and carefully, reining in your energy – otherwise you’ll get hopelessly lost
spirituality.author: Ryan Holiday (Stillness Is the Key, Amazon book)

spirituality.quote: You don’t always need a plan. Sometimes you need to breathe, calm down, look around, and improvise. Creativity is the key of life
spirituality.author: Paulo Coelho

spirituality.quote: What you do not react to cannot drag you down in a futile engagement
spirituality.author: Robert Greene

spirituality.quote: When seeking stops, seeker relaxes and stays in his natural state
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Keep calm and carry on
spirituality.author: Winston Churchill

spirituality.quote: There is peace even in the storm
spirituality.author: Vincent van Gogh

spirituality.quote: It takes a calm mind to be able to consider things from different angles and points of view
spirituality.author: 14th Dalai Lama

spirituality.quote: A calm mind makes us relaxed, improves our health and makes for happier families and communities
spirituality.author: 14th Dalai Lama

spirituality.quote: Compassion enhances our self-confidence because a calm mind allows our marvellous human intelligence to bloom. When we’re angry, our thinking is distorted and we don’t see the different aspects of reality. A calm mind enables us to take a broader, more realistic view
spirituality.author: 14th Dalai Lama

spirituality.quote: To a mind that is still, the entire universe surrenders
spirituality.author: Zhuangzi

spirituality.quote: Calm seas never made a good sailor. Franklin D
spirituality.author: Roosevelt

spirituality.quote: I just feel that there isn’t enough silence, and I’m always asking people if they can just give some silence
spirituality.author: Fred Rogers

spirituality.quote: Today I escaped anxiety. Or no, I discarded it, because it was within me, in my own perceptions — not outside
spirituality.author: Marcus Aurelius (Meditations, Amazon book)

spirituality.quote: Life isn’t as serious as my mind makes it out to be
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Unwind, relax, and deepen into the present moment
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Each one has to find his peace from within. And peace to be real must be unaffected by outside circumstances
spirituality.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

spirituality.quote: The most effective way to convince people is quietly
spirituality.author: Yoko Ono

spirituality.quote: Calm is a superpower
spirituality.author: Brené Brown

spirituality.quote: Freedom is a calm mind
spirituality.author: Shane Parrish

spirituality.quote: Be calm. Be Zen. You are Buddha
spirituality.author: James Patterson

spirituality.quote: In the madness, you have to find calm
spirituality.author: Lupita Nyong’o

spirituality.quote: Take it easy, and remember "easy is right
spirituality.author: " Osho

spirituality.quote: Learn to slow down. Get lost intentionally
spirituality.author: Tim Ferriss

spirituality.quote: Always study to secure your permanent peace
spirituality.author: Publius Syrus

spirituality.quote: Be an island of calm in the sea of craziness
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Train your mind to be calm in every situation
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: The only thing you control is how you respond
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: In a hyperactive world, stillness is the deepest rebellion
spirituality.author: Donna D’Cruz

spirituality.quote: If you get the inside right, the outside will fall into place
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: A crust eaten in peace is better than a banquet partaken in anxiety
spirituality.author: Aesop

spirituality.quote: Don’t let people pull you into their storm. Pull them into your peace
spirituality.author: Kimberly Jones

spirituality.quote: Remember: we don’t control what happens, we control how we respond
spirituality.author: Ryan Holiday

spirituality.quote: Nothing can disturb the calm peace of my soul
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: Do you pay regular visits to yourself? Start now
spirituality.author: Rumi

spirituality.quote: When you keep the peace with yourself, you also bring peace to others
spirituality.author: Rhonda Byrne

spirituality.quote: Being confident and outspoken is overrated. Being present and calm is underrated
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Having a calm and compassionate mind enables us to use our natural intelligence more effectively
spirituality.author: 14th Dalai Lama

spirituality.quote: Live intensely, live totally, here and now. Paradise is not some place, somewhere. It is a peace within you
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: The existence loves you, otherwise you would not be here. Relax into your being, you are cherished by the whole
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Don’t do any task in order to get it over with. Resolve to do each job in a relaxed way, with all your attention. Enjoy and be one with your work
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: There are two things, to be and to do. Don’t think too much about to do – to be is first. To be peace. To be joy. To be happiness. And then to do joy, to do happiness – on the basis of being
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: Everyone at a high level has a huge amount of chess understanding, and much of what separates the great from the very good is deep presence, relaxation of the conscious mind, which allows the unconscious to flow unhindered
spirituality.author: Josh Waitzkin (The Art of Learning, Amazon book)

spirituality.quote: Before embarking on important undertakings, sit quietly, calm your senses and thoughts, and meditate deeply. You will then be guided by the great creative power of Spirit
spirituality.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

spirituality.quote: Be a person on a mission. Move steadily toward your aim. Treat everything else as a distraction. Don’t be sidetracked by things that have no meaning in your life. Let your mission be the highest thing you’re capable of. Let it be the centre around which your life revolves
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: The further the reward from the effort, the thinner the competition. Patience is the gatekeeper
spirituality.author: Johnny Uzan

spirituality.quote: Our best and most lasting work comes from when we take things slow
spirituality.author: Ryan Holiday (Stillness Is the Key)

spirituality.quote: If you want to be effective in business, you need a clear, calm, cool, collected mind
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: You can control so much of your state of mind just by breathing
spirituality.author: Justin Kan

spirituality.quote: Family vacations are the ultimate test of one’s equanimity
spirituality.author: James Pierce

spirituality.quote: The ideal of calm exists in a sitting cat
spirituality.author: Jules Renard

spirituality.quote: Relax, it’s a tweet
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Always ask yourself: "What will happen if I say nothing?"
spirituality.author: Kamand Kojouri

spirituality.quote: If solitude is the school of genius, then the crowded, busy world is the purgatory of the idiot
spirituality.author: Ryan Holiday (Stillness is the Key)

spirituality.quote: Be like a duck, paddling and working very hard inside the water, but what everyone sees is a smiling and calm face
spirituality.author: Manoj Arora

spirituality.quote: In dealing with fools you must adopt the following philosophy: they are simply a part of life, like rocks or furniture
spirituality.author: Robert Greene

spirituality.quote: When working alongside fools, do not fight them. Instead think of them the way you think of children, or pets, not important enough to affect your mental balance
spirituality.author: Robert Greene

spirituality.quote: Fame and tranquility can never be bedfellows
spirituality.author: Michel de Montaigne

spirituality.quote: Relax: haters are secret admirers wanting to be you
spirituality.author: Paulo Coelho

spirituality.quote: You can’t buy a calm mind, you have to earn it
spirituality.author: Shane Parrish

spirituality.quote: Until we know that death is equal to life, we live in fear
spirituality.author: Byron Katie

spirituality.quote: Happiness and sadness alike are an assault on equanimity
spirituality.author: James Pierce

spirituality.quote: The wise have self-understanding. The wisest have indifference too
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: The modern mind is overstimulated and the modern body is understimulated and overfed. Meditation, exercise, and fasting restore an ancient balance
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Doctors won’t make you healthy. Nutritionists won’t make you slim. Teachers won’t make you smart. Gurus won’t make you calm. Mentors won’t make you rich. Trainers won’t make you fit. Ultimately, you have to take responsibility. Save yourself
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: The chaos you see outside is within you. It’s your own projection. When you’re calm from within, you cease to create chaos without. And even if the external chaos is there, it no longer affects you. The world is turbulent if you’re turbulent. It’s calm when you’re calm
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Freedom is only for he who views happiness and sorrow as stray dogs barking in the night. Such a man needs neither self-help or spirituality. He needs neither fortune or blessings. For he lives the sort of life that almost no man can fathom
spirituality.author: Kapil Gupta

spirituality.quote: I’m not doing anything, and yet I’m also doing the most important thing a man can do: I’m listening to what I needed to hear from myself
spirituality.author: Paulo Coelho (Like The Flowing River)

spirituality.quote: The very desire to find shortcuts makes you eminently unsuited for any kind of mastery
spirituality.author: Robert Greene

spirituality.quote: It is the vice of a vulgar mind to be thrilled by bigness.
spirituality.author: E. M. Forster

spirituality.quote: Do not view mountains from the scale of human thought
spirituality.author: Dogen

spirituality.quote: If you want to travel the Way of Buddhas and Zen masters, then expect nothing, seek nothing, and grasp nothing
spirituality.author: Dogen

spirituality.quote: Next time you have to make a decision, be sure to breathe in and out first
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: Just study Buddhism. Don’t follow the sentiments of the world
spirituality.author: Dogen

spirituality.quote: Only through constant self-awareness and self-knowledge can there be inward tranquillity
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: Once you stop seeking outside what’s already inside, you become free and calm
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: The Master takes action by letting things take their course. He remains as calm at the end as at the beginning
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching)

spirituality.quote: It is not wise to rush about. If too much energy is used, exhaustion follows. This is not the way of Tao
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Best be still; best be empty. In stillness and emptiness we find where to abide. Talking and moving we lose the place
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Using order to deal with the disorderly, using calm to deal with the clamorous, is mastering the heart
spirituality.author: Sun Tzu (The Art of War, Amazon book)

spirituality.quote: There is a simple way to become Buddha: When you refrain from unwholesome actions, are not attached to birth and death, and are compassionate toward all sentient beings, respectful to seniors and kind to juniors, not excluding or desiring anything, with no designing thoughts or worries, you will be called a Buddha. Do not seek anything else
spirituality.author: Dogen

spirituality.quote: The ego gets what it wants with words. The soul finds what it needs in silence
spirituality.author: Richard Rohr

spirituality.quote: Zen is not some special state, it is our normal condition, silent, peaceful, awake, without agitation
spirituality.author: Taisen Deshimaru

spirituality.quote: The beauty of Zen is found in simplicity and tranquility, in a sense of the all-embracing harmony of things
spirituality.author: Thich Thien-An

spirituality.quote: Prolong not the past. Invite not the future. Do not alter your innate wakefulness. Fear not appearances. There is nothing more than this
spirituality.author: Ram Dass

spirituality.quote: The wise speak softly, for their words do not attempt to convince
spirituality.author: James Pierce

spirituality.quote: The struggle is great, the task divine — to gain mastery, freedom, happiness, and tranquility
spirituality.author: Epictetus

spirituality.quote: When you understand something, then it naturally calms you down
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Everything is fine until you believe it’s not
spirituality.author: Byron Katie

spirituality.quote: Don’t be too quick to interpret the moment. Just keep quiet. My encouragement would always be: never think anything is against you, everything is a blessing. Why should it be different? Just be quiet. Let it all work itself out
spirituality.author: Mooji

spirituality.quote: Self-knowledge is the first step to maturity
spirituality.author: Jane Austen

spirituality.quote: Maturity is the ability to postpone gratification
spirituality.author: Sigmund Freud

spirituality.quote: We don’t mature through age; we mature in awareness
spirituality.author: Byron Katie

spirituality.quote: The first sign of maturity is not reacting to others immaturity. D
spirituality.author: Muthukrishnan

spirituality.quote: Keep a nimble mind, and err on the side of precaution
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Wisdom is really about figuring the long-term consequences of your actions
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Maturity is when you live your life by your commitments, not by your feelings
spirituality.author: Rick Warren

spirituality.quote: Man’s maturity: to have regained the seriousness that he had as a child at play
spirituality.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

spirituality.quote: Youth ends when egotism does; maturity begins when one lives for others
spirituality.author: Hermann Hesse

spirituality.quote: As a mountain of rock is unshaken by wind, so also, the wise are unperturbed by blame or by praise
spirituality.author: The Dhammapada

spirituality.quote: In growing old we become more foolish — and more wise
spirituality.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

spirituality.quote: Maturity: to do what’s important and to ignore what’s not
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: If you can learn to be patient in a very impatient society, you win
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: Not taking things personally is a superpower
spirituality.author: James Clear

spirituality.quote: Indifference to external events. And a commitment to justice in your own acts
spirituality.author: Marcus Aurelius

spirituality.quote: Not caring about winning trivial arguments saves so much time and energy
spirituality.author: James Clear

spirituality.quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself
spirituality.author: Rumi

spirituality.quote: Show wisdom. Do not jump to conclusions. Take a broader view. Give very practical answers. Take a balanced view. Don’t be so dogmatic. Be more tolerant. Look deeper into things. Generate and consider alternatives. Look at things from many angles
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: Maturity doesn’t come with age; it comes with acceptance of responsibility.
spirituality.author: John C. Maxwell

spirituality.quote: Emotional maturity is the ability to stick to a job and to struggle through until it is finished, to endure unpleasantness, discomfort and frustration
spirituality.author: Edward Adam Strecker

spirituality.quote: Just do your thing, without complaining
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé
Nassim Nicholas Taleb (The Bed of Procrustes, Amazon book)
spirituality.quote: By all means, avoid words – threats, complaints, justification, narratives, reframing, attempts to win arguments, supplications; avoid words!
Feverishness of fame, pride and social recognition is immaturity. Just wake up and see there is nothing much in it. It’s an empty bowl
spirituality.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

spirituality.quote: Maturing is realizing how many things don’t require your comment
spirituality.author: Rachel Wolchin

spirituality.quote: The world rewards people who call things the way they are
spirituality.author: Anthony Pompliano

spirituality.quote: Maturation is the process of foregoing others’ measures of success for your own. Naturally not many people are interested in doing this
spirituality.author: Angela Jiang

spirituality.quote: You want to have a life without pain. You can’t. You want to have a life without sorrow. You can’t. You want to have a life without fear. You can’t. You can only learn to control how you react to these things when they come. This how you become the adult in the room
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: Maturity: Be able to stick with a job until it is finished. Be able to bear an injustice without having to get even. Be able to carry money without spending it. Do your duty without being supervised
spirituality.author: Ann Landers

spirituality.quote: Maturity is the ability to live in peace with that which we cannot change
spirituality.author: Ann Landers

spirituality.quote: Farmers channel the water; fletchers straighten the arrow; carpenters work the timber; the wise tame themselves
spirituality.author: The Dhammapada

spirituality.quote: ‘Maturity’ really means: being very unsurprised by, and calm around, pain and disappointment
spirituality.author: Alain de Botton

spirituality.quote: Maturity: knowing where you’re crazy, trying to warn others of the fact and striving to keep yourself under control
spirituality.author: Alain de Botton

spirituality.quote: Insane people are always sure that they are fine. It is only the sane people who are willing to admit that they are crazy
spirituality.author: Nora Ephron

spirituality.quote: This is the very perfection of a man, to find out his own imperfections
spirituality.author: Augustine of Hippo

spirituality.quote: Do something that doesn’t feel good now to feel good later
spirituality.author: Shane Parrish

spirituality.quote: Wise men don’t need to prove their point; men who need to prove their point aren’t wise
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching, Amazon book)

spirituality.quote: Maturity is having the courage to use one’s own intelligence
spirituality.author: Immanuel Kant

spirituality.quote: Maturity is the ability to reap without apology and not complain when things don’t go well
spirituality.author: Jim Rohn

spirituality.quote: Maturity, the way I understand it, is knowing what your limitations are
spirituality.author: Kurt Vonnegut

spirituality.quote: The best years of your life are the ones in which you decide your problems are your own. You do not blame them on your mother, the ecology, or the president. You realize that you control your own destiny
spirituality.author: Albert Ellis

spirituality.quote: When you care for others, you manifest an inner strength despite any difficulties you face. Your own problems will seem less significant and bothersome to you. Reaching beyond your own problems and taking care of others, you gain confidence, courage and a greater sense of calm
spirituality.author: 14th Dalai Lama

spirituality.quote: I live in that solitude which is painful in youth, but delicious in the years of maturity
spirituality.author: Albert Einstein

spirituality.quote: As I grow older, I pay less attention to what men say. I just watch what they do
spirituality.author: Andrew Carnegie

spirituality.quote: When a man is old he must do more than when he was young
spirituality.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

spirituality.quote: It is best to rise from life as from a banquet, neither thirsty nor drunken
spirituality.author: Aristotle

spirituality.quote: Maturity is when all of your mirrors turn into windows
spirituality.author: Henry David Thoreau

spirituality.quote: Refraining from pleasure cultivates temperance, and it is through temperance that we can abstain from pleasure
spirituality.author: Aristotle

spirituality.quote: The prudent man strives for freedom from pain, not pleasure
spirituality.author: Aristotle

spirituality.quote: ‘Tis easier to suppress the first desire, than to satisfy all that follow it
spirituality.author: Benjamin Franklin

spirituality.quote: Tho’ modesty is a virtue, bashfulness is a vice
spirituality.author: Benjamin Franklin

spirituality.quote: Teach this triple truth to all: A generous heart, kind speech, and a life of service and compassion are the things which renew humanity
spirituality.author: Buddha

spirituality.quote: To make mistakes is human; to stumble is commonplace; to be able to laugh at yourself is maturity
spirituality.author: William Arthur Ward

spirituality.quote: When I was ten, I read fairy tales in secret and would have been ashamed if I had been found doing so. Now that I am fifty, I read them openly. When I became a man I put away childish things, including the fear of childishness and the desire to be very grown up.
spirituality.author: C.S. Lewis

spirituality.quote: The most dangerous thing you can do is to take any one impulse of your own nature and set it up as the thing you ought to follow at all costs.
spirituality.author: C.S. Lewis

spirituality.quote: The heart never takes the place of the head: but it can, and should, obey it. C.S
spirituality.author: Lewis

spirituality.quote: It is not a sign of weakness, but a sign of high maturity, to rise to the level of self-criticism
spirituality.author: Martin Luther King Jr

spirituality.quote: There’s no rush
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Maturity is a choice
spirituality.author: Harry Styles

spirituality.quote: Grown-up people can wait
spirituality.author: Ann Landers

spirituality.quote: Maturity starts when drama ends
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: How you treat people is your religion
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: You are never too old to become younger
spirituality.author: Mae West

spirituality.quote: Maturity of mind is best shown in slow belief
spirituality.author: Baltasar Gracián

spirituality.quote: The first person we must examine is ourselves. John C
spirituality.author: Maxwell

spirituality.quote: Maturity is the capacity to endure uncertainty
spirituality.author: John Huston Finley

spirituality.quote: Be mature enough to accept rejections and failures
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Talking about your own mistakes is a sign of maturity
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: 90% of maturity is getting over the fear of hard work
spirituality.author: Jimmy Song

spirituality.quote: I had rather do and not promise than promise and not do
spirituality.author: Arthur Warwick

spirituality.quote: You can tell a lot about a man by the things that offend him
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: If you dedicate yourself to helping others, you’ll be happier
spirituality.author: 14th Dalai Lama

spirituality.quote: Mature people don’t try to steer the river, they steer themselves
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Maturity is perseverance – the ability to sweat out a project or a situation, in spite of heavy opposition and discouraging setbacks, and stick with it until it is finished
spirituality.author: Ann Landers

spirituality.quote: The value of a man is not measured by his money, his status or his possessions. The value of a man lies in his personality, wisdom, creativity, courage, independence and maturity. Mark W. B
spirituality.author: Brinton

spirituality.quote: Sometimes problems don’t require a solution to solve them; instead they require maturity to outgrow them
spirituality.author: Steve Maraboli

spirituality.quote: You find the light within us. You don’t find it within politics, but you find it in us. The soul is composed of love, compassion, wisdom, peace, and joy
spirituality.author: Ram Dass

spirituality.quote: If you focus on long-term outcomes, expect to be misunderstood in the short-term, frequently
spirituality.author: Tom Gardner

spirituality.quote: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky
spirituality.author: Rabindranath Tagore

spirituality.quote: One of the blessings of maturity is that it sometimes brings one greater courage to be truthful, regardless of what those who do not understand may think or say
spirituality.author: Napoleon Hill

spirituality.quote: Be the person you are. Never try to be another, and you will become mature. Maturity is accepting the responsibility of being oneself, whatsoever the cost
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: The most useful person in the world today is the man or woman who knows how to get along with other people.
spirituality.author: Stanley C. Allyn

spirituality.quote: The older you get, the more you realize it’s less about what you want, and more about what you’re willing to give up
spirituality.author: Mark Manson

spirituality.quote: Maturity is the ability to think, speak and act your feelings within the bounds of dignity. The measure of your maturity is how spiritual you become during the midst of your frustrations
spirituality.author: Samuel Ullman

spirituality.quote: Resolve to live as a grown-up who is making progress, and make whatever you think best a law that you never set aside
spirituality.author: Epictetus

spirituality.quote: He who is full of faith and virtue, who also possesses fame and fortune, is held in reverence wherever he goes
spirituality.author: The Dhammapada

spirituality.quote: Great estates may venture more; little boats must keep near shore
spirituality.author: Benjamin Franklin

spirituality.quote: Immature poets imitate; mature poets steal.
spirituality.author: T.S. Eliot

spirituality.quote: Maturity is doing what you think is best, even when your mother thinks it’s a good idea
spirituality.author: Paul Watzlawick

spirituality.quote: What I look forward to is continued immaturity followed by death
spirituality.author: Dave Barry

spirituality.quote: If you learn that someone is speaking ill of you, don’t try to defend yourself against the rumours; respond instead with, ‘Yes, and he doesn’t know the half of it, because he could have said more
spirituality.author: ’ Epictetus

spirituality.quote: Maturity is what happens when one learns to only give a f*ck about what’s truly f*ckworthy
spirituality.author: Mark Manson (The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck, Amazon book)

spirituality.quote: I knew I matured when I was okay with nobody knowing my side of the story
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Most adults are kids with a sense of self-importance
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Maturity is when your world opens up and you realize that you are not the center of it. M.J
spirituality.author: Croan

spirituality.quote: The vivacity which increases in old age is not far removed from folly
spirituality.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

spirituality.quote: Maturity is reached the day we don’t need to be lied to about anything
spirituality.author: Frank Yerby

spirituality.quote: Adulthood involves learning to conclusively bury a great many of our hopes
spirituality.author: Alain de Botton

spirituality.quote: Maturity happens when you start living without hope. Hope is childish. You become mature when you don’t project hope into the future. In fact, you are mature when you don’t have any future; you just live in the moment — because that is the only reality there is
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Lose the mind and gain consciousness and you are mature. Die to the past and be born to the present and you are mature. Maturity is living in the present, fully alert and aware of all the beauty and the splendour of existence
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: You can’t be mature if you don’t know yourself. Experiences, failures and reflection will bring you what you need
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: If you betray yourself, if you say untrue things, if you act out a lie, you weaken your character
spirituality.author: Jordan Peterson

spirituality.quote: To stand up straight with your shoulders back is to accept the terrible responsibility of life, with eyes wide open
spirituality.author: Jordan Peterson

spirituality.quote: If people wanted the truth, everyone would be self-educated independent thinkers. Most people just want to be validated
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Maturity consists in not losing the past while fully living in the present with a prudent awareness of the possibilities of the future
spirituality.author: Thomas Traherne

spirituality.quote: When we avoid difficult conversations we trade short term discomfort for long term dysfunction. Be brave enough to start a conversation that matters
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt
spirituality.author: Max Lerner

spirituality.quote: Future you pays for the sins of present you. Future you gains from the good of present you. There is no escaping consequence
spirituality.author: Angela Jiang

spirituality.quote: Your misery is your own fault. Stop blaming the world. The world owes you nothing
spirituality.author: Preethi Kasireddy

spirituality.quote: People are ever craving more time, yet continue to squander that which they already have
spirituality.author: James Pierce

spirituality.quote: Truth and popularity tend to be mutually exclusive
spirituality.author: James Pierce

spirituality.quote: The wiser you get, the more comfortable you are in chaos
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: The master is content to serve as an example and not to impose her will
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching)

spirituality.quote: Maturity is the art of living in peace with that which cannot be changed, the courage to change that which should be changed, no matter what it takes, and the wisdom to know the difference
spirituality.author: Ann Landers

spirituality.quote: True wisdom is not about loving happiness
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: Maturity is the ability to prioritize values before feelings
spirituality.author: Mark Manson

spirituality.quote: You are rich when you need no one and want nothing
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: There are foolish people who know and who skilfully use their folly
spirituality.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

spirituality.quote: The stronger our fixed identity of ourselves is, the easier we are insulted
spirituality.author: Pema Chödrön

spirituality.quote: When I didn’t resist, I could see the world
spirituality.author: Pema Chödrön

spirituality.quote: Him I call a brahmana, who associates not with the householder or with the homeless one, or with both, who is free from sensual desire and has few wants
spirituality.author: The Dhammapada

spirituality.quote: The man of wisdom should admonish others; he should give advice and should prevent others from doing wrong; such a man is held dear by the good; he is disliked only by the bad
spirituality.author: The Dhammapada

spirituality.quote: Indeed, wisdom is born of meditation; without meditation wisdom is lost. Knowing this twofold path of gain and loss of wisdom, one should conduct oneself so that wisdom may increase
spirituality.author: The Dhammapada

spirituality.quote: It is good to have virtue till old age, it is good to have unshakable faith, it is good to gain wisdom, it is good to do no evil
spirituality.author: The Dhammapada

spirituality.quote: Your happiness cannot be taken by the others if it is not given by the others
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Maturity is learning how to start when you feel like procrastinating and learning how to listen when you feel like talking
spirituality.author: James Clear

spirituality.quote: Bet on those willing to go backward to go forward, not those who insist on only going forward to go forward
spirituality.author: Angela Jiang

spirituality.quote: A mature person is one who does not think only in absolutes, who is able to be objective even when deeply stirred emotionally, who has learned that there is both good and bad in all people and in all things, and who walks humbly and deals charitably with the circumstances of life, knowing that in this world no one is all knowing and therefore all of us need both love and charity
spirituality.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

spirituality.quote: Quiet the mind, and the soul will speak
spirituality.author: Ma Jaya Sati Bhagavati

spirituality.quote: Learn to be calm and you will always be happy
spirituality.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

spirituality.quote: When you truly know yourself, you don’t try to impress people anymore. One way to know yourself is to meditate
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Calmness of mind is one of the beautiful jewels of wisdom
spirituality.author: James Allen

spirituality.quote: Whatever is fluid, soft, and yielding will overcome whatever is rigid and hard. What is soft is strong
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: When meditation is mastered, the mind is unwavering like the flame of a candle in a windless place
spirituality.author: Bhagavad Gita

spirituality.quote: When you own your breath, nobody can steal your peace
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Your calm mind is the ultimate weapon against your challenges. So relax
spirituality.author: Bryant McGill

spirituality.quote: When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Meditation is not evasion; it is a serene encounter with reality
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: The best meditation is effortless. The best meditation is a gentle awareness
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Learn to slow down. Get lost intentionally. Observe how you judge both yourself and those around you
spirituality.author: Tim Ferriss

spirituality.quote: Suffering is due to our disconnection with the inner soul. Meditation is establishing that connection
spirituality.author: Amit Ray

spirituality.quote: The more tranquil a man becomes, the greater is his success, his influence, his power for good
spirituality.author: James Allen

spirituality.quote: Whatever state I am in, I see it as a state of mind to be accepted as it is
spirituality.author: Nisargadatta Maharaj

spirituality.quote: Meditation is the art of doing nothing
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Praying is talking to the Universe. Meditation is listening to it
spirituality.author: Paulo Coelho

spirituality.quote: A few conscious-hearted, sincere, and energetic men and women can do more in a year than a mob in a century
spirituality.author: Swami Vivekananda

spirituality.quote: To really do nothing, with perfection, is as difficult as doing everything
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: You have a treasure within you that is infinitely greater than anything the world can offer
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Wisdom comes with the ability to be still. Just look and listen. No more is needed
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Be here now. Be someplace else later. Is that so complicated?
spirituality.author: David M. Bader

spirituality.quote: Live the actual moment. Only this actual moment is life
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: The mind is definitely something that can be transformed, and meditation is a means to transform it
spirituality.author: 14th Dalai Lama

spirituality.quote: Meditation practice isn’t about trying to throw ourselves away and become something better. It’s about befriending who we are already
spirituality.author: Pema Chödrön

spirituality.quote: In practicing meditation, we’re not trying to live up to some kind of ideal – quite the opposite. We’re just being with our experience, whatever it is
spirituality.author: Pema Chödrön

spirituality.quote: Buddha spent six years meditating on the essence, causes, and cures for human anguish. In the end, he came to the realization that suffering is not caused by ill fortune, by social injustice, or by divine whims. Rather, suffering is caused by the behavior patterns of one’s minds
spirituality.author: Yuval Noah Harari (Sapiens)

spirituality.quote: You are more than just your mind. You are more than just your habits. You are more than just your preferences. You’re a level of awareness
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: To be concentrated means to live fully in the present
spirituality.author: Erich Fromm

spirituality.quote: Meditation is the discovery that the point of life is always arrived at in the immediate moment
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: Paradise is not a place, it’s a state of consciousness
spirituality.author: Sri Chinmoy

spirituality.quote: Meditation is all about connecting with your soul
spirituality.author: Deepak Chopra

spirituality.quote: Meditation is the soul’s perspective glass
spirituality.author: Owen Feltham

spirituality.quote: Meditation is the ultimate mobile device; you can use it anywhere, anytime, unobtrusively
spirituality.author: Sharon Salzberg

spirituality.quote: Meditation is intermittent fasting for the mind. Too much sugar leads to a heavy body, and too many distractions lead to a heavy mind. Time spent undistracted and alone, in self-examination, journaling, meditation, resolves the unresolved and takes us from mentally fat to fit
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Meditation is freedom from thought and a movement in the ecstasy of truth. Meditation is explosion of intelligence
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: Meditation is not a withdrawal from life. Meditation is a process of understanding oneself
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: Meditation is a death – death of all that you are now. Of course there will be a resurrection, but that will be a totally new, fresh original being which you are not even aware is hidden in you
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Meditation is a way for nourishing and blossoming the divine within you
spirituality.author: Amit Ray

spirituality.quote: Meditation is not spacing-out or running away. In fact, it is being totally honest with ourselves
spirituality.author: Kathleen McDonald

spirituality.quote: Mindfulness meditation is the embrace of any and all mind states in awareness, without preferring one to another
spirituality.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

spirituality.quote: That’s an essential survival thing
spirituality.author: Jerry Seinfeld

spirituality.quote: Confine yourself to the present
spirituality.author: Marcus Aurelius

spirituality.quote: All of man’s difficulties are caused by his inability to sit, quietly, in a room by himself
spirituality.author: Blaise Pascal

spirituality.quote: On what meditation did for him: Everything. You know, one of the great things of meditation is it makes stress very easy to get rid of. It just kind of floats away instead of like finding a home in your mind. You learn how to just let go of things
spirituality.author: Jerry Seinfeld

spirituality.quote: If you just sit and observe, you will see how restless your mind is. If you try to calm it, it only makes it worse, but over time it does calm, and when it does, there’s room to hear more subtle things – that’s when your intuition starts to blossom and you start to see things more clearly and be in the present more. Your mind just slows down, and you see a tremendous expanse in the moment. You see so much more than you could see before
spirituality.author: Steve Jobs

spirituality.quote: The key to growth is the introduction of higher dimensions of consciousness into our awareness
spirituality.author: Lao Tzu

spirituality.quote: Your vision will become clear only when you look into your heart. Who looks outside, dreams. Who looks inside, awakens
spirituality.author: Carl Jung

spirituality.quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle
spirituality.author: Albert Einstein

spirituality.quote: Be happy in the moment, that’s enough. Each moment is all we need, not more
spirituality.author: Mother Teresa

spirituality.quote: Through meditation, the higher self is experienced
spirituality.author: Bhagavad Gita

spirituality.quote: One hour of contemplation surpasses sixty years of worship
spirituality.author: Muhammad

spirituality.quote: We are what our thoughts have made us; so take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; they travel far
spirituality.author: Swami Vivekananda

spirituality.quote: I know but one freedom and that is the freedom of the mind
spirituality.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

spirituality.quote: Within you there is a stillness and sanctuary to which you can retreat at any time and be yourself
spirituality.author: Hermann Hesse
