spirituality.quote: Reading makes a full man, meditation a profound man, discourse a clear man
spirituality.author: Benjamin Franklin

spirituality.quote: Empty your mind, be formless. Shapeless, like water
spirituality.author: Bruce Lee

spirituality.quote: If your mind is empty, it is always ready for anything; it is open to everything. In the beginner’s mind there are many possibilities, in the expert’s mind there are few
spirituality.author: Shunryu Suzuki

spirituality.quote: Meditate. Slow down. There’s no rush
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Meditation is the action of silence
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: Life is available only in the present moment
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: Breathe and let be
spirituality.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

spirituality.quote: Meditation is the act of stopping to deny what is
spirituality.author: Sven Schnieders

spirituality.quote: Meditation is waiting on God
spirituality.author: Mahatma Gandhi

spirituality.quote: Self-observation is the first step of inner unfolding
spirituality.author: Amit Ray

spirituality.quote: Mind only thinks, meditation lives
spirituality.author: Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh

spirituality.quote: The act of meditation is being spacious
spirituality.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

spirituality.quote: Do your practice and all is coming. K
spirituality.author: Pattabhi Jois

spirituality.quote: Turn off your mind and get to know yourself
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: A meditator is both an artist and a warrior
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: Whatever anyone does or says, I must be emerald and keep my colour
spirituality.author: Marcus Aurelius

spirituality.quote: Truth is the offspring of silence and meditation
spirituality.author: Isaac Newton

spirituality.quote: Tranquil as a forest, but on fire within, once you find your center, you are sure to win
spirituality.author: David Zippel

spirituality.quote: Whenever we attain a higher vision, the lower vision disappears of itself
spirituality.author: Swami Vivekananda

spirituality.quote: One morning, you’ll hit mental inbox zero, and that is a pretty amazing feeling. It’s a state somewhere between joy, bliss, and peace. Once you have that, you won’t want to give that up. If you can get a free hour of bliss every morning, just by closing your eyes…that’s worth its weight in gold. That will change your life
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: If every eight year old in the world is taught meditation, we will eliminate violence from the world within one generation
spirituality.author: 14th Dalai Lama

spirituality.quote: By the practice of meditation, you will find that you are carrying within your heart a portable paradise
spirituality.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

spirituality.quote: He who is persistent will realize God. So try your best to make meditation a regular experience in your life
spirituality.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

spirituality.quote: If you meditate regularly, even when you don’t feel like it, you will make great gains, for it will allow you to see how your thoughts impose limits on you. Your resistances to meditation are your mental prisons in miniature
spirituality.author: Ram Dass

spirituality.quote: Every heart has a divine intelligence and natural guidance system. With every prayer, every meditation and every thought of love, we tune in to ours
spirituality.author: Marianne Williamson

spirituality.quote: Don’t worry about whether you are making progress or not. Just keep your attention on the Self twenty-four hours a day. Meditation is not something that should be done in a particular position at a particular time. It is an awareness and an attitude that must persist through the day
spirituality.author: Annamalai Swami

spirituality.quote: Concentration is a cornerstone of mindfulness practice. Your mindfulness will only be as robust as the capacity of your mind to be calm and stable. Without calmness, the mirror of mindfulness will have an agitated and choppy surface and will not be able to reflect things with any accuracy
spirituality.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

spirituality.quote: Whenever anyone has offended me, I try to raise my soul so high that the offense cannot reach it
spirituality.author: Rene Descartes

spirituality.quote: Sitting like a mountain let your mind rise, fly and soar
spirituality.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

spirituality.quote: You are the sky. Everything else is just the weather
spirituality.author: Pema Chödrön

spirituality.quote: If it weren’t for my mind, my meditation would be excellent
spirituality.author: Pema Chödrön

spirituality.quote: It’s like having a charger for your whole body and mind
spirituality.author: Jerry Seinfeld

spirituality.quote: Meditation is a way to be narcissistic without hurting anyone
spirituality.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

spirituality.quote: Meditation is the weight room for the mind
spirituality.author: Ed Latimore

spirituality.quote: To earn the trust of your meditation, you have to visit it every day. It’s like having a puppy
spirituality.author: Chelsea Richer

spirituality.quote: It feels good. Kinda like when you have to shut your computer down, just sometimes when it goes crazy, you just shut it down and when you turn it on, it’s okay again. That’s what meditation is to me
spirituality.author: Ellen DeGeneres

spirituality.quote: SEX! Now that I have your attention… Please try to meditate at least 15 minutes, every day. You know it’s good for you
spirituality.author: Marcelo Alves

spirituality.quote: A few hours of meditation were enough to show me that I hardly had any control of myself. I was not the CEO – I was barely the gatekeeper
spirituality.author: Yuval Noah Harari

spirituality.quote: So what is a good meditator? The one who meditates
spirituality.author: Allan Lokos

spirituality.quote: A quiet mind is more important than a positive mind
spirituality.author: Deepak Chopra

spirituality.quote: The little things? The little moments? They aren’t little
spirituality.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

spirituality.quote: Only the individual transcends
spirituality.author: Steve Maxwell

spirituality.quote: Busy is a drug that a lot of people are addicted to
spirituality.author: Rob Bell

spirituality.quote: Meditation is not you going through thoughts – it’s letting thoughts go through you
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: If meditation was easy, you’d do nothing else
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Modern man is too impatient and wants to master the art of meditation immediately
spirituality.author: Swami Rama

spirituality.quote: Life is a mystery – mystery of beauty, bliss and divinity. Meditation is the art of unfolding that mystery
spirituality.author: Amit Ray

spirituality.quote: Observe your thoughts, instead of being constantly the victim of your thoughts
spirituality.author: Tim Ferriss

spirituality.quote: A human mind is a wandering mind, and a wandering mind is an unhappy mind
spirituality.author: Sam Harris

spirituality.quote: You are not controlling the storm, and you are not lost in it. You are the storm
spirituality.author: Sam Harris

spirituality.quote: While meditating we are simply seeing what the mind has been doing all along
spirituality.author: Allan Lokos

spirituality.quote: Practicing austerities such as yoga, mindfulness, and meditation will give you a front row seat to that which you will never attain and in the process make you an expert at forever seeking them
spirituality.author: Kapil Gupta

spirituality.quote: The challenge of our time is relearning how to concentrate. The past decade has seen an unparalleled assault on our capacity to fix our minds steadily on anything. To sit still and think, without succumbing to an anxious reach for a machine, has become almost impossible
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: People have original thoughts in the shower because it is one of the only places in modern life that offers refuge from entertainment, compulsive workaholism, and social hyperconnectedness. The isolation allows you to hear yourself think. Morning meditation for the masses
spirituality.author: The Stoic Emperor

spirituality.quote: The beauty of meditation is that you never know where you are, where you are going, what the end is
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: I maintain that Truth is a pathless land, and you cannot approach it by any path whatsoever, by any religion, by any sect… The moment you follow someone you cease to follow Truth
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: If there is no meditation, then you are like a blind man in a world of great beauty, light and colour
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: We carry about us the burden of what thousands of people have said and the memories of all our misfortunes. To abandon all that is to be alone, and the mind that is alone is not only innocent but young – not in time or age, but young, innocent, alive at whatever age – and only such a mind can see that which is truth and that which is not measurable by words
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: The most fundamental aggression to ourselves, the most fundamental harm we can do to ourselves, is to remain ignorant by not having the courage and the respect to look at ourselves honestly and gently
spirituality.author: Pema Chödrön

spirituality.quote: When we get too caught up in the busyness of the world, we lose connection with one another – and ourselves
spirituality.author: Jack Kornfield

spirituality.quote: Thought can organize the world so well that you are no longer able to see it
spirituality.author: Anthony De Mello

spirituality.quote: Awareness is like the sun. When it shines on things, they are transformed
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: Walk as if you are kissing the Earth with your feet
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: Don’t believe everything you think. Thoughts are just that – thoughts
spirituality.author: Allan Lokos

spirituality.quote: Perhaps ultimately, spiritual simply means experiencing wholeness and interconnectedness directly, a seeing that individuality and the totality are interwoven, that nothing is separate or extraneous. If you see in this way, then everything becomes spiritual in its deepest sense. Doing science is spiritual. So is washing the dishes
spirituality.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

spirituality.quote: Many people are alive but don’t touch the miracle of being alive
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: In the beginning you will fall into the gaps in between thoughts – after practicing for years, you become the gap.
spirituality.author: J. Kleykamp

spirituality.quote: You’re actually in deep meditation all the time. It’s just covered up by all the noise, and all the thoughts, and all the emotional things that are running through you. It’s always there underneath
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Doing nothing is really hard for us, since we’re such a productivity-driven culture and species
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: When you’re centered, your emotions are not hijacking you
spirituality.author: Ray Dalio

spirituality.quote: To become different from what we are, we must have some awareness of what we are
spirituality.author: Eric Hoffer

spirituality.quote: Wisdom tends to grow in proportion to one’s awareness of one’s ignorance
spirituality.author: Anthony de Mello

spirituality.quote: The whole life is a succession of dreams. My ambition is to be a conscious dreamer, that is all
spirituality.author: Swami Vivekananda

spirituality.quote: The time to relax is when you don’t have time for it.
spirituality.author: Sydney J. Harris

spirituality.quote: Even in the midst of disturbance, the stillness of the mind can offer sanctuary
spirituality.author: Stephen Richards

spirituality.quote: Meditation is turning off society and listening to yourself. It only "works" when done for its own sake. Hiking is walking meditation. Journaling is writing meditation. Praying is gratitude meditation. Showering is accidental meditation. Sitting quietly is direct meditation
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: The advantage of meditation is recognizing just how out of control your mind is
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: The only difference between meditation and ordinary social interaction is that the friend you’re gradually coming to know is yourself
spirituality.author: Mingyur Rinpoche

spirituality.quote: Like water which can clearly mirror the sky and the trees only so long as its surface is undisturbed, the mind can only reflect the true image of the Self when it is tranquil and wholly relaxed
spirituality.author: Indra Devi

spirituality.quote: Meditation could be said to be the Art of Simplicity: simply sitting, simply breathing and simply being
spirituality.author: Dilgo Khyentse Rinpoche

spirituality.quote: Meditation is the only intentional, systematic human activity which at bottom is about not trying to improve yourself or get anywhere else, but simply to realize where you already are
spirituality.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

spirituality.quote: Instead of "Let it go," we should probably say "Let it be"; this recognizes that the mind won’t let go and the problem may not go away, and it allows you to form a healthier relationship with what’s bothering you
spirituality.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

spirituality.quote: What would it be like if I could accept life – accept this moment – exactly as it is?
spirituality.author: Tara Brach

spirituality.quote: Be at least as interested in what goes on inside you as what happens outside. If you get the inside right, the outside will fall into place
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Abraham Lincoln said, "Give me six hours to chop down a tree and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe". You have 24 to chop every day. Sleep, exercise, meditation, reading – those are some of your sharpening tools. Do not chop for 18 hours with a blunt axe
spirituality.author: Johnny Uzan

spirituality.quote: The affairs of the world will go on forever. Do not delay the practice of meditation
spirituality.author: Milarepa

spirituality.quote: Meditation is not a means to an end. It is both the means and the end
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: One conscious breath in and out is a meditation
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Don’t try to solve anything, just "be"
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: I just started with watching my breath and evolved from there
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: No intentions, just be. There can’t be any formula. It’s available to everyone or not at all
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: No apps, no noise, no guidance. Sit in a comfortable position first thing in the morning, back upright, but ok to use cushions etc.. One hour at a time, no less. Just surrender to and accept whatever happens. No energy for and no energy against. Resist and reject nothing
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: No effort. You’re just going to sit there and let whatever happens happen
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: If you have thoughts that’s perfectly ok. Let the thoughts happen. The key word is Surrender (to whatever is happening)
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Tell yourself when you sit down, "my job is to do nothing. I’m taking a well deserved break from myself
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: It’s hard to recommend a routine as it’s the ultimate single-player game. Try them all and see which one works for you
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant (Try routine 1, routine 2, routine 3)

spirituality.quote: This will summon a horde of angry people but I would skip TM [Transcendental Meditation] and apps. No systems, no interference. Pick a dark, quiet place, first thing in the morning, just sit and observe (your breath). Let everything go, surrender to what happens. One hour per day for one week straight
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Sit down, close your eyes, get in a comfortable position, and whatever happens, happens. If you think, you think. If you don’t think, you don’t think. Don’t put any effort into it
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: Please, when you practice meditation, don’t make any effort. Allow yourself to be like a pebble at rest. The pebble is resting at the bottom of a river, and the pebble does not have to do anything. While you are a walking, you are resting. While you were sitting, you are resting
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: If you are scoring points on meditation, you are doing it wrong
spirituality.author: Naval Ravikant

spirituality.quote: When sitting in meditation, say, "That’s not my business!" with every thought that comes by
spirituality.author: Ajahn Chah

spirituality.quote: When you begin to meditate you may notice changes right away. Or nothing much may seem to change. Don’t count on anything dramatic. Most changes happen slowly
spirituality.author: Ram Dass

spirituality.quote: Meditate every single day. Not once in a while. Every single day
spirituality.author: Khensu

spirituality.quote: 1. Sit comfortably, with your spine erect, either in a chair or cross-legged on a cushion
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: 2. Close your eyes, take a few deep breaths, and feel the points of contact between your body and the chair or the floor. Notice the sensations associated with sitting — feelings of pressure, warmth, tingling, vibration, etc
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: 3. Gradually become aware of the process of breathing. Pay attention to wherever you feel the breath most distinctly — either at your nostrils or in the rising and falling of your abdomen
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: 4. Allow your attention to rest in the mere sensation of breathing. (You don’t have to control your breath. Just let it come and go naturally)
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: 5. Every time your mind wanders in thought, gently return it to the breath
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: 6. As you focus on the process of breathing, you will also perceive sounds, bodily sensations, or emotions. Simply observe these phenomena as they appear in consciousness and then return to the breath
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: 7. The moment you notice that you have been lost in thought, observe the present thought itself as an object of consciousness. Then return your attention to the breath — or to any sounds or sensations arising in the next moment
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: 8. Continue in this way until you can merely witness all objects of consciousness — sights, sounds, sensations, emotions, even thoughts themselves — as they arise, change, and pass away
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: To pray and work in the morning and to labor and rest in the afternoon, and to sit still again in meditation in the evening when night falls upon that land and when the silence fills itself with darkness and with stars. This is a true and special vocation. There are few who are willing to belong completely to such silence, to let it soak into their bones, to breathe nothing but silence, to feed on silence, and to turn the very substance of their life into a living and vigilant silence
spirituality.author: Thomas Merton

spirituality.quote: Just sit, breathe, and pay attention to what it’s like to be you. Nothing to add. Nothing to take away. Nothing to fix, or change or do. Just you – sitting, breathing, paying attention. You are welcome here. Here you belong. Here you are enough. Breathe
spirituality.author: Jason Garner

spirituality.quote: Mindfulness is the aware, balanced acceptance of the present experience
spirituality.author: Sylvia Boorstein

spirituality.quote: Life is a dance. Mindfulness is witnessing that dance
spirituality.author: Amit Ray

spirituality.quote: The wiser you get, the more detached and grounded you become
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Things that have a consciousness are higher than those that don’t
spirituality.author: Marcus Aurelius

spirituality.quote: The quieter you become, the more you can hear
spirituality.author: Ram Dass

spirituality.quote: Stop doing. Start being
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Let go of your mind and then be mindful
spirituality.author: Rumi

spirituality.quote: Mindfulness is a way of befriending ourselves and our experience
spirituality.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

spirituality.quote: There is a great beauty in observation, in seeing things as they are
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: This is the real secret of life – to be completely engaged with what you are doing in the here and now
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: Your life should be a continuous death and a continuous resurrection, so that you remain fresh to the very last breath
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Clarity and decisiveness come from the willingness to slow down, to listen and look at what’s happening
spirituality.author: Pema Chödrön

spirituality.quote: In the end, just three things matter: How well we have lived. How well we have loved. How well we have learned to let go
spirituality.author: Jack Kornfield

spirituality.quote: Wherever you are, be all there
spirituality.author: Ram Dass

spirituality.quote: Normalize listening more than you talk
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Empathy is the new mindfulness
spirituality.author: Scott Barry Kaufman

spirituality.quote: Any moment can be a meditation if you are in control of your attention
spirituality.author: James Clear

spirituality.quote: Your goal is not to battle with the mind, but to witness the mind
spirituality.author: Swami Muktananda

spirituality.quote: Mindfulness meditation helps you tackle every little problem one by one with equanimity and presence rather than worry about 100 problems all at once and never do anything about anything
spirituality.author: Scott Barry Kaufman

spirituality.quote: Mindfulness is the kind of light that shows us the way. It is the living Buddha inside of each of us. Mindfulness gives birth to insight, awakening, compassion, and love
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: The way you speak to others can offer them joy, happiness, self-confidence, hope, trust, and enlightenment. Mindful speaking is a deep practice
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: To go out of your mind once a day is tremendously important, because by going out of your mind you come to your senses
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: Be devoted to heedfulness. Guard your mind
spirituality.author: The Dhammapada

spirituality.quote: Enlightenment is ego’s ultimate disappointment
spirituality.author: Chögyam Trungpa

spirituality.quote: Noise brings confusion. Silence brings clarity
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Is it possible for the mind each day to be so totally aware that problems no longer exist?
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: Observe without division
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: No thought, no mind, no choice – just being silent, rooted in yourself
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: A serious mind can never be in the present. Only a playful mind, only children, are in the present. So be more childlike… play more
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Being mindful means that we suspend judgment for a time, set aside our immediate goals for the future, and take in the present moment as it is rather than as we would like it to be. J. Mark G
spirituality.author: Williams (The Mindful Way through Depression, Amazon book)

spirituality.quote: In trading the pleasures of an ordinary life for a meditative life, you’re trading candy for gold
spirituality.author: Thanissaro Bhikkhu

spirituality.quote: Just because our eyes are open does not mean we are awake
spirituality.author: Haemin Sunim

spirituality.quote: Learn to watch your drama unfold while at the same time knowing you are more than your drama
spirituality.author: Ram Dass

spirituality.quote: Conscious breathing is my anchor
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: Be aware of your breathing. Notice how this takes attention away from your thinking and creates space
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: The present moment contains the fullness of space
spirituality.author: Sahil Lavingia

spirituality.quote: Mindfulness isn’t difficult, we just need to remember to do it
spirituality.author: Sharon Salzberg

spirituality.quote: Imagine witnessing every situation, person, and thing just as it is
spirituality.author: Byron Katie

spirituality.quote: Be happy in the moment, that’s enough, each moment is all we need, not more
spirituality.author: Mother Teresa

spirituality.quote: The first important step into the now is to become aware of whatever surrounds you
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: The inner peace of an alert and calm mind are the source of real happiness and good health
spirituality.author: 14th Dalai Lama

spirituality.quote: Become an alchemist. Transmute base metal into gold, suffering into consciousness, disaster into enlightenment
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Until you make the unconscious conscious, it will direct your life and you will call it fate
spirituality.author: Carl Jung

spirituality.quote: When I dance, I dance; when I sleep, I sleep; yes, and when I walk alone in a beautiful orchard, if my thoughts drift to far-off matters for some part of the time for some other part I lead them back again to the walk, the orchard, to the sweetness of this solitude, to myself
spirituality.author: Michel de Montaigne

spirituality.quote: Meditation is not about achieving anything. It’s about letting go, being at ease with whatever arises.
spirituality.author: Andy Puddicomb

spirituality.quote: Die each moment so that you are renewed each moment
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Now is the only reality. All else is either memory or imagination
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: When you can bear your own emptiness, you are free
spirituality.author: Mooji

spirituality.quote: Learning to pause is the first step in the practice of Radical Acceptance. A pause is a suspension of activity, a time of temporary disengagement when we are no longer moving toward any goal
spirituality.author: Tara Brach

spirituality.quote: If we want to become mindful, rather than just knowing about mindfulness, we need to establish our own regular practice
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: In mindfulness one is not only restful and happy, but alert and awake. Meditation is not evasion; it is a serene encounter with reality
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: It is extremely difficult to stay alert and attentive, instead of getting hypnotized by the constant monologue inside your own head.
spirituality.author: David Foster Wallace

spirituality.quote: It is unimaginably hard to do this, to stay conscious and alive, day in and day out
spirituality.author: David Foster Wallace (This Is Water)

spirituality.quote: Freeing oneself from words is liberation
spirituality.author: Bodhidharma

spirituality.quote: You cannot control the results, only your actions
spirituality.author: Allan Lokos

spirituality.quote: With mindfulness we can see the poetry and beauty all around us. We can see the miracles of life
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: When the mind is completely aware it becomes extraordinarily silent, quiet; it is not asleep, but highly awake in that silence
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: When you learn to just sit and become completely present, you naturally become completely quiet, with none of that jazz going on inside. A person who can’t really sit as if there were nothing else to do also won’t be able to act because he’ll never be completely all here
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: You begin by letting thoughts flow and watching them. The very observation slows down the mind until it stops altogether. Once the mind is quiet, keep it quiet. Don’t get bored with peace, be in it, go deeper in it
spirituality.author: Nisargadatta Maharaj

spirituality.quote: This is a very important practice. Live your daily life in a way that you never lose yourself. When you are carried away with your worries, fears, cravings, anger, and desire, you run away from yourself and you lose yourself. The practice is always to go back to oneself
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: When you breathe in mindfully, there is a happy reunion between body and mind. This doesn’t take any fancy technique
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: The most precious gift we can offer anyone is our attention. When mindfulness embraces those we love, they will bloom like flowers
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: When we are mindful, deeply in touch with the present moment, our understanding of what is going on deepens, and we begin to be filled with acceptance, joy, peace and love
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: When you step outside your mind you can relax and just witness the show
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Mindfulness meditation is a matter of rewiring your brain so that instead of primarily being rewarded by the possibility of reward, you are intrinsically rewarded by all of the beauty that already exists at any given moment right in front of your eyes or in your rich imagination
spirituality.author: Scott Barry Kaufman

spirituality.quote: It’s easy to be mindful when things are fine and dandy. It’s times of challenge, adversity and anxiety that we must face with mindful strength
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: Practice of mindfulness is like a boat and by practicing mindfulness you offer yourself a boat and you will not sink in a river of suffering
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: If you listen completely, entirely, wholly, at the actual moment of listening there is no confusion, and that moment is enough
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: You can discover truth only if you are willing to give your whole mind and heart to it, not a few moments of your easily spared time
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: The only thing that is ultimately real about your journey is the step that you are taking at this moment. That’s all there ever is
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Mindfulness is clarity. Clarity of thought. Clarity of intent. Clarity of action. When you possess this level of clarity you are able to be in control of most levels of your life. And being in control is one of the most powerful feelings one can experience
spirituality.author: Adrian Lliopoulos

spirituality.quote: It is the most beautiful moment in one’s life when there is neither confusion nor certainty. One simply is – a mirror reflecting that which is. With no direction to go anywhere, with no idea of doing something, with no future – just utterly in the moment, tremendously in the moment
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: When the mind remains silent for yours, it becomes fresh, young, more creative, more sensitive, rejuvenated through rest
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: By silencing the mind, we can experience real peace
spirituality.author: Henepola Gunaratana

spirituality.quote: Look at things as they are, not as your emotions color them
spirituality.author: Robert Greene

spirituality.quote: Die in your thoughts every morning and you will no longer fear death
spirituality.author: Yamamoto Tsunetomo (Hagakure, Book of the Samurai)

spirituality.quote: Unless one is able to live fully in the present, the future is a hoax
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: In mindfulness, we start to see the world as it is, not as we expect it to be, how we want it to be, or what we fear it might become
spirituality.author: Mark Williams (Mindfulness: An Eight-Week Plan for Finding Peace in a Frantic World, Amazon book)

spirituality.quote: One person feels quite secure with practically no money in the bank, another feels insecure even though he has millions. It isn’t the amount of money but their programming that makes the difference
spirituality.author: Anthony de Mello

spirituality.quote: The problem is that ego can convert anything to its own use, even spirituality
spirituality.author: Chögyam Trungpa

spirituality.quote: If we are unduly absorbed in improving our lives we may forget altogether to live them
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: No valid plans for the future can be made by those who have no capacity for living now
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: The art of living is neither careless drifting on the one hand nor fearful clinging to the past and the known on the other. It consists in being completely sensitive to each moment, in regarding it as utterly new and unique, in having the mind open and wholly receptive
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: Distraction addiction is the disease. Smartphones are just a delivery mechanism
spirituality.author: Michael

spirituality.quote: If your behavior is out of control, governed by mimetic desires, social signaling, mindless habits, impulsive anger, ignorance-induced anxiety, start watching all your thoughts, reactions, emotions, actions, be mindful of every moment of the day, and life will slowly get better
spirituality.author: Unknown

spirituality.quote: To live in the eternal present there must be death to the past, to memory. In this death is timeless renewal
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: Life repeats itself mindlessly – unless you become mindful, it will go on repeating like a wheel
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Sadness comes, joy comes, and everything passes by. What remains always is the witness. The witness is beyond all polarities
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Time is not a line, but a series of now-points
spirituality.author: Taisen Deshimaru

spirituality.quote: The past has no power over the present moment
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: Inner emptiness is not a void to be filled with comforts; it is a window to be looked through
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: Truly, just sit…That’s all there is
spirituality.author: Motoko Ikebe

spirituality.quote: To understand music, you must listen to it. But so long as you are thinking, "I am listening to this music," you are not listening
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: Only those who have cultivated the art of living completely in the present have any use for making plans for the future. For when the plans mature they will be able to enjoy the results
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: You can’t be mindful when your mind’s full
spirituality.author: Jack Butcher

spirituality.quote: Observing not absorbing
spirituality.author: Maryam Hasnaa

spirituality.quote: It is up to the most conscious person in the situation to break the chain of reactivity
spirituality.author: Ram Dass

spirituality.quote: As long as you have certain desires about how it ought to be you can’t see how it is
spirituality.author: Ram Dass

spirituality.quote: It is opening to or receiving the present moment, pleasant or unpleasant, just as it is, without either clinging to it or rejecting it
spirituality.author: Sylvia Boorstein

spirituality.quote: Use every distraction as an object of meditation and they cease to be distractions
spirituality.author: Mingyur Rinpoche

spirituality.quote: Right mindfulness is not a tool or an instrument, but a path. Right mindfulness is not a means that can be used to arrive at an end
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: The future is a concept – it doesn’t exist. There is no such thing as tomorrow. There never will be because time is always now. That’s one of the things we discover when we stop talking to ourselves and stop thinking. We find there is only present, only an eternal now
spirituality.author: Alan Watts

spirituality.quote: Never in human history have we had so many means of communication, yet we remain islands, with little real communication between us. When we cannot communicate, we suffer, and we spill our suffering on to other people. Mindfulness and insight can intervene
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: Mindfulness practice is not an evasion or an escape. It means entering vigorously into life — with the strength generated by the energy of mindfulness. Without this freedom and concentration, there is no happiness
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: There are many ways to come back to the here and the now, and to touch life deeply. But they all involve mindful breathing. If we are anchored in our mindful breathing, we can practice anytime. Otherwise we risk missing our lives, our lives that are lived in the here and now
spirituality.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

spirituality.quote: Every day has its drama. If you are waiting for a day without drama, you are waiting for death. Mindfulness is what gives us the space to meet all drama without tension. While we can’t always be free of drama, we can be free from the effects of it. It’s called peace of mind
spirituality.author: Thibaut

spirituality.quote: Allowing the new to happen means putting aside your memory so the past does not interfere
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Can this mind, which is the result of time, of various cultures, experiences and knowledge, look with eyes that are not conditioned?
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: Look at yourself, observe yourself; do not beat yourself, but observe
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: If the present is burdened with the experience of yesterday there can be no renewal
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: The moment you try to correct what is, you are bringing disorder. But if you merely observe actually what is, then what is is order
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: Observe your reaction, do not call it good or bad
spirituality.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: It’s not a question of learning much. On the contrary. It’s a question of unlearning much
spirituality.author: Osho

spirituality.quote: Become comfortable with silence
spirituality.author: Maxime Lagacé

spirituality.quote: Mindfulness means paying attention in a particular way: on purpose, in the present moment, and non-judgmentally. This kind of attention nurtures greater awareness, clarity, and acceptance of the present-moment reality. It wakes us up to the fact that our lives unfold only in moments. If we are not fully present for many of those moments, we may not only miss what is most valuable in our lives but also fail to realize the richness and the depth of our possibilities for growth and transformation
spirituality.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

spirituality.quote: Silence went to see the ego, but there where nobody home.
spirituality.author: Frode Gåsland

spirituality.quote: Legal and illegal does not necessarily mean good and bad or right and wrong. It simply means that some men in power got together and decided that certain things are "right" while others are "wrong". So it is largely a matter of perspective; and perspectives tend to change over time. As such, there seem to be man-made laws from one side and — timeless, universal, almost unwritten — Spiritual laws from another. Assisted by our own logic, reason and morality, us cosmic, visiting travellers who are made of stardust and who happen to be citizens of the Earth for some decades can choose to be guided by the Spiritual laws.
spirituality.author: Omar Cherif

spirituality.quote: You are a mystery in yourself, go beyond everything for its revelation.
spirituality.author: Shiva Negi

spirituality.quote: Be like fire; burn the non-essential.
spirituality.author: Pranay

spirituality.quote: You are not the only occupant of your body-mind. Other bodyless beings often take over your body-mind and do their deeds.
spirituality.author: Shunya

spirituality.quote: Math is the realest thing of all. Existence is mathematical, energy is mathematical, and you yourself are 100% mathematical. You will never know who you are – you will never arrive at the answer to your existence and the meaning of your life – until you understand what you are. You are pure math – whether you like it or not! You are an individual, autonomous, self-solving, self-optimising node in an unimaginably vast, collective, cosmic, self-solving, self-optimising mathematical equation ... the equation of existence. The answer to existence is inside you right now. Only math can extract it. Isn’t it time you learned what math actually is?
spirituality.author: Mike Hockney

spirituality.quote: When consciousness has not evolved through life, people tend to develop a juvenile emotional need for a patriarchal figure which represents a source of authority. Whether it’s a president, a boss, a religious leader, or even a God(s), the figures are accordingly looked upon as powerful, protective, comforting, and dependable entities to be trusted and followed.
spirituality.author: Omar Cherif

spirituality.quote: Everything in life is meaningless without the knowledge of the soul.
spirituality.author: Shiva Negi

spirituality.quote: If you really know yourself, It is enough to live life to the fullest regardless of circumstances.
spirituality.author: Shiva Negi

spirituality.quote: The ultimate purpose of human life is to be free from the bondage of karma despite performing his duty.
spirituality.author: Shiva Negi

spirituality.quote: The highest vision of the soul lies in being united with God in every thought and action.
spirituality.author: Shiva Negi

spirituality.quote: True happiness and satisfaction comes from the attainment of self-knowledge.
spirituality.author: Shiva Negi

spirituality.quote: वह जो अपना कर्तव्य सही ज्ञान और भक्ति के साथ करता है वह उच्च चेतना के साथ भगवान को प्राप्त करता है।
spirituality.author: Shiva Negi

spirituality.quote: The one who performs his duty with the right knowledge and devotion attains God with higher consciousness.
spirituality.author: Shiva Negi

spirituality.quote: Life begins at the very moment of the Self-realization of God with higher consciousness.
spirituality.author: Shiva Negi

spirituality.quote: The way of the warrior is to give up inner turmoil.
spirituality.author: Pranay

spirituality.quote: Always be united with God in every thought and action, it will lead you to the attainment of self-knowledge.
spirituality.author: Shiva Negi

spirituality.quote: You can overcome all the sufferings of your life only with the light of self-knowledge; There is no other way.
spirituality.author: Shiva Negi

spirituality.quote: The essence of your life lies in the self-realization of God in higherconsciousness.
spirituality.author: Shiva Negi

spirituality.quote: Confusing religion with spirituality is like confusing education with intelligence.
spirituality.author: Omar Cherif

spirituality.quote: Perhaps many of us do not like it where we are in the Universe right now, but we can all be certain that we got where we are by our own decisions to expand in love or withdraw from it.
spirituality.author: Thaddeus Golas

spirituality.quote: Further away you are from the truth, more you talk about it.
spirituality.author: Shunya

spirituality.quote: There is no key to the mind. It can only be opened from inside.
spirituality.author: Shane Pakele

spirituality.quote: When we are in-tune with our inner being and our intents match in accordance to the universe, we come to experience a mysterious kind of life force. A vital psycho-energetic fundamental substance, which constantly propels us forwards, and with such passion, too. It empowers us to impose our will and imprint our intent on the universe. This vibrational energy not only permeates us, but it also spreads throughout the entirety of existence — that which seems to be outside of us.Such sobering realisation creeps up on you once you’ve been touched by the ‘otherness’. You instantly know that it’s not really about You. But rather, it’s about the ‘U’ in the ‘US’. Truly, no man is an island. This liberating moment leaves us with a transcendental sensation of belonging to the whole; of ‘mattering’ and of being able to co-create compassionate change in the world.Allow this Prima Materia to flow through you unobstructed and you start living a magical existence through which synchronicity reaches notorious heights and nothing is impossible.
spirituality.author: Omar Cherif

spirituality.quote: Once individuals become too ‘religious’ about a certain belief or reality tunnel they tend to subconsciously lose sight of the bigger picture. Be it faith, atheism, patriotism, veganism, cross-fittanism among a multitude of other isms and schisms, teachers and followers alike often cannot help but become dogmatic to a considerable degree. This happens when they don’t, at least occasionally, pause, reflect, or question — themselves included — which leaves them blinded by an illusory light at the end of their tunnel. The more certain they become regarding holding absolute truth, the more they drift away from truth; for absolute certainty remains life’s biggest illusion. The key is to do whatever you feel like doing without the need to shove it down others’ throats. And those who vibrate at similar frequencies will eventually find you.
spirituality.author: Omar Cherif

spirituality.quote: The divine spark that you seek is already within you. Allow it to shine through you unobstructed and it will eternally light your way.
spirituality.author: Omar Cherif

spirituality.quote: It truly is gratifying to have morals. Without expecting some divine reward or fearing any retribution, one can indeed be a decent human being who aspires to do the right things.
spirituality.author: Omar Cherif

spirituality.quote: Some of the middlemen who claim to be closer to God than all the rest of humanity realise that they can outwit their followers by making them believe that the more you serve them, the more you are pleasing God. Needless to say, many folks throughout history bought this codswallop.For those followers, having an authority figure like a middleman, teacher, cleric, or guru becomes their only way to add spiritual significance into their lives and to feel whole. As a result, they throw away that responsibility by counting on another entity outside of themselves. Depending on such hand-holding renders them mentally, emotionally, even spiritually immature — losing their freedom and critical thinking in the process while never achieving wholeness.On the other hand, propelled by the exhausted rules, dogmas, and hierarchy they embody, when "the false prophets in sheep's clothing" notice the submission of such followers they often begin taking advantage of it. Now bow down and kiss my feet to reach Nirvana! Wash them first.But as Allan Watts seamlessly put it: "Anybody who tells you that he has some way of leading you to spiritual enlightenment is like somebody who picks your pocket and sells you your own watch. Of course if you didn’t know you had a watch, that might be the only way of getting you to realise."This all echoes with even more striking words by Bob Dylan: You don’t need a weatherman to know which way the wind blows. Simply Know Thyself; the rest shall follow.
spirituality.author: Omar Cherif

spirituality.quote: I used to say: "All religions are somewhat true. But my religion is the truest of them all because I was born into it and never got to choose it." Now I have transcended this atavistic dogmatic reality tunnel and evolved into spirituality, thereby making me more spiritually enlightened than you.
spirituality.author: Omar Cherif

spirituality.quote: Imagine how your conception of reality would change if instead of regarding photons as particles of light, you regarded them as particles of thought. Imagine how reality would be transformed for you if yousubscribed to the equation: light = thought = life. A world of light would therefore be a living world of mind ... a living, evolving organism, not a dead, purposeless machine.
spirituality.author: Mike Hockney

spirituality.quote: Thomas Merton wrote, "there is always a temptation to diddle around in the contemplative life, making itsy-bitsy statues." There is always an enormous temptation in all of life to diddle around making itsy-bitsy friends and meals and journeys for itsy-bitsy years on end. It is so self-conscious, so apparently moral, simply to step aside from the gaps where the creeks and winds pour down, saying, I never merited this grace, quite rightly, and then to sulk along the rest of your days on the edge of rage. I won’t have it. The world is wilder than that in all directions, more dangerous and bitter, more extravagant and bright. We are making hay when we should be making whoopee; we are raising tomatoes when we should be raising Cain, or Lazarus.Go up into the gaps. If you can find them; they shift and vanish too. Stalk the gaps. Squeak into a gap in the soil, turn, and unlock-more than a maple- a universe. This is how you spend this afternoon, and tomorrow morning, and tomorrow afternoon. Spend the afternoon. You can’t take it with you.
spirituality.author: Annie Dillard

spirituality.quote: And if he had judged her harshly? If her life were a simple rosary of hours, her life simple and strange as a bird's life, gay in the morning, restless all day, tired at sundown? Her heart simple and willful as a bird's heart?
spirituality.author: James Joyce

spirituality.quote: The soul is like an uninhabited worldthat comes to life only whenGod lays His headagainst us.
spirituality.author: St. Thomas Aquinas

spirituality.quote: With a truly tragic delusion," Carl Jung noted, "these theologians fail to see that it is not a matter of proving the existence of the light, but of blind people who do not know that their eyes could see. It is high time we realized that it is pointless to praise the light and preach it if nobody can see it. It is much more needful to teach people the art of seeing.
spirituality.author: Carl Jung

spirituality.quote: The sea is only the embodiment of asupernatural and wonderful existence.It is nothing but love and emotion;it is the ‘Living Infinite...
spirituality.author: Jules Verne

spirituality.quote: When you catch yourself slipping into a pool of negativity, notice how it derives from nothing other than resistance to the current situation.
spirituality.author: Donna Quesada

spirituality.quote: It takes darkness to be aware of the light.
spirituality.author: Treasure Tatum

spirituality.quote: The struggles we endure today will be the ‘good old days’ we laugh about tomorrow.
spirituality.author: Aaron Lauritsen

spirituality.quote: God loved us before he made us; and his love has never diminished and never shall.
spirituality.author: Julian of Norwich

spirituality.quote: Love is our most unifying and empowering common spiritual denominator. The more we ignore its potential to bring greater balance and deeper meaning to human existence, the more likely we are to continue to define history as one long inglorious record of man’s inhumanity to man.
spirituality.author: Aberjhani

spirituality.quote: When God takes out the trash, don't go digging back through it. Trust Him.
spirituality.author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana

spirituality.quote: Successful people enjoy the journeys they embark on, irrespective of whether they reach their destination or not.
spirituality.author: Zain Hashmi

spirituality.quote: CIRCLES OF LIFEEverythingTurns,Rotates,Spins,Circles,Loops,Pulsates,Resonates,AndRepeats.CirclesOf life,Born fromPulsesOf light,VibrateToBreathe,WhileSpiralingOutwardsForInfinityThroughThe lensOf time,And intoA seaOf starsAndLucidDreams.Poetry by Suzy Kassem
spirituality.author: Suzy Kassem

spirituality.quote: Make peace with silence, and remind yourself that it is in this space that you'll come to remember your spirit. When you're able to transcend an aversion to silence, you'll also transcend many other miseries. And it is in this silence that the remembrance of God will be activated.
spirituality.author: Wayne W. Dyer

spirituality.quote: When you fail, that is when you get closer to success.
spirituality.author: Stephen Richards

spirituality.quote: We think that if we just meditated enough or jogged enough or ate perfect food, everything would be perfect. But from the point of view of someone who is awake, that’s death. Seeking security or perfection, rejoicing in feeling confirmed and whole, self contained and comfortable, is some kind of death. It doesn’t have any fresh air. There’s no room for something to come in and interrupt all that. We are killing the moment by controlling our experience.
spirituality.author: Pema Chödrön

spirituality.quote: It is not what to do, but how much love we put into the doing. We can do not greats, only small things with great love." - Mother Theresa
spirituality.author: Mother Teresa

spirituality.quote: Sometimes I think there are only two instructions we need to follow to develop and deepen our spiritual life: slow down and let go.
spirituality.author: Oriah Mountain Dreamer

spirituality.quote: If you think you can then you can.
spirituality.author: Stephen Richards

spirituality.quote: Whole life is a search for beauty. But, when the beauty is found inside, the search ends and a beautiful journey begins.
spirituality.author: Harshit Walia

spirituality.quote: Spirituality does not lie in meditating the body of an ex-master. Spirituality exists in mediating on your own inner body.
spirituality.author: Amit Ray

spirituality.quote: This is the secret of life: the self lives only by dying, finds its identity (and its happiness) only by self-forgetfulness, self-giving, self-sacrifice, and agape love.
spirituality.author: Peter Kreeft

spirituality.quote: Courage is the hallmark of spirituality. Courage comes when you love yourself for who you are.
spirituality.author: Amit Ray

spirituality.quote: Be afraid of nothing. Hating none, giving love to all, feeling the love of God, seeing His presence in everyone, and having but one desire - for His constant presence in the temple of your consciousness - that is the way to live in this world.
spirituality.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

spirituality.quote: Negativity is totally unnatural. It is a psychic pollutant, and there is a deep link between the poisoning and destruction of nature and the vast negativity that has accumulated in the collective human psyche. No other life-form on the planet knows negativity, only humans, just as no other life-form violates and poisons the Earth that sustains it. Have you ever seen an unhappy flower or a stressed oak tree? Have you some across a depressed dolphin, a frog that has a problem with self-esteem, a cat that cannot relax, or a bird that carries hatred and resentment? The only animals that may occasionally experience something akin to negativity or show signs of neurotic behavior are those that live in close contact with humans and so link into the humans mind and its insanity.
spirituality.author: Eckhart Tolle

spirituality.quote: If faith is what you have to go on, if faith is the link between your beliefs and the world at large, your beliefs are very likely to be wrong. Beliefs can be right or wrong. If you believe you can fly, that belief is only true if indeed you can fly. Somebody who thinks he can fly, and is wrong about it, will eventually discover there's a problem with his view of the world.
spirituality.author: Sam Harris

spirituality.quote: We all have bad days, but one thing is true; no cloud is so dark that the sun can't shine through.
spirituality.author: Miranda Kerr

spirituality.quote: We're all pieces of the same ever-changing puzzle;some connected for mere seconds, some connected for life,some connected through knowledge, some through belief,some connected through wisdom, some through Love, and some connected with no explanation at all. Yet, as spiritual beings having a human experience, we're all here for the sensations this reality or illusion has to offer. The best anyone can hope for is the right to be able to Live, Learn, Love then Leave. After that, reap the benefits of their own chosen existence in the hereafter by virtue of simply believing in what they believe. As for here, it took me a while but this progression helped me with my life: "I like myself. I Love myself. I am myself.
spirituality.author: Stanley Victor Paskavich

spirituality.quote: Hypocrisy is wretched because the hypocrite says with his tongue what is not in his heart. He wrongs his tongue and oppresses his heart. But if the heart is sound, the condition of the tongue follows suit. We are commanded to be upright in speech, which is a gauge of the heart's state.
spirituality.author: Hamza Yusuf

spirituality.quote: Searching outside of you is Samsara (the world). Searching within you leads to Nirvana.
spirituality.author: Amit Ray

spirituality.quote: What a lover’s heart knows let no man’s brain dispute.
spirituality.author: Aberjhani

spirituality.quote: If you have time to chatter,Read books.If you have time to read,Walk into mountain, desert and ocean.If you have time to walk,Sing songs and dance.If you have time to dance,Sit quietly, you happy, lucky idiot.
spirituality.author: Nanao Sakaki

spirituality.quote: All Earthquakes and Disasters are warnings; there’s too much corruption in the world
spirituality.author: Aristotle

spirituality.quote: Low self-esteem causes me to believe that I have so little worth that my response does not matter. With repentance, however, I understand that being worth so much to God is why my response is so important. Repentance is remedial work to mend our minds and hearts, which get bent by sin.
spirituality.author: John Ortberg

spirituality.quote: The soil in which the meditative mind can begin is the soil of everyday life, the strife, the pain, and the fleeting joy. It must begin there, and bring order, and from there move endlessly. But if you are concerned only with making order, then that very order will bring about its own limitation, and the mind will be its prisoner. In all this movement you must somehow begin from the other end, from the other shore, and not always be concerned with this shore or how to cross the river. You must take a plunge into the water, not knowing how to swim. And the beauty of meditation is that you never know where you are, where you are going, what the end is.
spirituality.author: J. Krishnamurti

spirituality.quote: The way of Jesus cannot be imposed or mapped — it requires an active participation in following Jesus as he leads us through sometimes strange and unfamiliar territory, in circumstances that become clear only in the hesitations and questionings, in the pauses and reflections where we engage in prayerful conversation with one another and with him.
spirituality.author: Eugene H. Peterson

spirituality.quote: Religion is for those who don't want to go to hell, and spirituality is for those who have already been there.
spirituality.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

spirituality.quote: Never allow your ego to diminish your ability to listen.
spirituality.author: Gary   Hopkins

spirituality.quote: Everyone has the fire, but the champions know when to ignite the spark.
spirituality.author: Amit Ray

spirituality.quote: When we retire at night, we constructively review our day. Were we resentful, selfish, dishonest or afraid? Do we owe an apology? Have we kept something to ourselves which should be discussed with another person at once? Were we kind and loving toward all? What could we have done better? Were we thinking of ourselves most of the time? Or were we thinking of what we could do for others, of what we could pack into the stream of life? But we must be careful not to drift into worry, remorse or morbid reflection, for that would diminish our usefulness to others. After making our review we ask God’s forgiveness and inquire what corrective measures should be taken.On awakening let us think about the twenty-four hours ahead. We consider our plans for the day. Before we begin, we ask God to direct our thinking, especially asking that it be divorced from self-pity, dishonest or self-seeking motives. Under these conditions we can employ our mental faculties with assurance, for after all God gave us brains to use. Our thought-life will be placed on a much higher plane when our thinking is cleared of wrong motives.In thinking about our day we may face indecision. We may not be able to determine which course to take. Here we ask God for inspiration, an intuitive thought or a decision. We relax and take it easy. We don’t struggle. We are often surprised how the right answers come after we have tried this for a while.What used to be the hunch or the occasional inspiration gradually becomes a working part of the mind. Being still inexperienced and having just made conscious contact with God, it is not probable that we are going to be inspired at all times. We might pay for this presumption in all sorts of absurd actions and ideas. Nevertheless, we find that our thinking will, as time passes, be more and more on the plane of inspiration. We come to rely upon it. We usually conclude the period of meditation with a prayer that we be shown all through the day what our next step is to be, that we be given whatever we need to take care of such problems. We ask especially for freedom from self-will, and are careful to make no request for ourselves only. We may ask for ourselves, however, if others will be helped. We are careful never to pray for our own selfish ends. Many of us have wasted a lot of time doing that and it doesn’t work. You can easily see why.
spirituality.author: Bill Wilson

spirituality.quote: The five points of yama, together with the five points of niyama, remind us of the Ten Commandments of the Christtian and Jewish faiths, as well as of the ten virtues of Buddhism. In fact, there is no religion without these moral or ethical codes. All spiritual life should be based on these things. They are the foundation stones without which we can never build anything lasting. (127)
spirituality.author: Sri S. Satchidananda

spirituality.quote: Clearly recognizing what is happening inside us, and regarding what we see with an open, kind and loving heart, is what I call Radical Acceptance. If we are holding back from any part of our experience, if our heart shuts out any part of who we are and what we feel, we are fueling the fears and feelings of separation that sustain the trance of unworthiness. Radical Acceptance directly dismantles the very foundations of this trance.
spirituality.author: Tara Brach

spirituality.quote: A healer's power stems not from any special ability, but from maintaining the courage and awareness to embody and express the universal healing power that every human being naturally possesses.
spirituality.author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

spirituality.quote: If I am going to be drowned—if I am going to be drowned—if I am going to be drowned, why, in the name of the seven mad gods who rule the sea, was I allowed to come thus far and contemplate sand and trees?
spirituality.author: Stephen Crane

spirituality.quote: Sometimes resilience arrives in the moment you discover your own unshakeable goodness.
spirituality.author: Gregory Boyle

spirituality.quote: Living in a world such as this is like dancing on a live volcano.
spirituality.author: Kentetsu Takamori

spirituality.quote: So what is the difference between someone who willfully indulges in sexual pleasures while ignoring the Bible on moral purity and someone who willfully indulges in the selfish pursuit of more and more material possessions while ignoring the Bible on caring for the poor? The difference is that one involves a social taboo in the church and the other involves the social norm in the church.
spirituality.author: David Platt

spirituality.quote: Isn't this enough? Just this world? Just THIS?
spirituality.author: Tim Minchin

spirituality.quote: God help us to live slowly:To move simply:To look softly:To allow emptiness:To let the heart create for us.Amen.
spirituality.author: Michael Leunig

spirituality.quote: From this point forward, you don’t even know how to quit in life."~ Aaron Lauritsen, ‘100 Days Drive
spirituality.author: Aaron Lauritsen

spirituality.quote: When angels speak of love they tell us it is only by loving that we enter an earthly paradise. They tell us paradise is our home and love our true destiny.
spirituality.author: bell hooks

spirituality.quote: I love to walk. Walking is a spiritual journey and a reflection of living. Each of us must determine which path to take and how far to walk; we must find our own way, what is right for one may not be for another. There is no single right way to deal with late stage cancer, to live life or approach death, or to walk an old mission trail.
spirituality.author: Edie Littlefield Sundby

spirituality.quote: These are the three stages of enlightenment, the three glimpses of satori.  1. The first stage enlightenment:A Glimpse of the WholeThe first stage of enlightenment is short glimpse from faraway of the whole. It is a short glimpse of being. The first stage of enlightenment is when, for the first time, for a single moment the mind is not functioning. The ordinary ego is still present at the first stage of enlightenment, but you experience for a short while that there is something beyond the ego. There is a gap, a silence and emptiness, where there is not thought between you and existence. You and existence meet and merge for a moment. And for the first time the seed, the thirst and longing, for enlightenment, the meeting between you and existence, will grow in your heart. 2. The second stage of enlightenment:Silence, Relaxation, Togetherness, Inner BeingThe second stage of enlightenment is a new order, a harmony, from within, which comes from the inner being. It is the quality of freedom.The inner chaos has disappeared and a new silence, relaxation and togetherness has arisen.Your own wisdom from within has arisen.A subtle ego is still present in the second stage of enlightenment. The Hindus has three names for the ego:1. Ahamkar, which is the ordinary ego.2. Asmita, which is the quality of Am-ness, of no ego. It is a very silent ego, not aggreessive, but it is still a subtle ego.3. Atma, the third word is Atma, when the Am-ness is also lost. This is what Buddha callas no-self, pure being.In the second stage of enlightenment you become capable of being in the inner being, in the gap, in the meditative quality within, in the silence and emptiness.For hours, for days, you can remain in the gap, in utter aloneness, in God. Still you need effort to remain in the gap, and if you drop the effort, the gap will disappear. Love, meditation and prayer becomes the way to increase the effort in the search for God. Then the second stage becomes a more conscious effort. Now you know the way, you now the direction. 3. The third stage of enlightenment: Ocean, Wholeness, No-self, Pure beingAt the third stage of enlightenment, at the third step of Satori, our individual river flowing silently, suddenly reaches to the Ocean and becomes one with the Ocean.At the third Satori, the ego is lost, and there is Atma, pure being. You are, but without any boundaries. The river has become the Ocean, the Whole.It has become a vast emptiness, just like the pure sky. The third stage of enlightenment happens when you have become capable of finding the inner being, the meditative quality within, the gap, the inner silence and emptiness, so that it becomes a natural quality. You can find the gap whenever you want.This is what tantra callas Mahamudra, the great orgasm, what Buddha calls Nirvana, what Lao Tzu calls Tao and what Jesus calls the kingdom of God.You have found the door to God. You have come home.
spirituality.author: Swami Dhyan Giten

spirituality.quote: There is a purpose for everyone you meet. Some people will test you, some will use you, some will bring out the best in you, but everyone will teach you something about yourself. Both positive and negative relationships teach you valuable lessons. This is an incredible step toward expanding your consciousness. The road to self-discovery requires help from others. As humans we are always seeking feedback and approval from others. That is how we learn and become better as individuals. No relationship is a waste of time. The wrong ones teach you the lessons that prepare you for the right ones. Appreciate everyone that enters your life because they are contributing to your growth and happiness.
spirituality.author: The Angel Affect

spirituality.quote: It's not much. You begin by thinking there is something extraordinary about it. But you'll find out, when you've been out in the world a while longer, unhappiness is the commonest thing there is.
spirituality.author: Erich Maria Remarque

spirituality.quote: A balanced inner calmness radiates from a peaceful centre. It neither craves others' approval nor rejects others' presence. It neither pulls towards nor pushes away. It has a reverent attitude towards life and all its inhabitants.
spirituality.author: Donna Goddard

spirituality.quote: The gut is the seat of all feeling. Polluting the gut not only cripples your immune system, but also destroys your sense of empathy, the ability to identify with other humans. Bad bacteria in the gut creates neurological issues. Autism can be cured by detoxifying the bellies of young children. People who think that feelings come from the heart are wrong. The gut is where you feel the loss of a loved one first. It's where you feel pain and a heavy bulk of your emotions. It's the central base of your entire immune system. If your gut is loaded with negative bacteria, it affects your mind. Your heart is the seat of your conscience. If your mind is corrupted, it affects your conscience. The heart is the Sun. The gut is the Moon. The pineal gland is Neptune, and your brain and nervous system (5 senses) are Mercury. What affects the moon or sun affects the entire universe within. So, if you poison the gut, it affects your entire nervous system, your sense of reasoning, and your senses.
spirituality.author: Suzy Kassem

spirituality.quote: They will become Godly when they will have God in their hearts.
spirituality.author: Riaz Ahmed Gohar Shahi

spirituality.quote: And if you would know God, be not therefore a solver of riddles.Rather look about you and you shall see Him playing with your children.And look into space; you shall see Him walking in the cloud, outstretching His arms in the lightning and descending in rain.You shall see Him smiling in flowers, then rising and waving His hands in trees.
spirituality.author: Kahlil Gibran

spirituality.quote: Oh Woman, come before us, before our eyes longing for beauty, and tired of the ugliness of civilization, come in simple tunics, letting us see the line and harmony of the body beneath, and dance for us. Dance us the sweetness of life. Give us again the sweetness and the beauty of the true dance, give us again the joy of seeing the simple unconscious pure body of a woman. Like a great call it has come, and women must hear it and answer it.
spirituality.author: Isadora Duncan

spirituality.quote: God doesn’t hate good music any more than He hates sex or drugs. All are paths to transcendence.
spirituality.author: A.D. Aliwat

spirituality.quote: Satan is in love with all humans and it’s our job to reject that love.
spirituality.author: A.D. Aliwat

spirituality.quote: If you can find the seed of compassion in your heart to send it to any person, place or situation who needs it, you will see right in front of your eyes the incredible miracle of your life healing in joy and bliss
spirituality.author: Dr Ana Garcia PhD DTM

spirituality.quote: Think in Abundance terms: create more love and support in your life, create more time for meditation and stillness to be able to connect with your Inner Self. In this vast Universe, nothing is wasted and everything is necessary so tap into the abundance that is already there
spirituality.author: Dr Ana Garcia PhD DTM

spirituality.quote: Accept everything your life offers your right now, even if you think you are in the wrong job or the wrong relationship because this is the basis of your dream: a necessary lesson
spirituality.author: Dr Ana Garcia PhD DTM

spirituality.quote: You are always in the right place and at the right time. Accept it and embrace as it is a springboard to achieving your dreams
spirituality.author: Dr Ana Garcia PhD DTM

spirituality.quote: Learn to live your spirituality as an adventure by paying attention to the different levels. You may not be able to explain it to others but it will become your own reality
spirituality.author: Dr Ana Garcia PhD DTM

spirituality.quote: At what level are we going to force others to accept our wise advice? At what level are we going to limit their life lessons? Have we forgotten that the only way to teach others is by example?
spirituality.author: Dr Ana Garcia PhD DTM

spirituality.quote: The work of the Alchemist is to transmute negativity into gold: the highest vibration of illumination, love and compassion. And in this frequency, anything else is a mirage which will have to transmute into becoming harimonious or "real" ... we are "realizing" our destiny"Tales of a Modern Alchemist"By Dr Ana Garcia PhD DTM
spirituality.author: Dr Ana Garcia PhD DTM

spirituality.quote: If we believe only what we see instead of what we are able to do, we shut down the process of creation
spirituality.author: Dr Ana Garcia PhD DTM

spirituality.quote: Give yourself the benefit of tapping into possibilities that you never knew that existed for you and be brave enough to step into the adventure of the unknown
spirituality.author: Dr Ana Garcia PhD DTM

spirituality.quote: We need to look at the bottom energy line in our systems. If there is something robbing us of energy, be it physical, mental, emotional or spiritual, we won't be able to shift
spirituality.author: Dr Ana Garcia PhD DTM

spirituality.quote: If we change our thoughts, we change our lives, therefore we change our future and our destiny... and this is within our hands' reach"Tales of a Modern Alchemist"Dr Ana Garcia PhD DTM
spirituality.author: Dr Ana Garcia PhD DTM

spirituality.quote: If your fists are clenched and your hands are closed to accept your gifts, the universe cannot, nor does it want to, force you to receive them. It is a matter of free will
spirituality.author: Dr Ana Garcia PhD DTM

spirituality.quote: We’re all perfect creatures of God, figuring out our own way back to Him.
spirituality.author: A.D. Aliwat

spirituality.quote: I feelSomething's happeningFor meBehind my backAnd I hopeIt's loveBecause it'sThe only thingI needIn this worldTo be well
spirituality.author: Jazalyn

spirituality.quote: We dismiss our power when we refuse to believe in, and be patient with, the creative process
spirituality.author: Dr Ana Garcia PhD DTM

spirituality.quote: Our dreams are as real as reality itself... only in a different dimension
spirituality.author: Dr Ana Garcia PhD DTM

spirituality.quote: Experiment and experience that which you think you are ready for. Don't leave it for tomorrow and don't procrastinate: the moment is now
spirituality.author: Dr Ana Garcia PhD DTM

spirituality.quote: Our external reality is a mirror of our internal truth. Any changes that we want taking place in our external world must first be engineered, thought of, become aware of and carried out in the inside
spirituality.author: Dr Ana Garcia PhD DTM

spirituality.quote: Connecting with God would require openness.
spirituality.author: A.D. Aliwat

spirituality.quote: There are no such things as mistakes, not in this universe. Maybe he really was the second coming of Christ, yes, yes, maybe we all are. Whatever happens does for a reason, and that reason is the teleological order of all things, the rhythm of the universe.
spirituality.author: A.D. Aliwat

spirituality.quote: She saw God and it looked like her.
spirituality.author: A.D. Aliwat

spirituality.quote: Everyone wants a master, everyone needs some version of God.
spirituality.author: A.D. Aliwat

spirituality.quote: Yaho, wah, wowee, wowee, yah, weh, wowwee, wowee, yaho, wah, wowee, wow.
spirituality.author: A.D. Aliwat

spirituality.quote: DMT is the truth, the whole truth, and nothing but the fuckin’ truth. And it’s in us. It’s in us all, naturally. Every living organism. No wonder they call it the spirit molecule.
spirituality.author: A.D. Aliwat

spirituality.quote: Garden of the Dragons (Vol. Three, 'The 'Halla')Epilogue (abridged'Tis an immortaled foreverness we go to,On that wind shorn and storm torrid plain, Where hopes, dreams and life never dies -As we encounter ourselves, and in our loveThe victory do we gain. Even so, there are more forgotten fables ofThis eternaled lass,She exists in our dreams forever, that shadow land Where true hearts do last. She is our story, the legends and myths as are we,A tale to be told to the child within, who forevermore is free.Rides she everlasting in our quietest stores,And summons up the courage to live of what weHave royally into been born.Yea, once more she rules the Forgottenland,She has learned to love, but foreverAlone, she stands. But we should know, deep down inside,Kari doth smiles for she is one of her kind (For if nothing else, she appreciates her all,Who she is and in this, knowing she will never fall).Thus it is written perhaps with our dissent,That those in Hell are of the unrepent. A place of one's own choosing so it would seem,Moment by moment we enter therein with our false dreams.Yet those who are there know one truth above all, The strength of iron hopelessness -Of realities not false.A prison to some, a Heaven to others,Freedom reigns when earthen illusions are shattered asunder. And Kari, does she know her secret? Surely she does,That to love and to be oneself are blessings from Above.
spirituality.author: Douglas Laurent

spirituality.quote: There is no way to peace, peace is the way.
spirituality.author: A. J. Muste

spirituality.quote: An illness is crystallised vibration. It is a marker telling you where you have stopped on your path and it forces you to take stock and make a new choice... Or not!
spirituality.author: Dr Ana Garcia PhD DTM

spirituality.quote: And what quantum physics has shown is that when we look at these patterns of energy at smaller and smaller levels, startling results can be seen.
